T02TD1199E:1b-1: sarba tantra sya ni d'a na ma h'a gu hya shri sampu ta tantra r'a dza n'a ma t'i k'a ratna m'a la n'a ma /
T02TD1199E:1b-3: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun du kha sbyor zhes bya [dd] ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher bshad pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1199E:1b-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1199E:1b-5: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can //
T02TD1199E:1b-6: gnyis med rdzogs longs spyod pa dang //
T02TD1199E:1b-8: spyi bos btud la kha sbyor bshad //
T02TD1199E:1b-9: brjod bya rgyu yi don yin la //
T02TD1199E:1b-10: rtogs pa dgos pa yin par bshad //
T02TD1199E:1b-11: snod bcud thams cad bde chen du rtogs pa mthar thug ste /
T02TD1199E:1b-13: de la bsdus pa'i don ni /
T02TD1199E:1b-16: rjes su yi rang bas bstod pa gsum yin la /
T02TD1199E:1b-17: 'di skad ces bya ba nas gsungs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gleng gzhi bstan to //
T02TD1199E:1b-18: de nas zhes bya ba nas 'dzum pa mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ston pas gleng bslang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:1b-19: 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu zhes bya ba nas nyan par 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'khor gyis gleng bslang ba bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2a-1: stsal to zhes bya ba nas yon tan gyi 'byung gnas legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis skabs dbye ba bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2a-2: rgyud kyi mtshan bshad pa dang bzhi yin la /
T02TD1199E:2a-3: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1199E:2a-4: dbang bskur nyid kyis mtshon byed do //
T02TD1199E:2a-5: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mtshan bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2a-6: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud //
T02TD1199E:2a-7: ces bya ba nas le'u dang po'i rab tu byed pa bzhi dang le'u lnga'i rab tu byed pa lnga las brtse ba'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis zab pa'i rdzogs rim bsgom pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2a-8: de la thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud nas /
T02TD1199E:2a-10: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis las gsum gyi thun mong gi shes bya bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2a-11: sngon du mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin //
T02TD1199E:2a-13: mya ngan las 'das dpa' bo yin //
T02TD1199E:2a-14: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis grol ba'i lam bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:2a-15: ma dang sring mo nyid dang ni //
T02TD1199E:2a-17: nor bu 'dzin sogs lam gyi rigs //
T02TD1199E:2a-18: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chags pa'i lam bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2a-19: sgom pa po med ces bya ba nas bsam gtan bde brjod ces bya ba'i bar gyis rang lhag pa'i lam bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2a-20: rab tu byed pa gnyis pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sems rtsa ba'i 'khor lo snang ba dang bcas pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-0: rab tu byed pa gsum pas bde @2b mchog dang mnyam sbyor gyi gleng gzhi bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-1: rab tu byed pa bzhi pas gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi rgyas par bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-2: le'u gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po las chu dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes gsum gyi dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-3: rab tu byed pa gnyis pas bzhi pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zab pa'i rdzogs rim bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-4: le'u gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa nas le'u bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi dang drug gis bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-5: de la dang pos ni he ru ka du ma bsgom pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-6: gnyis pas ni sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi lha mo du ma bsgom pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-7: gsum pas ni phyag rgya drug gi bsgom pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-8: bzhi pas ni rdo rje gdan bzhi'i ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-9: lnga pas ni bdag med ma bsgom pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-10: drug pas ni de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i bsgom pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-11: le'u bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-12: le'u lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis kas bskyed rdzogs gnyis brten par byed pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-13: de la dang pos yi ge brda'i mtshan nyid dang gnyis pas dbang bskur ba'i lha mo'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-14: gsum pas dpa' bo dang bka' nod pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-15: bzhi pas de rnams kyi yan lag gi brda'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-16: lnga pas tshogs 'khor gyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-17: drug pas snying gar 'khor lo bsgom pa nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-18: le'u lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pas /
T02TD1199E:2b-19: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ldang ba'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-20: bzhi pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ldang ba'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-21: le'u drug pa'i rab tu byed pa dang pos bde mchog gi gleng gzhi bstan cing dga' ba'i rdo rje'i lus kyi skye ba shes byar bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-22: gnyis pas thig le bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-23: gsum pas rtsa bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1199E:2b-24: bzhi pas drod dang byang chub kyi sems bsdam pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-25: de ltar le'u drug gi rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bzhis mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-26: le'u bdun pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhis 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:2b-27: de la dang pos ni bcud kyis len dang tantra'i tshogs bstan to //
T02TD1199E:3a-0: @3a * // gnyis pas ni sbyin sreg mdor bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-1: gsum pas sngags du ma bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-2: bzhi pas sbyin sreg rgyas par bstan pa yantra'i tshogs rgyas par bstan to //
T02TD1199E:3a-3: le'u brgyad pa dang le'u dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis kyis bsgrub pa'i yan lag bstan to //
T02TD1199E:3a-4: de la dang pos rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-5: gnyis pas bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-7: bzhi pas phrin las bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-8: lnga pas snod ldan bsgom pa'i spyod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-9: drug pas gtor ma'i spyod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-10: bdun pas bris sku glegs bam bri ba dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-11: brgyad pas mchod pa'i kun spyod bstan to //
T02TD1199E:3a-12: le'u bcu pa'i dang pos ni rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-13: rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD1199E:3a-14: lhag ma gsum gyis ni 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan to //
T02TD1199E:3a-15: de la dang pos ni 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-16: gnyis pas ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-17: gsum pas ni sngags kyi theg pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bza' ba bstan to //
T02TD1199E:3a-18: mtshams sbyor ba ni le'u bcu las mchod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:3a-19: gleng slong ba bstan nas gsol ba gdab pa dang de nas zhes bya ba'i tshig bcus mtshams sbyor ba bstan to ;
T02TD1199E:3a-20: zhus pa dang lan ni rdo rje snying pos rab tu byed pa bzhi bcu zhus pa las bka' stsal pa bzhi bcus gtan la phab pa'o //
T02TD1199E:3a-21: da ni yan lag gi don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:3a-22: kun rdzob btags pa'i gleng gzhi'i dbang du byas nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pas lcang lo can gyi pho phrang du bla gos lnga brgya gdan du bting nas lcang lo can du lag na rdo rje la /
T02TD1199E:3a-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo //
T02TD1199E:3a-24: rdo rje 'chang bas ji skad gsungs //
T02TD1199E:3a-25: shes rab sras po khyod smros shig / phyag na rdo rje khyod smros shig / ces gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la /
T02TD1199E:3a-26: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum gyis sdud pa po'i gleng slong ba bstan te 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i rgyud le'u bcu pa'o //
T02TD1199E:3a-27: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni na ta ku be ra'i sras /
T02TD1199E:3a-28: lag bzang dang rdo rje sde'i yab sa bcu'i dbang phyug sdud pa po'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-0: thos pa ni 'khor btang nas @3b sam sprul pa 'am brgyud pa ma yin par dngos su thos pa'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-1: tshig phyi ma'i dus kyi tshig dang sbyar na lan 'ga' na ni thos pas thos pa mang ba'am /
T02TD1199E:3b-2: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pas skad cig ma gcig la rgyud kyi don mtha' dag rtogs pas bdag nyid tshad ma'i skyes bu yin par ston to ;
T02TD1199E:3b-3: / dus nam gyi tshe zhe na dus gcig na zhes bya ba rtsod pa'i dus kyi thog mar ro //
T02TD1199E:3b-4: su las she na bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa po dang 'bras bu ste /
T02TD1199E:3b-5: he ru ka bdud bzhi bcom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-6: gnas gang du zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa'o ;
T02TD1199E:3b-7: / de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyogs bcu dang dus gsum dang gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-8: de bzhin nyid gzhan la ston pa'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-9: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni me long lta bu'i rnam pa sku dang /
T02TD1199E:3b-10: so sor rtog pa'i rnam pa gsung dang /
T02TD1199E:3b-11: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rnam pa thugs dang /
T02TD1199E:3b-12: gsung gi chos nyid 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni rdo rje ste /
T02TD1199E:3b-13: ye shes de'i gzung ba'i rnam pa'i cha ni shes rab ste btsun mo'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-14: de'i bha ga ni 'dzam bu'i gling gru gsum pa rgyal po aindra bh'u ti la sogs pa 'dod chags can 'dul ba la sogs pa'i ched du'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-15: bzhugs pa ni gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pas chos 'chad pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1199E:3b-16: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:3b-17: rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams las //
T02TD1199E:3b-18: sems can don du chos bstan dang //
T02TD1199E:3b-19: brag ca yi ni sgra 'dra la //
T02TD1199E:3b-22: gang dang lhan cig tu zhe na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang ste /
T02TD1199E:3b-23: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug sha stag gis yongs su bskor zhing dbus su chud pa'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-24: ci zhig mdzad cing zhe na 'dzum pa mdzad cing ste /
T02TD1199E:3b-25: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul las dang po pa la ston pas na ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1199E:3b-26: don dam pa'i gleng gzhi ni zab pa dang ma zab pa gnyis las /
T02TD1199E:4a-0: de la byang chub sems dpa' sa yi snying po la sogs pas 'di skad bdag gis thos pa ste sprul pa'i sku mthong ba'i mtshon byed kyis mtshon bya ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag la rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par gyis shig @4a * //
T02TD1199E:4a-1: ces bya bar ston pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:4a-2: de la dus ni dga' ba bzhi'i dus so //
T02TD1199E:4a-3: bcom ldan 'das ni lus dang yid bde ba zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1199E:4a-4: gnas ni lus ngag yid gsum bde ba ro gcig pa'i btsun mo'i bha ga'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-5: 'khor ni lus kyi 'khor lo bzhi rtsa'i yan lag dang bcas bcas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-6: 'dzum pa mdzad pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dbus kyi snying po'i rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i la gzigs nas 'khor lo bzhi bde bas khyab pa'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-7: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi sprul pa'i sku'i mtshon byed las mtshon bya rlung gi 'khor lo bsgom pa rtogs te dus ni rlung gnyis 'gog pa'i dus so //
T02TD1199E:4a-8: ston pa ni rlung dbus ma la brten nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes nas so //
T02TD1199E:4a-9: gnas ni sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ro gcig pa ste /
T02TD1199E:4a-11: 'khor lo ni dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-12: rdo rje snying pos gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa ni rtsa aa wa dh'u t'ir rlung la brten nas bde ba bskyed pas na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'o /
T02TD1199E:4a-13: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa'i sku'i mtshon byed las /
T02TD1199E:4a-14: mtshon bya sems kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rtogs te /
T02TD1199E:4a-15: dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
T02TD1199E:4a-16: ston pa ni mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1199E:4a-17: gnas ni sku gsung thugs ro gcig pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1199E:4a-18: 'khor ni gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-19: 'dzum pa mdzad pa ni rang gi sems 'od gsal ba glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-20: rdo rje snying po la gzigs shing 'dzum pa mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-21: dngos su gtso bos gleng bslang ba bstan pas shugs las 'khor dang bcas pa'i chos bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:4a-23: dkyil 'khor bha ga zhes bya dang //
T02TD1199E:4a-24: dkyil 'khor lus zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD1199E:4a-25: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings su bshad //
T02TD1199E:4a-26: dbyangs dang sngags dang chos bdag nyid //
T02TD1199E:4a-28: gnyis ni mi zab pa yin la gcig ni don dam pa las zab pa'i gleng gzhi bstan to //
T02TD1199E:4a-29: da ni 'khor gyis gleng slong ba bstan te /
T02TD1199E:4a-30: 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD1199E:4a-31: chos nyan pa'i spyod lam brtul nas stan las langs nas /
T02TD1199E:4b-0: rgyud dgu'i don zhu ba'i phyir bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas @4b pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te phyag 'tshal ba'i mchod pa sngon du song ba'i phyir yan lag gis thal mo sbyar ba byas shing spyi bo sa la btud nas so //
T02TD1199E:4b-1: 'di skad ston zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1199E:4b-2: zhu ba'i don ni rgyud thams cad nas brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:4b-3: gleng gzhi ni rgyud 'byung ba'i tshogs pa ste ston par rtsom pas ni rjod byed do //
T02TD1199E:4b-5: 'chad pa po yi byed pa'i yul //
T02TD1199E:4b-6: don gang rab tu gsal blo la //
T02TD1199E:4b-7: de la sgra ni tshad ma nyid //
T02TD1199E:4b-9: gsang chen ni khams gsum pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis kyis ma rtogs pa skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams rtogs pa dang ;
T02TD1199E:4b-11: rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1199E:4b-12: rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis //
T02TD1199E:4b-13: 'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1199E:4b-14: sems can khams ni rab tu sgrub /
T02TD1199E:4b-16: kun du kha sbyor ni rgyud dgu'i thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:4b-18: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //
T02TD1199E:4b-19: thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD1199E:4b-20: de bas snying rje chen po thabs //
T02TD1199E:4b-21: shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba //
T02TD1199E:4b-22: rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi //
T02TD1199E:4b-23: rjes su sbyor bar mchod byed cing //
T02TD1199E:4b-24: kun du myong bar byed pas na //
T02TD1199E:4b-27: mtshan nyid ni yul dang yul can gyi stong pa nyid dang dbang gsum pa dang bzhi pas rtogs nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi chos nyid mtshon par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:4b-28: mtshon par byed pas na mtshan nyid de ye shes kyi dbang phyug snang ba med pa ji lta ba dang /
T02TD1199E:4b-29: snang ba dang bcas pa ji snyed pa'i sdebs la ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag gi don du nyan par 'tshal lo //
T02TD1199E:4b-30: de'i don ni zhal gyis bzhes pa skabs dbye ba ni bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:4b-31: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02TD1199E:4b-32: spyod pa ni mi rnams kyis don du dri bas na ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1199E:4b-33: rgyu'i rgyud dri bas na brtse bas legs so zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1199E:4b-34: thabs kyi rgyud 'dri bas na byang chub sems dpa' legs so sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1199E:4b-35: 'bras bu'i rgyud 'dri bas na yon tan gyi 'byung gnas legs so legs so sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1199E:5a-1: gnyis ston pa ni brjod bya dang rjod byed gnyis sam /
T02TD1199E:5a-2: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa sems can gyis myong bas na legs so legs so zhes dris pas so //
T02TD1199E:5a-3: skabs dbye ba bstan nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cus skabs phye bas thog mar dga' bas rab tu 'dzum pa dang /
T02TD1199E:5a-4: rab tu gsal ba'i mig phye nas /
T02TD1199E:5a-5: tha mar dga' bas yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas /
T02TD1199E:5a-6: sems can thams cad bdag dang gzhan brje ba byas nas rang gi the tshom zhus pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:5a-7: gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams ni brjod bya ci yin zhes zhus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:5a-8: rjod byed gleng gzhi ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:5a-9: de rnams kyi rgyu'i rgyud 'di ni gang la gsang ba gsungs zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:5a-10: thabs kyi rgyud kun du kha sbyor gyi ming ni ci yin zhes zhus pa dang 'bras bu'i rgyud de'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa'o //
T02TD1199E:5a-11: rgyud thams cad na gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa dgu'i brjod par bya ba'o //
T02TD1199E:5a-12: de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni phun sum tshogs pa bzhi'i tshogs pa las rjod byed kyi rgyud 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:5a-13: gsang ba'i khams gsum gyi bdag po dang /
T02TD1199E:5a-14: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pas rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir gsang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:5a-15: kun du kha sbyor ni thabs shes rab rgyu'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1199E:5a-16: kun du kha sbyor de las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshon par byed do //
T02TD1199E:5a-17: de las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgod pa brten pa dang /
T02TD1199E:5a-18: g-yo ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin mtshon par bya ba'i mtshan nyid dbang bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad bde ba chen po'i byed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:5a-20: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:5a-21: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02TD1199E:5a-23: gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa //
T02TD1199E:5a-24: de ni kun gyi stong nyid yin //
T02TD1199E:5a-25: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas dbang bzhi pa sems kyi de bzhin nyid shes na chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:5a-26: des ni 'bras bu'i rgyud kyi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02TD1199E:5a-27: yang na 'di'i bshad pa'i rgyud ma yin pas rtsa ba'i rgyud dgu ston te /
T02TD1199E:5a-28: rgyud thams cad dang gleng gzhi ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:5b-0: kun du kha sbyor zhes bya ba'i sgras ni @5b stong pa nyid dang sgyu ma ro gcig pa zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:5b-1: gsang ba yang 'di nyid yin la dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshon pas mchod par bya ba dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1199E:5b-2: lha la sogs pa dang sngags btu ba'i man ngag la sogs ba bskyed pa'i rim pa kun brtags kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1199E:5b-3: mi zab pa'i rdzogs rim gzhan dbang zhig gi 'khor lo rnams dbang bzhi pa'i mtshon byed kyis bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin mtshon pa ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1199E:5b-5: dngul chu gser du snang ba zhes bya ba la srang gcig gis lcags srang stong gser srang stong sgrub par byed do zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:5b-6: chos kyi snying po sems kyi gsang shes na //
T02TD1199E:5b-7: 'gro rnams kun yang de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1199E:5b-9: de ltar na yang rgyud dgu'i bshad pa'i rgyud yin la /
T02TD1199E:5b-13: mtshon byed ting nge 'dzin dgus mtshon bya snod bcud thams cad bde bar go ba'o //
T02TD1199E:5b-14: yang na 'dir ni rang dga'i rgyud yin pas rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi thabs thams cad kyi don 'di gnyis gcig dang bsnyams nas zung du 'jug pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni kha sbyor yin la /
T02TD1199E:5b-15: de dbang bzhi bskur ba'i mtshon byed mtshan nyid kyis bskyed rdzogs thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:5b-16: de ltar mtshan bshad nas da ni rgyud bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:5b-17: gang zag gsum gyi shes bya'i thun mong gi zabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid rgyud de /
T02TD1199E:5b-18: rdo rje 'chang gis bshad kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu la nyon cig ces bod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:5b-19: yang na 'di ni rang dga'i rgyud yin pas /
T02TD1199E:5b-20: de la dang po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsams nas lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru bar bya'o zhes mdor bstan nas de ni rgyas par bshad pa /
T02TD1199E:5b-21: yul drug stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:5b-22: de la rdo rje snying po 'di snyam du sems te /
T02TD1199E:5b-23: gzugs la sogs pa yul drug las /
T02TD1199E:5b-24: rnam par shes pa skye ba'i mig la sogs pa dbang po drug dang /
T02TD1199E:6a-0: gzugs la sogs pa yul drug stong zhing med pas na dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ri bong gi rva bzhin du skye @6a * //
T02TD1199E:6a-1: bar thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes zhus pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:6a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni 'dzin pa med pas dpyad du med la gzung bya med pas shes bya ma yin zhing rjes su dpag pas gtan la phab pa'i rtog ges brtag par dka' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:6a-3: gzung 'dzin gnyis spangs shing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni zung du 'jug pa ji lta ba'i lam de nyid yin pas /
T02TD1199E:6a-4: ri bong gi rva ltar med pa'am rnam par bcad pa tsam 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:6a-5: des na rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi 'di ni gnyis su med pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:6a-6: de'i gsang ba'i don rgyas par bshad pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul zung du 'jug pa'i gsang ba chen po ni nam mkha' lta bur chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
T02TD1199E:6a-7: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i mun pa dang ldan pas nyan thos kyis mi shes la /
T02TD1199E:6a-8: phyogs gcig gi bag chags kyis dkris pas /
T02TD1199E:6a-9: rang sangs rgyas su sprul cing skyed pas ni mi shes so //
T02TD1199E:6a-10: de dag kun gyis zhes pas ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum pas mi shes so //
T02TD1199E:6a-11: rgyu des na gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:6a-12: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis mi shes na ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
T02TD1199E:6a-13: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams sgrol ba'i bsam pas dbang bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshon nas sgrol bar byed do //
T02TD1199E:6a-14: de la mtshon bya ni snod bcud thams cad do //
T02TD1199E:6a-15: mtshon byed ni dbang bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1199E:6a-16: mtshan nyid ni zung du 'jug pa'i bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD1199E:6a-17: mtshon byed de yang gnyis te /
T02TD1199E:6a-18: dga' ba gsum bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
T02TD1199E:6a-19: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes so //
T02TD1199E:6a-20: ye shes kyi snod bcud kyi rang bzhin shes bya stong pa'i rang bzhin du bltas la zhes bya ba stong par shes nas /
T02TD1199E:6a-21: ma dag pa'i rang bzhin 'gro ba rigs drug bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:6a-22: skye ba stong phrag du ma ru //
T02TD1199E:6a-23: rdzogs par rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:6a-24: zhes bya ba ni skye ba snga mar gnyis su med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:6a-25: don la goms par byas pas //
T02TD1199E:6a-26: ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku gsum gyi go 'phang du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:6b-0: de ltar na gang zag gsum gyi thun mong gi gsang chen kha sbyor gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas da ni @6b grol lam pa'i shes bya bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:6b-1: sngar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong pa shes rab kyis yang dag par dran par byas nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsum gyi nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi zhing la ye shes kyi rgyu rnam shes bde ba'i sa bon gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:6b-2: de ltar grol lam pa'i mdor bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:6b-3: da ni shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i chu shing gi snying po ltar drang ba /
T02TD1199E:6b-4: til gyi mar me ltar gsal ba /
T02TD1199E:6b-5: padma'i skud pa ltar phra ba /
T02TD1199E:6b-6: rgya skyegs kyi me tog ltar dmar ba'i rtsa las byung ba'i rdul phran gyi sems de rgyud kyi rim pa rtsa'i rang bzhin bstan to //
T02TD1199E:6b-7: dri med shel dang mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam par snang ba snying gar gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le bstan to //
T02TD1199E:6b-8: de'i dbus na gnas pa'i lha zhes pa ni rtsa dbus ma yin la /
T02TD1199E:6b-9: dbus na gnas pa'i lha ni nam mkha'i rlung ngo //
T02TD1199E:6b-10: mi gsal ba ni bems po yin la /
T02TD1199E:6b-11: gsal ba ni shes pas myong ba'o //
T02TD1199E:6b-12: cha phye ba ni mi shigs pa'i rlung /
T02TD1199E:6b-13: mig btsums phyed kyi tshad du sdod pa thig le'i gzugs can rtog pa med pa'i yid kyis myong ba'o //
T02TD1199E:6b-14: de ltar tshigs bcad gnyis kyis nam mkha'i rlung bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:6b-15: tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bde ba'i gnas kyi tshad bstan pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD1199E:6b-16: gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan pa snying ga'i dbus na yul dang dbang po drug gi mtha' yin pa rtog pa med pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:6b-17: de'i bu ga dgu'i mtha' las mi 'da' ba rkang pa nas spyi gtsug gi mthar thug pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:6b-18: yang na rkang pa'i sor mo gnyis dang /
T02TD1199E:6b-19: spyi bo smin mtshams nas bcal ba sor dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dbus na aa wa dh'u t'i'i skud pa gcig tu gnas pa'am /
T02TD1199E:6b-20: yang na lte ba'i khung nas mar sor dgu'i mthar aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtse mor gnas pa yang sor gnyis kyi mthar tshangs pa'i bu ga'i mthar gnas kyang zer ro //
T02TD1199E:6b-21: de ltar rtsa dang rlung byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi rim pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:7a-0: rlung me'i drod can sngags kyi rim pa ni skud pa gcig la brten te lte ba'i dbus na logs la sor bdun gyi tshad kyi drod gnas kyang bde @7a * //
T02TD1199E:7a-1: ba mi skye bas 'byung ba lnga'i tshad dang ldan pa'i cha lnga pa mthe bo'i ri mo lta bu'am /
T02TD1199E:7a-2: klu'i dbang po lta bu klu dbang 'khyil pa der de rab tu rgyas shing 'phel bar byas nas /
T02TD1199E:7a-3: ye shes kyi rim pa snying ga'i byang chub sems kyi cha phye nas /
T02TD1199E:7a-4: lte ba rdo rje'i dbus su byung ba na byang chub kyi sems skye pa'i gnas me'i dkyil 'khor ae gru gsum gyi dbus su byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le phab pas ni khu ba'i dngos po ste /
T02TD1199E:7a-6: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
T02TD1199E:7a-7: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1199E:7a-9: de rim gyis 'phel nas sgo dgu'i mthar thug par gnas so ;
T02TD1199E:7a-10: /'phel bar gyur pas dga' bral du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:7a-19: de la steng du me'i sa bon te /
T02TD1199E:7a-20: drag mo'i sa bon kshum ngo //
T02TD1199E:7a-21: sa'i sa bon ni gtum mo'i yi ge h'um ngo //
T02TD1199E:7a-22: gtum mo'i sa bon ni rdzogs pa'i yi ge yum mo //
T02TD1199E:7a-23: chu'i sa bon ni mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon sum mo //
T02TD1199E:7a-24: gti mug gi sa bon ni seng ge ma'i yi ge smram ngo //
T02TD1199E:7a-25: zhe sdang gi sa bon ni stag mo'i yi ge hmryum ngo //
T02TD1199E:7a-26: snying ga'i phyogs su bskyod pa'i sa bon ce spyad ma'i yi ge ymryum ngo //
T02TD1199E:7a-27: phyugs kyi sa bon ni 'ug pa'i yi ge kshmryum ngo //
T02TD1199E:7a-28: brtan pa dang ni g-yo ba'i 'gro ba thams cad khyab pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:7a-29: zhi gnas kyi bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snod bcud bde bar snang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:7a-30: de 'ba' zhig tu snang ngam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:7a-31: tshangs sogs lha dang lha min bcas //
T02TD1199E:7a-32: zhes bya bas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams btang snyoms kyi bde ba la brten nas 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:7a-33: de mi g-yo ba'i lam bsam gtan gyi bde ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ram zhe na /
T02TD1199E:7a-34: gom pa gcig gis mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1199E:7a-35: gom pa gcig gis 'khor ba yin //
T02TD1199E:7a-37: de nyid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:7b-0: zhes bya ba'i rim pas ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar las dang las min des byed ces bya ba ni sems rang rig glo bur gyi dri ma dang bcas tsam na bde ba rtog pa med pa ma skyes pa'i tshe las dang las ma yin pa'i nyon mongs pa @7b des byed cing dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dbang gis mtho ris dang ngan song skyed par byed do //
T02TD1199E:7b-1: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gcig po des ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:7b-2: da ni lam gyi bden pa dang 'gog pa'i bden pa ston te /
T02TD1199E:7b-3: mnyam par sbyor ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang ngo //
T02TD1199E:7b-4: sbyor ba bsgoms pa ni mngon sum gyi sems rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa dang bral ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-5: gang gi tshe rnam par rtog pa'i lus zhig nas /
T02TD1199E:7b-6: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gzugs brnyan lta bu'i gzugs su bdag byin gyis rlob pa de'i tshe /
T02TD1199E:7b-7: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba thob nas brtan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:7b-8: g-yo ba thams cad stong pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:7b-9: de ltar 'gog pa dang lam bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:7b-11: de yi kha dog shes par bya //
T02TD1199E:7b-12: zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba la rnam snang gis rgyas btab nas yul gyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-13: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni sems mi bskyod pas rgyas btab nas nam mkha' lta bu stong pa bsgoms pa'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgoms nas /
T02TD1199E:7b-15: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab nas zung du 'jug pa shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-16: des na de ltar ngo shes pa'i sems de nyid nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas mi gos shing shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma spangs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-18: gong bu'i gzugs ni 'das gyur nas //
T02TD1199E:7b-19: dngos po med pa'i sems nyid bsgoms //
T02TD1199E:7b-20: sems nyid rtag par mi bya ste //
T02TD1199E:7b-21: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab bsam //
T02TD1199E:7b-22: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:7b-23: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02TD1199E:7b-25: de ltar grol ba'i lam bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:7b-26: da ni chags pa'i lam bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:7b-27: de lam ni rdo rje slob dpon dang dus mnyam du dbang thob pa'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-28: srid mo ni rang dang dus mnyam du dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-29: bu mo ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-30: gnyen mo ni rang gi slob mas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:7b-31: de bzhi ni sngags skyes yin la /
T02TD1199E:7b-32: bram ze mo la sogs pa bzhi ni gnas la sogs pa las skyes pa 'jig rten du grags pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:8a-0: gar mkhan ma la sogs pa bzhi ni zhing skyes kyi bye brag rigs tha mar gyur pa bdud rtsi dang dpa' bo rnam pa lnga rnams zas su 'dod pas rnam @8a * //
T02TD1199E:8a-1: rtog goms pas rnam rtog chung ba yin te /
T02TD1199E:8a-2: de ltar ba su tra gcig dbye ba bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:8a-3: da ni thabs kyi khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:8a-4: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02TD1199E:8a-5: de nyid rigs pas mchod bya zhing //
T02TD1199E:8a-6: zhes pa ni rtog pa med pa'i dga' ba bzhi pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:8a-7: ci nas tshor bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:8a-8: zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'i gnas su gsang thub cing dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:8a-9: rab tu 'bad de bya ba ni bsnyen bsgrub ngang ldan pas sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:8a-10: ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang //
T02TD1199E:8a-11: sa la spyod pas sdug bsngal spyod //
T02TD1199E:8a-12: ces pa ni ma spyad pa'i nyes dmigs so //
T02TD1199E:8a-13: de ltar thabs kyi khyad par bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:8a-14: da ni phyag rgya'i dbye ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:8a-15: sngags skyes ma la sogs pa bzhi la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs sam /
T02TD1199E:8a-16: rigs brgya'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dbye ba bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:8a-18: dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang //
T02TD1199E:8a-19: dpa' bo'i lha mo bkas bsgos skyes //
T02TD1199E:8a-20: zhes bya ba'i man ngag nas sems 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gnyis rigs dang mthun pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:8a-21: rgyu'i tshogs pa gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:8a-22: de la bram ze ni mdal [*mngal] nas skyes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:8a-23: rigs kyis bskyed pa dang gnyis dang ldan pa'i khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:8a-24: rgyal rigs ni rgyal srid dang ldan pa'i bu mo'o //
T02TD1199E:8a-25: rje'u'i rigs ni glang po che skyong ba'i rigs yin pas rje'u rigs kyi khyad par yin no //
T02TD1199E:8a-26: zhi ba la sogs pa byed na dmangs rigs kyi khyad par yin no //
T02TD1199E:8a-27: dmangs rigs shan pa mo dag ni nya pa dang shan pa dang lham mkhan la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rigs so //
T02TD1199E:8a-28: lhag ma'i rigs bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ma gtogs pa bzhi dang mthun par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:8a-29: lo'i tshigs ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba mtha' yas pa yod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs ni mdor bsdus nas brjod pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:8a-30: de ltar dbye ba brjod nas de'i 'thad pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:8a-31: de bzhin du ni slar song nas //
T02TD1199E:8a-32: de bzhin dpal ldan slar 'ong ma //
T02TD1199E:8a-33: shes rab 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyi lta ba bzhin du rang gis rtogs shing /
T02TD1199E:8b-0: rigs 'di shes rab stong pa nyid rtogs pa 'di la @8b de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD1199E:8b-1: de mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na pa'i zhal nas /
T02TD1199E:8b-2: de bzhin nyid rang gis mkhyen nas slar byon nas nyid kyis gzigs pa'i lam du gzung ba ni rnal 'byor gyis mngon sum rig pa 'dis bud med rnams la shes rab ces bya'o //
T02TD1199E:8b-3: snga ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshan nyid mthun pas bud med la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:8b-4: phyi ma ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen nas bud med rnams shes rab rab tu bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:8b-5: phung po khams dang dbang po dang yul dang ye shes la dbye bas rigs brgya yin no //
T02TD1199E:8b-6: mdor bsdu na lnga dang gsum gyi rang bzhin du bstan to //
T02TD1199E:8b-7: yang na bye brag phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga las rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:8b-10: rin po che yon tan dang /
T02TD1199E:8b-11: 'khor lo nor bu can sgra dang tshogs kyi sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa las kyi rigs bsdu ba'o //
T02TD1199E:8b-12: de ltar chags pa'i lam bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:8b-13: de nas rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:8b-14: sgom pa po med ces pa ni 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:8b-15: bsgom bya med ces pa ni gzung bya dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:8b-16: sngags med ces bya ba ni bcos ma'i bzlas pa med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:8b-17: lha yang med ces pa ni bcos ma'i lha spangs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:8b-18: 'o na lha bsgom pa dang sngags bzlas pa la sogs pa ji ltar bya zhe na spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:8b-19: 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin bsgom mo //
T02TD1199E:8b-21: rgyas par bshad pa ni spros pa dang bral ba de nyid rigs lnga'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1199E:8b-22: tshangs pa la sogs par snang ba chos kyi dbyings de kho na rtogs pa las byung ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:8b-23: ci'i phyir de ltar brjod ce na /
T02TD1199E:8b-24: gnas gyur pa ye shes lnga la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lngar brjod pa las 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas tshangs pa dang stong pa nyid la 'jug pas khyab 'jug dang /
T02TD1199E:8b-25: rtag tu zag pa med pa'i bde ba yin pas zhi ba ste /
T02TD1199E:8b-26: kun du thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs //
T02TD1199E:8b-28: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:8b-29: sa bcu gcig pa'i bde ba dam pa zung du 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid mthar phyin nas rtogs shing khong du chud pa las sangs rgyas lnga zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:9a-1: dri ma'i lus las dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i lha zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:9a-2: de la mtshan gyi bye brag ci lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:9a-3: skal ba drug dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pas na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:9a-4: gdul bya 'dod chags can rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1199E:9a-5: ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams shes rab kyang brdar btags la tshos mkhan dang gar mkhan dang g-yung mo zhes kyang brdar brjod la /
T02TD1199E:9a-6: rnam snang chen po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur bas thams cad la khyab pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:9a-7: gnyis su med pa'i don gcig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i tshul gyis brdar 'dogs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:9a-8: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nyams su blangs na 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid rtogs na ngag gi brjod pa thams cad bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:9a-10: lag pa bskyod pa phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1199E:9a-11: sems kyis gang bsams pa thams cad bsam gtan du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:9a-12: chags dang sdang ba la sogs dang //
T02TD1199E:9a-13: lus kyi g-yo 'gul la sogs dang //
T02TD1199E:9a-14: ngag gis ji snyed brjod pa rnams //
T02TD1199E:9a-15: chos nyid ci bzhin mthong nas ni //
T02TD1199E:9a-16: thams cad bde ba chen por 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:9a-18: de ltar rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:9a-19: de ji ltar rtogs pa'i thabs bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:9a-20: pha las thob pa'i bde ba gang //
T02TD1199E:9a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02TD1199E:9a-22: bla ma las dbang bskur ba'i dus su bde ba rtogs pa med pa myong nas bde ba'i rgyun rnams rnal 'byor pa rang gi dga' ba gsum las lus dang sems mngon sum du longs spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:9a-23: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:9a-24: chu'i bde ba gang yin pa de rang bzhin brgyad cus 'gags shing 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis bde ba chen po de la bsam gtan gyi bde ba zhes brjod do //
T02TD1199E:9a-25: de nyid ni mngon sum gyis lam gyi zag bcas dang zag med kyi bde ba rgyu tshogs pa las byung ba yin no zhes bstan to //
T02TD1199E:9a-26: brtag pa dang po'i rab tu byed pa dang po'o /
T02TD1199E:9a-28: // / de ltar de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i rab tu byed pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:9a-29: da ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro mnyam par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:9b-0: dkyil 'khor rnams kyang gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi @9b sems kyi rang bzhin yin par bstan par bzhed nas /
T02TD1199E:9b-1: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:9b-2: de la byed pa la nye bar gnas pa'i rgyu'i sas bsdus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-3: gnas pa las gyur pa 'bras bu mi slob pa'i sas bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1199E:9b-4: de la gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni sgyu ma lta bu dang stong pa 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin du cig car bsgoms pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:9b-5: sgyu ma lta bu sum cu rtsa bdun ni thabs /
T02TD1199E:9b-6: stong pa nyid sum cu rtsa bdun ni shes rab /
T02TD1199E:9b-7: zung du 'jug pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni bde ba chen po yin no zhes thos bsam gyis shes par byas nas phyag rgya bzhi la brten nas yul shes rab kyi stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-8: yul can thabs kyi stong pa nyid mngon sum du shes par byas nas bsgom pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:9b-9: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos yin la yul can shes rab kyi rnam pa ni stong pa nyid du byed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:9b-10: sngags kyi theg pa ni lus dang tshor ba dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-11: sems kyi chos ni bskyed rim pas lha mo bzhi bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-12: rdzogs rim la rtsa bzhi bsgoms nas /
T02TD1199E:9b-13: de la yul stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-14: yul can sgyu ma lta bur ro gcig par bsgom pa na /
T02TD1199E:9b-16: smig rgyu lta bur sems kyis rnam pa byed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:9b-17: de'i dgos pa ni lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-20: chos su rmongs pa spong ba'i phyir bsgom pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:9b-21: de bzhin du shes rab brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang bcas pas nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa mi skyed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-22: skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir sbyor ba la /
T02TD1199E:9b-23: 'dun pa bskyed cing dngos gzhi la 'bad de rjes la brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
T02TD1199E:9b-24: de ltar sems rab tu 'dzin cing ma 'ongs pa la sems dbang du smon to //
T02TD1199E:9b-25: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa skyed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-26: bskyed pa 'phel ba'i phyir byed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:9b-27: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs dang ldan pas 'dun pa dang /
T02TD1199E:9b-30: ting nge 'dzin bzhi la re res kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis /
T02TD1199E:9b-37: nyes pa lnga po spong pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:10a-0: de la le lo'i gnyen po ni @10a * //
T02TD1199E:10a-2: gnas pa brtson 'grus dang rgyu dad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:10a-3: 'bras bu shin tu sbyangs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:10a-4: dran pa dang lngas brjed ngas pa spong ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:10a-5: bying ba dang rgod pa ni shes bzhin gyis spong ngo //
T02TD1199E:10a-6: 'du mi byed pa ni sems pas spong ngo //
T02TD1199E:10a-7: 'du byed drags pa ni btang snyoms kyis spong ngo //
T02TD1199E:10a-8: de la dbang po rnams ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs nas rang gi rigs 'dra bskyed pa la dbang ba'i phyir dbang po'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-9: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir stobs so //
T02TD1199E:10a-10: de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rang bzhin gyi yan lag ni chos rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-11: gnas pa'i yan lag ni dran pa'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-12: nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag ni brtson 'grus so //
T02TD1199E:10a-13: dga' ba ni phan yon yin lag go //
T02TD1199E:10a-14: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i yan lag go //
T02TD1199E:10a-17: ngo bo nyid kyi yan lag go //
T02TD1199E:10a-18: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la yongs su gcod pa'i yan lag ni lta ba'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-19: go bar byed pa'i yan lag ni rtog pa'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-20: lta bas yid ches pa'i yan lag ni ngag go //
T02TD1199E:10a-21: tshul khrims kyis gzhan yid ches par byed pa ni las kyi mtha'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-22: yo byad bsnyungs pas gzhan yid ches par byed pa ni 'tsho ba'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-23: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ni rtsol ba'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-24: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ni mngon shes so //
T02TD1199E:10a-25: dbang gis bsgribs pa'i gnyen po ni ting nge 'dzin te //
T02TD1199E:10a-26: de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs cig car bsgom pa bstan nas de'i snang ba lus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:10a-27: de ltar yang dag bshad de dag / rab tu dga' la sogs pa'i sa //
T02TD1199E:10a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsa'i rten gyi bye brag bshad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:10a-29: dbang po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yin zer ro //
T02TD1199E:10a-30: phung po lnga sangs rgyas yin pa dang /
T02TD1199E:10a-31: sogs kyis 'byung ba lnga lha mo yin pa gnas de rnams su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' shes pa rtog med 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:10a-32: dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02TD1199E:10a-33: byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis //
T02TD1199E:10a-34: gang tshe 'dir ni yong gang ba //
T02TD1199E:10b-0: lus la tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi phung po nad @10b med cing tshor ba btang snyoms kyi dbang po khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi sbyangs nas /
T02TD1199E:10b-1: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang /
T02TD1199E:10b-2: lhan cig skyes dga' khyab pa'i dus kyi tshe /
T02TD1199E:10b-3: bde ba rtog pa med pa yin pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched lha'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:10b-4: de rang gi lus la zhi gnas kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs pas gzhan du gang na'ang sangs rgyas med kyang mi shes pas sangs rgyas 'dod do //
T02TD1199E:10b-5: sems de'i stong pa nyid ni lus la gnas kyang lus las ma skyes pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:10b-6: kun du brtags pa nub nas rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:10b-7: gzhan gyi dbang nub nga kun du rtog pa thams cad nub pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:10b-8: mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas dngos po kun la khyab cing lus la gnas kyang glong bur gyi rnam par rtog pas ma skyes pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:10b-10: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
T02TD1199E:10b-11: ngo bo nyid la phyin log gi //
T02TD1199E:10b-12: 'bad du zin kyang mi zlogs [*zlog?] shing blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:10b-14: des na rang rig 'od gsal ba las ni phung po lnga'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen byed la glo bur gyi rtog pa phung po lngas ni sems 'od gsal ba'i rkyen mi byed do //
T02TD1199E:10b-15: des na rang rig pa 'od gsal bas ni nyams su myong ba'i rgyu rkyen las skye'i glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa las mi skye'o //
T02TD1199E:10b-16: des na 'bad du zin kyang glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pas mi zlogs [*zlog?] pa de la bde ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:10b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos zhi gnas kyi bde ba'i rten rtsa du mchis zhes zhus pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:10b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa gtso mo brgya nyi shu bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:10b-19: spyi gtsug gi byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa lus thams cad la khyab pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan la /
T02TD1199E:10b-20: rtsa rnams kyang dbyibs kyis mtshon nas ming gi brdar btags pa ni gnyis yin te /
T02TD1199E:10b-21: bde mchog dang sbyar nas gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
T02TD1199E:10b-23: bu ga dgu'i rtsa dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i rten bzhad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:10b-24: dgyes pa rdo rje dang sbyar nas ra sa n'a dang la la n'a dang /
T02TD1199E:10b-25: aawa dh'u t'i gsum gsum ni gtso bo yin la /
T02TD1199E:10b-26: mi phyed pa ni rdo rje bdag med ma yin zhing /
T02TD1199E:11a-0: de la rtsa sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin pas na @11a * //
T02TD1199E:11a-1: rtsa bzhir snang ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:11a-2: gzhan lha mo bco lnga ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis dang ldan pa yin pas na rtsa gnyis gnyis su 'jog pa yin pa 'am yang na rgyu 'bras bu gnyis dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:11a-3: yang na sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor dang sbyar nas /
T02TD1199E:11a-4: rigs drug gi rten he ru ka dang ldan pas na rtsa drug lnga sum cu tham pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:11a-6: la la n'a ni dbus kyi gtso bo he ru ka'i sku gsum dang ldan par ston pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:11a-7: bcom ldan 'das la rtsa de dag gi rang bzhin zhus pa ni /
T02TD1199E:11a-8: srid pa gsum po thams cad kyi lus rtsar snang yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba rtog med skyes pa'i dus su rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa brgyad cu po mtshan mo'i sgras bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:11a-9: 'dzin pa'i rtog pa brgyad cu'i nyin mo'i brdar bstan pa dang bral ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:11a-10: bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni rnam par rtog pa rnams spangs pa la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i ye shes 'dus ma byas pa ste /
T02TD1199E:11a-11: rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:11a-13: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
T02TD1199E:11a-14: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin lus //
T02TD1199E:11a-15: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1199E:11a-17: rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1199E:11a-19: // / de ltar sems snang ba dang bcas pa'i rab tu byed pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:11a-20: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong nyams su blang ba bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:11a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD1199E:11a-22: gsang chen bde ba'i zhi gnas kyi bde ba dang /
T02TD1199E:11a-23: ye shes bla na med pa lhag mthong gi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1199E:11a-24: bla na med pa'i snying po nyams su blang ba'i thabs gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:11a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud thams cad kyi snying po nyams su blang bzhi gnas dang ltag mthong /
T02TD1199E:11a-26: rnam shes dang ye shes kyi sgron ma rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:11a-27: de la dang po gleng gzhi'i don bstan pa ni gsang ba dga' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:11a-29: dgyes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /
T02TD1199E:11a-30: ston pa'i gtso bo bdag nyid dus rtag tu bzhugs so //
T02TD1199E:11a-31: ston pa'i gtso bo gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:11a-32: sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste //
T02TD1199E:11b-0: rigs lnga'i rang @11b bzhin he ru ka / rdo rje sems dpa' longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bde mchog dang /
T02TD1199E:11b-1: chos skus bdud bzhi bcom zhing zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor te ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:11b-2: glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pas mi bskyod pas na brtan zhing mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bar du mi chod pas na rtag pa nyid de spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:11b-3: rtag tu da ltar byung ba dang //
T02TD1199E:11b-4: zhes pa ni myong ba 'ba' zhig dus gsum dang bral bas na der snang ba tsam ste /
T02TD1199E:11b-5: he ni rgyu tshogs spangs pa dang //
T02TD1199E:11b-6: ru ni bkod pa dang bral bas //
T02TD1199E:11b-7: ka ni gang du 'ang mi gnas pas //
T02TD1199E:11b-8: zhes 'byung bas dus gsum gyis stong pas dngos dang rjes thams cad du chos kyi dbyings las mi bzhengs pas na rang bzhin gyis ni 'da' dka' ba'o //
T02TD1199E:11b-9: de ltar sku gsum bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:11b-10: da ni bshad pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:11b-11: sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1199E:11b-12: zhes pa ni thabs lnga dang shes rab lnga mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:11b-13: sna tshogs cho ga 'dod rnams la //
T02TD1199E:11b-16: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang 'dod pa la /
T02TD1199E:11b-17: de lta de ltar ston cing ston pa po sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas gdul bya bzhin du rgyud dgu rdzogs par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:11b-18: de yang khyad par ci lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:11b-19: sangs rgyas kun sogs brtan g-yo zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:11b-20: sangs rgyas kun ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs su snang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:11b-22: zhes pa ni thams cad kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can du snang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:11b-23: de nyid kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:11b-24: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1199E:11b-25: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1199E:11b-26: thabs rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang lus bde ba dang yid bde ba dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rang bzhin brgyad cu gzung ba mtshan mor snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:11b-27: 'dzin pa ni nyin mor snang ba'i rtog pa rnams dang bral bas na /
T02TD1199E:11b-28: bde ba rtog pa med pa yul dang yul can ro gcig pa'i zhi gnas kyi mnyam par sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1199E:11b-29: bde ba sgyu ma lta bu dang stong pa nyid ro gcig pa'i lhag mthong gi mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:11b-30: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02TD1199E:12a-0: zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i dra ba las @12a * //
T02TD1199E:12a-1: byang chub kyi sems sdom pas dbyings dang rlung gi dra ba las sngags kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1199E:12a-2: stong pa nyid dang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin sdom pas sems kyi sdom pa chos kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:12a-3: sdom pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bde mchog la bya'o //
T02TD1199E:12a-4: de ltar tshigs bcad gcig gis zhi gnas dang /
T02TD1199E:12a-5: lhag mthong gi rgyud thabs bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:12a-6: da ni sgyu ma bde ba'i thabs yin par ston te /
T02TD1199E:12a-7: sgyu ma bde ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD1199E:12a-9: sgyu ma de gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:12a-10: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba bde ba'i mchog go //
T02TD1199E:12a-12: thams cad du ni sna tshogs mchog / ces bya ste /
T02TD1199E:12a-13: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas yul thams cad du dngos po bde ba sna tshogs pa gzung 'dzin dang bral bas na mchog ste /
T02TD1199E:12a-15: sems can kun gyi don du'o //
T02TD1199E:12a-19: sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas grub //
T02TD1199E:12a-21: tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas lnga dang /
T02TD1199E:12a-22: dpa' bo thams cad dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas gdul bya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la mos pa la gzugs sdug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:12a-25: ro mngar ba dang reg bya yid du 'ong ba'i bar gyis gdul bya 'dul bar grub po //
T02TD1199E:12a-27: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
T02TD1199E:12a-28: 'di yi byed pa rdo rje sems //
T02TD1199E:12a-31: bskal pa bye ba grangs med snyed //
T02TD1199E:12a-32: sangs rgyas thams cad ma mthong la //
T02TD1199E:12a-33: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba gang dag gis //
T02TD1199E:12a-35: de ni bdag gis bstan par bya //
T02TD1199E:12a-36: sangs rgyas kun dngos bde ba'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:12a-37: da ni las kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig ston te /
T02TD1199E:12a-38: rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes nas //
T02TD1199E:12a-39: zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas chags pa chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur te /
T02TD1199E:12a-40: las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i dbye bas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin shes par byed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:12a-42: ma dang sring mo dang bu mo dang tsha mo ste bzhi dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang bram ze'i rigs dang dmangs rigs te bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:12b-1: nyi shu rtsa bzhi ma ste bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:12b-5: ye shes las skyes ma ste /
T02TD1199E:12b-7: de dag ni bud med kyi sgyu mas grub ces bya ste /
T02TD1199E:12b-8: sgyu mar khyad par med kyang /
T02TD1199E:12b-9: bde ba'i sgyu ma ni sgyu ma rnams kyi mchog yin te /
T02TD1199E:12b-10: des sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya'i brdar btags nas mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:12b-11: ci'i phyir de la mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:12b-12: sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis yod de /
T02TD1199E:12b-13: d'a yi sgra las mkha' 'gro zhes //
T02TD1199E:12b-14: 'dir ni khams la rnam par brtag / ces bya ba'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis de'i aa ka sa ma zhes bya ba'i sgra'i khams kyis sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
T02TD1199E:12b-15: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni zhi gnas rtog med kyi nam mkha' gzugs med pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:12b-16: bsam gtan bzhi rtogs na rgyu bas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:12b-17: yang sa bcu gcig gi chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid rtogs shing rgyu bas mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:12b-18: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i nges tshig bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:12b-19: da ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye ba bshad de /
T02TD1199E:12b-20: kun du sna tshogs phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1199E:12b-21: kun du yid 'ong bde mchog yin //
T02TD1199E:12b-22: zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi lha mo dbang gi lha mo dang /
T02TD1199E:12b-25: de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1199E:12b-26: kun du sna tshogs bde mchog ni //
T02TD1199E:12b-28: dbang bskur ba'i yan lag dang /
T02TD1199E:12b-29: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa dang /
T02TD1199E:12b-31: de yang dbye na du zhe na /
T02TD1199E:12b-32: rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang //
T02TD1199E:12b-34: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs yin la /
T02TD1199E:12b-35: de las byung ba he ru ka'i rigs ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02TD1199E:12b-36: padma ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs yin la /
T02TD1199E:12b-37: padma 'dzin pa ni las kyi rigs yin no //
T02TD1199E:12b-38: nor bu'i rigs ni rin po che'i rigs yin la /
T02TD1199E:12b-39: nor bu 'dzin pa ni rin po che'i rigs yin no //
T02TD1199E:12b-40: de ltar na rigs drug ka'i rang bzhin du 'di rnams snang ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:12b-41: yang na rdo rje padma dang nor bu chos kyi dbyings dang so sor rtog pa dang /
T02TD1199E:12b-42: me long lta bu yin la /
T02TD1199E:12b-43: 'dzin pa gsum ni stong pa nyid gsum dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:12b-44: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:13a-1: zhing yid du 'ong bar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i lha'i grangs dang mnyam par bsags nas bsnyen bsgrub bzhis ji lta ba bzhin du sbyang ba byas pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:13a-2: yang na gdong brnyan gon la lha'i cha byad bzung nas /
T02TD1199E:13a-7: reg bya rdo rje ma rnams la /
T02TD1199E:13a-8: gzugs 'dzin gyi rnam par spangs nas /
T02TD1199E:13a-9: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa zhi gnas kyi sems gzung ngo //
T02TD1199E:13a-11: dbugs dbyung bar ma ro mchog dang //
T02TD1199E:13a-12: dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang //
T02TD1199E:13a-13: rnal 'byor pas dus rtag khyab par //
T02TD1199E:13a-14: rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya //
T02TD1199E:13a-17: lha la dmigs par byed pa dag / rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te //
T02TD1199E:13a-18: rang gi dam tshig dam sbyor ba //
T02TD1199E:13a-20: gzugs brnyan lus la sogs pa las //
T02TD1199E:13a-22: byang chub sems la rab brtson na //
T02TD1199E:13a-24: zhes gsungs pa rgyu rkyen tshogs kyi 'khor lo las bsam gtan dang po lta bu'i bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:13a-25: de ltar zhi gnas kyi thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:13a-26: da ni lhag mthong bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:13a-27: bcom ldan 'das 'khor zil gyis gnon cing rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:13a-28: bde ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13a-29: byang chub sems 'di gsungs zhes bya ba ni don dam byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD1199E:13a-30: de'i rnam pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:13a-31: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
T02TD1199E:13a-32: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02TD1199E:13a-34: stong pa ni kun du brtags pas stong pas kun brtags mtshan nyid med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13a-35: mi stong ni gzhan dbang skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13a-36: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa ni yongs su grub pa don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13a-37: stong pa ma yin pa ni gong bu'i gzugs las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13a-38: mi stong min ni dngos po med pa'i sems nyid yin zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:13a-39: yang na chags dang chags bral ba //
T02TD1199E:13a-40: lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs te //
T02TD1199E:13b-0: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor @13b las //
T02TD1199E:13b-1: chags med chags dang bral ba med //
T02TD1199E:13b-2: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02TD1199E:13b-3: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya //
T02TD1199E:13b-4: 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'ang mchog / ces bshad do //
T02TD1199E:13b-5: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1199E:13b-6: snying rje'i bdag nyid thabs sbyor bas //
T02TD1199E:13b-7: zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T02TD1199E:13b-8: snying rje'i thabs kyis mdzes pa ni //
T02TD1199E:13b-9: zhes bya ba ni bde ba sgyu ma lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13b-10: shes rab pha rol phyin gsal 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:13b-11: zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la dmigs pa ste /
T02TD1199E:13b-12: zung du 'jug pa'i don yin no //
T02TD1199E:13b-13: rnam par mi rtog chos rnams la //
T02TD1199E:13b-14: dngos po med cing bsgom pa med //
T02TD1199E:13b-15: ces bya ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med cing bsgom bya dang sgom byed dang bral bas sems gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13b-17: de las che mchog gzhan med pas //
T02TD1199E:13b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1199E:13b-19: rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des //
T02TD1199E:13b-22: mi rtog lhag par mos par bya //
T02TD1199E:13b-23: rtog pa kun gyis lhag par brtag / ces bya ba ni seng ge'i phru gu lta bu'am /
T02TD1199E:13b-24: zla ba tshes gcig pa lta bu'am /
T02TD1199E:13b-25: skar khung gi gsang lta bur phyogs gcig gi stong pa nyid la mngon sum gyis bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13b-26: de lta bu'i thabs sus mdzad ce na bde bar gshegs pas mngon sum gyi lam 'di /
T02TD1199E:13b-27: rnam par mi rtog chos rnams la //
T02TD1199E:13b-28: sems can don du rab tu brtags //
T02TD1199E:13b-30: phyag rgya bzhi'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:13b-31: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:13b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag mchog / chos can med cing chos nyid med //
T02TD1199E:13b-33: ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1199E:13b-34: chos dang chos can dang chos nyid dang rnam pa gsum med par bde ba chen por ro gcig pa'o //
T02TD1199E:13b-35: de ltar yin na ni ji ltar chos gsung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1199E:13b-36: brag ca sgra dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02TD1199E:13b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba bstan to //
T02TD1199E:14a-0: de ltar sku gsum gyi don shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rgyas par 'grub par @14a * //
T02TD1199E:14a-2: de ltar lhag mthong bshad nas nyams su blang ba'i don bstan pa ni bstod cing phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:14a-3: 'gro ba sgrol byed sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02TD1199E:14a-4: sems can bdag skyes ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sgo nas so //
T02TD1199E:14a-5: rmongs pa gcod byed ni chos kyi sku'i sgo nas so //
T02TD1199E:14a-6: de nyid gcig pu ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i sgo nas so //
T02TD1199E:14a-7: chos kun gcig pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi don no //
T02TD1199E:14a-8: dbang po drug gi lam gyur pa //
T02TD1199E:14a-9: zhes bya ba ni mchan bcas kyi yul lnga la dga' bzhi de dang de'i rang bzhin du 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1199E:14a-10: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rjes kyi rnal 'byor la /
T02TD1199E:14a-11: dngos gzhi bzhin du mnyam par bzhag pa dang ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:14a-12: yang na dbang po gang gi lam sems kyi bde ba chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rgyas btab pas /
T02TD1199E:14a-13: bde ba chen po de dang de'i rang bzhin du 'gro ste /
T02TD1199E:14a-14: mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa gnyis khyad par med pas dngos rjes bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du ro mnyam par bsgom pa dang mi bsgom pa med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:14a-16: gang phyir dngos kun bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1199E:14a-17: rnam shes phung por bstan pa yin //
T02TD1199E:14a-19: dbang bzhi yi ni sems kyi chos nyid shes pas chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:14a-20: de skyes bu blun po tha shal gyis shes par ma nus so //
T02TD1199E:14a-21: thams cad kyis rtogs par mi nus sam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:14a-22: phyogs gzhan 'ga' dang 'ga' gzhan gyi yin te /
T02TD1199E:14a-23: thams cad kyang bde ba chen po 'dod pa la gzhol ba 'ba' zhig go //
T02TD1199E:14a-25: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ste sems rnam par shes pa drug gam brgyad kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1199E:14a-26: khams gsum pa de'i rang bzhin du shes pas grol bar 'dod pa'am /
T02TD1199E:14a-27: sems las byung ba dad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:14a-28: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i sgo nas grol bar 'dod pa'i sems rnam bcas dang rnam med kyi sgo nas /
T02TD1199E:14a-29: shes bya bye brag tu smra ba dang /
T02TD1199E:14a-30: mdo sde pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD1199E:14a-31: rgyu ni rjes su dpag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:14a-32: 'bras bu ni spyod pa dang bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:14a-33: gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi sgo nas so //
T02TD1199E:14a-34: chos can ni don dam sgyu ma lta bu'i sgo nas dang /
T02TD1199E:14b-0: @14b chos nyid ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i sgo nas thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsgom par 'dod pa yang chu bo chen po rnam pa bzhi ru chu bran lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lan tshva'i ror gcig tu gyur ba bzhin du grub pa'i mtha' du ma de dag kyang don dam par bde ba chen po la du ma nyid du mi dmigs pa'i phyir thar pa ni gcig kho na yin no //
T02TD1199E:14b-1: ji ltar gang gis sems kyi stong nyid shes she na /
T02TD1199E:14b-2: kha nang du bltas pa'i tha ma'i lam gyis so //
T02TD1199E:14b-3: rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:14b-5: // / de ltar bde mchog la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor gyi gleng gzhi bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:14b-6: da ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:14b-7: rgyud rnams kun gyis nges pa ste //
T02TD1199E:14b-8: gru gsum shin tu yangs pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1199E:14b-9: zhes bya ba ni phyogs gcig rtogs pas zhi gnas kyi rtogs pa bde ba med pa'am phyogs gcig gi gang zag gi bdag 'gags sam /
T02TD1199E:14b-10: nyan thos sam rang rgyal ba'i bdag med pa'am /
T02TD1199E:14b-11: phyogs gcig gi nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bas byang chub sems dpa'i stong nyid mtha' dag dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi stong nyid ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong yin la /
T02TD1199E:14b-12: kun rdzob tu ae gru gsum gzhal yas khang ngam zla ba'am padma'am /
T02TD1199E:14b-13: btsun mo'i gru gsum bha ga'i gzugs su kun rdzob tu snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su gyur pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:14b-14: don dam par de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD1199E:14b-15: gzung ba'i yul las 'das shing 'dzin pa med pas na srog chags thams cad kyi dbus na bzhugs pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mtshon pa'i thabs kun rdzob ston pa phun sum tshogs par snang ba ste /
T02TD1199E:14b-16: mdor na thabs dang shes rab kyi don rtogs pas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bas na thabs dang shes rab ston pa'i phyir gleng gzhi bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:14b-17: de yang mngon sum du ma rtogs pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du goms pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:14b-18: mngon sum gyi lam gyis tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin pa'am /
T02TD1199E:14b-20: dngos grub bzhi thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:15a-1: bsdus pa bstan nas sems 'od gsal ba yin yang glo bur gyi dri ma 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar 'ching zhing /
T02TD1199E:15a-2: sdug bsngal gyis 'joms par byed cing sems de'i las dge mi dges bcings nas dmigs pa dang ldan pa de srid du slar yang sdig pa sna tshogs pas khams gsum du 'khor zhing skyes bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:15a-3: de ltar dang po'i 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid bshad nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas dpa' bo ni zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'i lam rjes su mthun pa'i stobs ston te ji lta bu zhe na 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:15a-4: dgos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD1199E:15a-5: sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i phyir te /
T02TD1199E:15a-7: sprul pa'i sku byin rlabs kyi lam dang /
T02TD1199E:15a-8: rig pa'i mngon sum gyi lam gyis so //
T02TD1199E:15a-9: thabs kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:15a-10: thabs dang thabs kyi sbyor bas so //
T02TD1199E:15a-11: shes rab ni mtshon byed de la ci zhig rtogs she na /
T02TD1199E:15a-12: khams gsum pa mtshon bya dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:15a-13: gang dang gang gi gnas gyur pas //
T02TD1199E:15a-14: de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:15a-15: dper na bud shing mer 'gyur ba bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa lha'i gar gyi 'khor los phung po dang khams dang skye mched sbyangs te /
T02TD1199E:15a-16: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma mkhan po pham par byas pa bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:15a-17: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sbyar na nyon mongs pa lnga'i gnyen por sangs rgyas lnga bsgom pa'am mi zab pa'i rdzogs rim la rtsa lnga'i rlung la bde ba bsgom pa 'am nyon mongs pa lnga po de nyid kho na stong pa nyid kyis gseng brtol ba'o //
T02TD1199E:15a-18: de ltar re re'i sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:15a-20: rdo rje 'dzin bcas thams cad sbyong //
T02TD1199E:15a-22: 'od gsal bas thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du byed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:15a-23: nyon mongs pa lnga ji ltar sbyong du rung zhe na /
T02TD1199E:15a-24: sems 'od gsal ba brten pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma nam mkha' la sprin sna tshogs byung nas de nyid du thim pa bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:15a-25: nang gi bye brag 'di lta bu gang gis shes she na /
T02TD1199E:15a-26: bla ma'i man ngag la brten pa'o //
T02TD1199E:15b-0: de ltar rjes su mthun pa'i thabs gnyis bstan nas da ni brtag pa'i gleng gzhi @15b bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:15b-1: 'dzam bu'i gling ni gru gsum la btsun mo'i bha ga zhes bya ste /
T02TD1199E:15b-2: ae yi cha byad bzang po yi //
T02TD1199E:15b-3: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1199E:15b-5: gnas 'di'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i gleng gzhis ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bsgom bya ci mtshon zhe na /
T02TD1199E:15b-6: btsun mo yum gyi bha ga gru gsum mtshon pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:15b-7: chags pa'i lam dang sbyar na dkyil 'khor bha ga zhes bya la /
T02TD1199E:15b-8: grol ba'i lam dang sbyar na dkyil 'khor lus yin la /
T02TD1199E:15b-9: rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam pa la dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings yin no //
T02TD1199E:15b-10: de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bde mchog dang sbyar na lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo bcu drug dang aa wa dh'u t'i dang 'brel pa rlung rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:15b-11: g-yas pa ra sa n'a dang 'brel pa bcu drug khrag rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:15b-12: g-yon pa la la n'a dang 'brel pa bcu drug byang chub kyi sems rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:15b-13: dbus ma dang g-yas nas g-yon du 'brel pa sgom bzhi'i rtsa dang /
T02TD1199E:15b-14: g-yas g-yon 'brel pa mtshams ma bzhi'i rtsa dang /
T02TD1199E:15b-16: bdud rtsi bzhi dang drug cu rtsa bzhi rten 'brel gyi gnas lugs yin la de'i dbus na gnas pa'i rlung la sems bzung nas phyi rol gyi rlung 'gags nas shes pa rtog med bskyed nas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du 'gro ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:15b-17: de ltar gleng gzhi'i don gsum bshad nas de yang mos pa'i bye brag gis mu dra bzhi'i snang ba ni 'byung ba bzhi la mos pa la 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba 'am /
T02TD1199E:15b-18: lha mo bzhir mos pa la de ltar snang ba 'am /
T02TD1199E:15b-19: tshad med pa bzhir mos pa la tshad med pa bzhir snang ba 'am /
T02TD1199E:15b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa bzhir mos pa la de ltar du snang ba'am /
T02TD1199E:15b-21: ye shes bzhir mos pa la de ltar du snang ba'am /
T02TD1199E:15b-22: ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhir mos pa la de ltar snang ba ste /
T02TD1199E:15b-23: bdag byin gyis rlob par mos pa la glo bur gyi dri ma bsrabs pas stong pa mthong ba'i rgyu yin no zhes yan lag med pa'i rdo rje 'dod do //
T02TD1199E:15b-24: yang na sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba sprul pa'i sku dang mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes dpal mchog dang po las gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:15b-25: de ltar snang ba med pa'i bye brag bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:16a-1: bye brag bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:16a-2: spyi bo dang lte ba ni ae yin la /
T02TD1199E:16a-3: mgrin pa dang snying ga wam yin te /
T02TD1199E:16a-4: steng 'og gi bye brag gis thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:16a-5: ae wam gyi sgra de las sdud pa po'i gleng gzhi dang sbyar na mdo sde dang mthun pa'i yi ge'i don du bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:16a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas rjes su yi rang zhing bstod do zhes bya ba'i bar du gleng gzhi dang tshig gi mtshams sbyar nas /
T02TD1199E:16a-7: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi bka' nyid du gnas pa yin pas bkar ba sgrub pa de la bshad pa'i rgyud kyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD1199E:16a-8: yang na sprul pa'i skus 'dul ba'i ngor bde bar gshegs pas bshad la sdud pa pos gdul bya'i ngor sangs rgyas nyid du sdud pa por sprul pa'o //
T02TD1199E:16a-9: de gnyis kyi don bshad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gzhan gyi tshe /
T02TD1199E:16a-10: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas gsol ba btab nas bshad pa'i rgyud gsungs kyang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:16a-11: de skad du yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1199E:16a-12: sdud pa po nyid kyis gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:16a-13: de'i don rtogs par dka' ba yang mdo sde gzhan du nga nyid 'chad pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:16a-14: de ltar 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:16a-15: spyan ras gzigs kyis rtogs pa'i chags pa'i lam dus dang /
T02TD1199E:16a-16: sa'i snying pos rtogs pa'i dus ngan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:16a-17: 'jam dpal gyis rtogs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
T02TD1199E:16a-18: de la bzang po ni bha ga'i dkyil 'khor bde ba'i rgyun 'jug pa'i dus so //
T02TD1199E:16a-19: ngan pa ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor rlung me'i drod can gyi srog aa wa dh'u t'ir 'jug pa'i dus so //
T02TD1199E:16a-20: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sgyu ma dang stong pa ro gcig pa'i dus te /
T02TD1199E:16a-21: chags pa ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i dus yin la /
T02TD1199E:16a-22: chags bral ni dga' bral yin la /
T02TD1199E:16a-23: dbu ma ni lhan cig pa'i dga' ba yin te /
T02TD1199E:16a-24: de gsum mi dmigs pa ni bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1199E:16a-25: chags pa dang chags bral 'dres pa ni kun rdzob tu tha dad pa yin yang /
T02TD1199E:16a-26: don dam par ro gcig pa des na dngos dang dngos med ro gcig pa'i don ston pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:16a-27: yon tan drug dang ldan pa'am /
T02TD1199E:16b-0: nyon mongs pa dang @16b shes bya'i sgrib pa bcom pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD1199E:16b-2: sku dang gsung ni chos can yin la de yi chos nyid ni snying po yin no //
T02TD1199E:16b-3: de nyid sgrib pa gnyis kyis mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD1199E:16b-4: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sgras btsun mo zhes grags so //
T02TD1199E:16b-5: de'i bha ga ni mi slob pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1199E:16b-6: kye bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bha ga la rnam par mi rtog par ro gcig pa na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i /
T02TD1199E:16b-7: tha snyad ji ltar rung zhe na /
T02TD1199E:16b-8: lan du bka' stsal pa don dam par stong pa nyid dang ye shes ro gcig pa yin yang gdul bya'i skye bo mos pa'i dbang gis de rnams kyi yid 'phrog pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i gnas padma dang zla ba dang gzhal yas khang dang /
T02TD1199E:16b-10: btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:16b-11: chos kyi rnam grangs kyi rnam pa der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa la bdag gis thos so zhes mtshams sbyor ro //
T02TD1199E:16b-12: de la ci'i phyir bha ga zhes bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:16b-13: nyon mongs pa dag / shes rab stong pa nyid kyis 'joms pas na bha ga ste /
T02TD1199E:16b-14: de nyid snang ba med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gdul bya nams kyis stong pa nyid la gseng brtol ba'i phyir bha ga'i gzugs su sprul cing bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:16b-15: 'di rjod par byed pa'i chos gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:16b-16: gleng gzhi'i don de nyid kyis rjod par byed pa ni ae wam ma y'a zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhi yin la rjod byed des rgyud dgu'i thabs dang shes rab kyi don ston pas na /
T02TD1199E:16b-17: rgyud dgu'i chos kyi thog mar ae wam ma y'a bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:16b-18: dgos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD1199E:16b-19: sangs rgyas dag pa'i dngos grub skyed //
T02TD1199E:16b-21: mdo sde thams cad kyang ae wam ma y'a'i sgra brjod par bya ba yin na lan du lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brjod du med pa'i don /
T02TD1199E:16b-22: nga yis sems can la bstan pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:16b-23: yi ge des phyag rgya bzhi shes rab la thabs bzhugs so zhes bya bar khong du chud pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ring du 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1199E:16b-24: sems de'i chos nyid rtogs pa ltar chos thams cad kyi chos nyid rtogs na ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:16b-26: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T02TD1199E:16b-27: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med par //
T02TD1199E:17a-2: chos thams cad kyi mtshon bya mngon sum du byas nas tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin pa thob bo //
T02TD1199E:17a-3: gang gis sems kyi stong nyid ma shes pa de srid kyi bar du bsam gtan dang /
T02TD1199E:17a-4: gzugs med kyi lha'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:17a-5: gang gi tshe mngon sum gyi lam de las ma yin no zhes spangs na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:17a-6: dpal ldan gang zhig gis mngon sum gyi lam dag pa'i sems kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i shes rab ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du thams cad kyi bsgoms na rang rig pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'i mtshon bya rtogs nas khams gsum pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam par gzigs pa chos kyi sku dang /
T02TD1199E:17a-8: sprul sku'i gzugs yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bus sems can gyi don mdzad pa de yang mngon sum gyi rgyu rkyen dang bral na ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab par mtshon par mi nus so //
T02TD1199E:17a-9: rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1199E:17a-11: // / de ltar le'u dang pos zab pa'i rdzogs rim gyi shes bya bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:17a-12: da ni nyams su blangs pa dbang bskur ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:17a-13: thog mar dkyil 'khor dang bar du tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang tha mar dbang bskur ba'i don bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:17a-14: de ltar sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:17a-15: dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis mdor bstan pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:17a-16: de rgyas par bshad pa ni dang por bdag nyid lha'i dngos por byas la /
T02TD1199E:17a-17: rdo rjes sa sbyang ba'i phyir yi ge h'um las rdo rje 'bar bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:17a-18: de ltar sa sbyang ba dang bslang ba dang brtag pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:17a-19: da ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:17a-20: tshon brtag pa ni 'byor pa'i dbang gis rin po che las byas pa'am /
T02TD1199E:17a-22: tha mas 'bras kyi phye mas tshon rtsi bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:17a-23: chung tshad gru gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD1199E:17a-24: sor gsum gyi mtha' skor lhag pa ni tshon brtag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:17a-25: sgrub pa'i yan lag brtag pa ni sngags kyi lam gyi bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyang ba byas nas dbang bskur ba thob pa'i rigs lnga'am /
T02TD1199E:17a-26: yang na gar mkhan la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor der gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:17a-27: ji ltar sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa brtag pa ni mngon sum gyi lam mam /
T02TD1199E:17b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad @17b kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-1: sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i pho brang na gnas pa bzhin du rnal 'byor pas zlos gar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-2: las kyi phyag rgya la sems gzung bar bya zhing longs spyod du blangs na gdon mi za bar sems can rnams dam tshig nyams par gyur pa'i 'jigs pa thugs la bzhag nas /
T02TD1199E:17b-3: byin rlabs kyi go 'phang dga' ba gsum dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-4: sangs rgyas kyi don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-5: rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba /
T02TD1199E:17b-6: sngags pa'i lam yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du rtogs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:17b-7: de ltar dbang bskur ba'i gnas dang sa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:17b-8: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:17b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-10: rgyal ba nyid las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum du dbang nod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:17b-11: de ltar dgos pa bshad nas de'i rten slob dpon bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:17b-12: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la /
T02TD1199E:17b-13: chags lam grol lam gyi tshogs 'khor dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:17b-15: sgrub pa'i yan lag rnal 'byor ma bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:17b-16: ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'i sngags skyes dbang thob pa'am /
T02TD1199E:17b-17: de med na kun spyod ma la sogs pa'ang rung ste /
T02TD1199E:17b-18: 'di ni bde mchog gi rtsa ba'i rgyud du rnal 'byor 'khyil ma dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-19: khu byug lta bur skad snyan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-20: rdo rje lta bur skad gsal ba rnams la /
T02TD1199E:17b-21: sangs rgyas kyis bstod pas de gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:17b-22: yang na zhing skyes kyi dbye ba ni bram ze mo la sogs pa rnam pa bdun te /
T02TD1199E:17b-23: de la bzo byed pa'i rigs ngan smyig ma mkhan la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni smyig ma mkhan dang lha ma mkhan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:17b-24: sems kyi mtshan nyid ni dam tshig bsrung ba dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-25: lha'i sku'i spyod lam bsgom pa las 'grub pa dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-26: chos kyi de kho na nyid shes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-27: sngags kyi de kho na nyid shes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-28: dbyibs kyi de kho na nyid shes pas ni sgrub pa po'i sdig pa zad par byed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:17b-29: btsan phyug ni ldang ba yang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:18a-0: zo mdog bde ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos @18a * //
T02TD1199E:18a-2: bsam gtan bzhi'i thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1199E:18a-3: mchog gi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:18a-4: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa'i lo tshogs kyi rang bzhin gzugs dang lang tsho la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18a-5: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid gang gis rtogs par byed ce na /
T02TD1199E:18a-6: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02TD1199E:18a-7: chu skyar las ni chu yin te //
T02TD1199E:18a-8: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02TD1199E:18a-9: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams kyis shes //
T02TD1199E:18a-10: zhes gsungs pas de gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas /
T02TD1199E:18a-11: sngags dang rgyud dang de kho na nyid shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18a-12: de la sngags ni bsgom bzlas so //
T02TD1199E:18a-14: de nyid ni ye shes lnga'o //
T02TD1199E:18a-15: gsang chen de ltar sbyangs nas zhes pa ni /
T02TD1199E:18a-16: lus dang ngag gi bya bas sbyangs nas so //
T02TD1199E:18a-19: gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas su //
T02TD1199E:18a-20: rnal 'byor pas ni longs spyod bya //
T02TD1199E:18a-23: de nas khrus bya dri zhim lus //
T02TD1199E:18a-24: ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan //
T02TD1199E:18a-25: sna tshogs gos ni thogs nas kyang //
T02TD1199E:18a-26: me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim //
T02TD1199E:18a-27: gang gis lha dang 'dra ba yi //
T02TD1199E:18a-28: bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs la //
T02TD1199E:18a-29: skal bzang dag ni phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02TD1199E:18a-30: tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtag par bya //
T02TD1199E:18a-32: 'tshe ba thams cad spangs pa'i gnas su bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par dben pa ste /
T02TD1199E:18a-33: yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam //
T02TD1199E:18a-34: skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub //
T02TD1199E:18a-35: der ni dang por gdan bsham ste //
T02TD1199E:18a-37: sna tshogs padmo ras kyis g-yogs //
T02TD1199E:18a-38: de ni thams cad dag pa'i bdag / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:18a-39: g-yogs dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni bsku mnye dang gos rnam pa sna tshogs me dang gsos rnams byed pa la sogs pa'i grogs dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18a-41: lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis //
T02TD1199E:18a-42: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang ma //
T02TD1199E:18a-44: nam mkha'i dbyings ni mtha' klas pa'i //
T02TD1199E:18a-45: lha mo kun dang bde mos pa //
T02TD1199E:18a-46: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1199E:18a-48: de ltar me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas bkur sti bya zhing /
T02TD1199E:18b-0: de ltar bsgrub pa'i slob @18b dpon rig ma dang bcas la rnal 'byor ma gus pa'i sems kyis 'o ma dang zho mar la sogs pa dkar gsum dang /
T02TD1199E:18b-1: 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra la sogs pa mngar gsum dang /
T02TD1199E:18b-2: sha dang chang gi tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD1199E:18b-3: sha yi sbyor ba sha skam dang //
T02TD1199E:18b-4: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dbul bar bya //
T02TD1199E:18b-6: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs nas /
T02TD1199E:18b-7: da ni kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs ba //
T02TD1199E:18b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa stong pa nyid lngas me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang bya ba nan tan dang chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas bstod nas /
T02TD1199E:18b-9: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
