T02TD1199E:18b-10: de la dang po ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD1199E:18b-11: de nyid bla med ye shes 'tshal //
T02TD1199E:18b-12: zhes pa ni ro rdo rje ma las mngon sum gyis stong pa nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-13: rdo rje'i dbang bskur kun mkhyen gyis //
T02TD1199E:18b-14: zhes pa ni ro rdo rje ma las rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma bkrus pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-15: sangs rgyas kun la gsang zhes pa ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid shes par gsang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-16: ji ltar dpal ldan sems des bya ba ni sngon bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas rdo rje chos la dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag la bka' drin stsol cig ces pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-17: khyod zhabs padma spangs nas ni //
T02TD1199E:18b-18: zhes pa sems kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i mngon sum gyis lam spangs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-20: zhes pa ni glo bur gyi rtog pa zad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:18b-21: dbang bzhi pa bdag la stsol cig ces pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-22: de ltar gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD1199E:18b-23: da ni slob dpon snying rje dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1199E:18b-24: slob ma la tshogs kyi dbus su bos nas snying rje bskyed la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-25: de nas sgrub pa'i yan lag dang dbang bskur bar byed pa'i lus la mchod par byed pa ni /
T02TD1199E:18b-27: zhes pas ni bsnyen sgrub bzhis lhar bskyed pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-28: dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing bla re bres pa ni gnas so //
T02TD1199E:18b-29: 'dod yon lnga yis brgyan byas zhes pa ni sngar tshogs 'khor du mchod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:18b-30: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:18b-31: de la gzugs sgra dri ro dang //
T02TD1199E:18b-32: reg bya bde bar myong ba yi //
T02TD1199E:18b-33: gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs //
T02TD1199E:18b-34: sgra ni glu yin zhes bshad do //
T02TD1199E:18b-35: dri ni rab tu tshim byed de //
T02TD1199E:18b-36: ro ni ra sa ya na yin //
T02TD1199E:19a-0: @19a * // reg bya bde ba yin par bshad //
T02TD1199E:19a-1: rab tu reg pa dag pa'i bde //
T02TD1199E:19a-2: chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad //
T02TD1199E:19a-4: me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su dri'i thig le dang bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:19a-5: phreng dang shin tu dri zhim sogs //
T02TD1199E:19a-6: zhes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim par bya ste kha so rtsis bkang la glu snyan pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:19a-7: dkyil 'khor dam pa rmad byung mchog / ces pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:19a-8: de ltar mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD1199E:19a-9: phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba las /
T02TD1199E:19a-10: byang chub kyi sems rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems padma'i snod du bzhag nas /
T02TD1199E:19a-12: gdugs la sogs pa'i gzugs dang /
T02TD1199E:19a-14: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra dang /
T02TD1199E:19a-16: tsandan dang bcas pa'i dri dang /
T02TD1199E:19a-17: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:19a-18: bdud rtsi lnga'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:19a-19: de yang slob dpon nam shes rab 'ba' zhig gi yin nam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:19a-20: slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1199E:19a-21: phyag rgyar bcas zhes smos so //
T02TD1199E:19a-22: rin chen mchog gis dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1199E:19a-23: zhes bya ba ni ro rdo rje ma la sems gzung ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni dngos grub rnyed pas na rin chen mchog ces gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:19a-24: des 'gro ba'i gtso bo byang chub sems dpar dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1199E:19a-26: bha ga ling+ga ae ma bde //
T02TD1199E:19a-28: kha tv'am ga ni ling+ga ste //
T02TD1199E:19a-29: sangs rgyas phyag rgya padmor bshad //
T02TD1199E:19a-30: bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin //
T02TD1199E:19a-31: rnam pa kun mkhyen shes bya'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:19a-32: dbang bskur thams cad dbang bskur che //
T02TD1199E:19a-34: lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas //
T02TD1199E:19a-35: srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtse //
T02TD1199E:19a-36: zhim pa'i btung ba nyid myangs na //
T02TD1199E:19a-37: rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob //
T02TD1199E:19a-39: de nas rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1199E:19a-40: mtshan nyid dag pa nyams dga' sbyin //
T02TD1199E:19a-41: zhes bya ba ni slob ma la bshad pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T02TD1199E:19a-42: bdud rtsi lnga'i ro la bde ba rtog pa med pa bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:19a-44: tshogs kyi dbang du byas na /
T02TD1199E:19b-0: ngas ji ltar dbang bskur ba @19b bzhin du khyed kyang bdud rtsi lnga'i ro la longs spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1199E:19b-1: khrag chen po ni rang byung gi me tog go //
T02TD1199E:19b-2: ga bur bcas ni byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-3: tsandan dmar ni rta mchog go //
T02TD1199E:19b-4: rdo rje chu ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-5: lnga pa rnam snang ni sems me long lta bu las byung bar bshad bas de'i shugs kyis lhag ma bzhi'i ye shes las byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-6: rgyu de'i phyir ye shes lnga dang /
T02TD1199E:19b-7: 'bras bu bdud rtsi lngar snang ba ni /
T02TD1199E:19b-8: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthun par gsungs //
T02TD1199E:19b-10: dam tshig 'di ni bla na med //
T02TD1199E:19b-11: ces bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du bskyed pa'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1199E:19b-12: bzang po khyod kyis bskyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba byin pa ste /
T02TD1199E:19b-13: zhi ba'i btung ba gtsang sbra ston pa'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-15: dam tshig ni srog chags gnod par mi bya ste /
T02TD1199E:19b-16: lce'i rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu rtog pa med pa la gnod par mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-17: dam tshig 'di ni bla na med //
T02TD1199E:19b-18: ces pa ni ro rdo rje ma'i stong pa nyid mi 'dor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-19: de dag gi don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:19b-20: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon gyis /
T02TD1199E:19b-21: gtum mo'i drod kyis phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pa la byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres nas thod pa'i nang du bzhag la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas pas srin lag dang /
T02TD1199E:19b-22: mthe bos ro rdo rje ma myong zhing /
T02TD1199E:19b-23: klang rgyas kyis go ro tsa na 'dzag pa'i man ngag dbang bskur bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1199E:19b-24: rin chen mchog gi dbang bskur gyi //
T02TD1199E:19b-25: 'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1199E:19b-27: de'i rjes la khyod kyis kyang zhim pa'i btung ba'i rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:19b-28: thabs dang shes rab mi 'dor ba'i dam tshig sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-29: khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin na sngar bshad pa'i rig ma sngags las skyes ma dang /
T02TD1199E:19b-30: ye shes las skyes ma dang /
T02TD1199E:19b-31: las las skyes ma rigs dang mthun pa'am rang gi rigs las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba mthun pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:19b-32: de ltar grol ba'i lam dang chags pa'i lam thun mong gi dbang bskur ba bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:20a-1: pa'i rig ma zhes bya ba ni sngags skyes dang /
T02TD1199E:20a-3: las skyes dang ye shes las skyes pa rnams so //
T02TD1199E:20a-4: yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:20a-5: sihla ga pur gyis bsgos nas zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi gnas su dri'i thig le byas la me tog bkod cing cod pan dang rgyan btags nas sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa'i lha mor sprul par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:20a-6: yang na rig ma ni de'i sprul pa bya ste zhes bya ba ni bsnyen sgrub bzhi yis sbyangs nas rig ma de'i dri ma med par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1199E:20a-7: phyag rgya dang thabs kyi gdong dgab pa ni ngo tsha'i 'jigs pa dang bcas na rtog med kyi ye shes mi skye bas na gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:20a-8: bag tsha ba med na g-yogs par mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:20a-9: ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa //
T02TD1199E:20a-10: de srid bar du bsten par bya //
T02TD1199E:20a-12: 'khor lo bzhi byang chub kyi sems kyis bkang nas /
T02TD1199E:20a-13: gsang ba'i rdo rje nor bu'i mtshams su byang chub kyi sems gzung la slob ma'i lce la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:20a-14: de skad du yang gdan bzhi las /
T02TD1199E:20a-15: ro dang lce yi rnam shes rtag spangs nas //
T02TD1199E:20a-16: bde mchog 'gyur ba mngon du khyim gyi gnas //
T02TD1199E:20a-17: su ni dbus su gnas pa gzung bar bya //
T02TD1199E:20a-20: bde ba phyag rgya la bab nas //
T02TD1199E:20a-21: bud med dag kyang bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1199E:20a-22: rdo rje nor bu'i mtshams bzung nas //
T02TD1199E:20a-23: slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya //
T02TD1199E:20a-25: de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:20a-26: da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:20a-27: de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro //
T02TD1199E:20a-28: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyongs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rgya slob ma la byin nas aa wa dh'u t'i kha sbyar la bde bar rnal 'byor ma'i stobs kyis bskyed pa la slob dpon gyis dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba lus bde ba dang /
T02TD1199E:20a-29: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yid bde ba rtog pa med pa slob ma'i spyod yul dag tu bya'o //
T02TD1199E:20a-30: bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin spangs shing //
T02TD1199E:20a-31: zhes bya ba ni bud med dang skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa nub pa'o //
T02TD1199E:20a-32: rang rig pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni /
T02TD1199E:20a-33: bde ba mi rtog pa mngon sum gyis shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-0: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / ces pa ni reg bya'i @20b dngos po dang reg bya'i stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i mchog ste /
T02TD1199E:20b-1: yul gyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam snang gis rgyas btab pas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-2: de nyid rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa dang bral bas na rdul bral lo //
T02TD1199E:20b-5: 'dod chags dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang /
T02TD1199E:20b-6: chags bral dga' ba dang dga' bral te /
T02TD1199E:20b-7: de gnyis stong pa nyid du ro gcig pas na 'dres pa'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-8: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres //
T02TD1199E:20b-9: zhes pa ni lus shes pa'i shes pa sgyu ma lta bu dang reg bya stong pa nyid du 'dres pa'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-10: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog / ces pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i lhan cig skyes dga'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-11: de nyid mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyis mi gnod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-12: dam pa ste zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang ldan pa'i stong pa'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-13: de nyid kyis ni thams cad mkhyen //
T02TD1199E:20b-14: zhes pa ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid shes na chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:20b-15: sangs rgyas ye shes dang dpal he ru ka'i ye shes ni ming gi rnam grangs so //
T02TD1199E:20b-16: 'di dang de dang gzhan yang rung //
T02TD1199E:20b-17: zhes pa ni rjes las byung ba'i bde ba stong pa shes pa'i rgyun no //
T02TD1199E:20b-18: dngos po ni snang ba'i dngos po'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-19: dngos med ni mi snang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-20: 'di las byung zhes shes rab ye shes kyi stong nyid shes pa las 'di dag thams cad byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-21: de skad du yang mkha' 'gro las /
T02TD1199E:20b-22: klung ni dbang bar gyur pa las //
T02TD1199E:20b-23: nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar //
T02TD1199E:20b-24: de bzhin stong gsal rang bzhin las //
T02TD1199E:20b-27: dang po gsang ba'i dbang bskur nas /
T02TD1199E:20b-28: gnyis pa slob ma la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:20b-30: slob dpon ji ltar zlos gang las //
T02TD1199E:20b-31: slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin //
T02TD1199E:20b-32: slob ma dag dang deng phyin cad //
T02TD1199E:20b-33: phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes gzung nas //
T02TD1199E:20b-34: rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du //
T02TD1199E:20b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la bsgrubs //
T02TD1199E:20b-37: de yang chags pa'i lam shes pa'i rig pa skye ba'i dbang du byas nas dpa' bo lus bde ba ni dga' ba yin la lus ni dga' ba 'phel nas /
T02TD1199E:20b-38: rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag par snang ba ni mchog dga' yin no //
T02TD1199E:21a-0: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtog @21a * //
T02TD1199E:21a-1: pa med pa'i yul ma lus pa bde bar 'gyur ba ni lhan cig skyes dga' yid bde ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:21a-2: bde ba'i thabs kyi ma lus nyid //
T02TD1199E:21a-4: de'i tshe tshor ba sdug bsngal dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-6: yul chos ci snang ba thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin du ma lus par rig par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:21a-7: grol ba'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas spyi gtsug tu phyin pa ni dga' ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:21a-8: lkog mar phyin pa ni mchog dga' yin la /
T02TD1199E:21a-9: snying gar phyin pa ni khyad par gyi dga' ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:21a-10: bzhi pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:21a-11: de ltar dga' ba bzhi'i rim pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:21a-12: dbang bzhi'i go rims bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:21a-13: nub dang po rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-14: nub gnyis pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-15: nub gsum pa bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-16: nub bzhi pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba bzhi pa bya ste /
T02TD1199E:21a-17: ji ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dus su /
T02TD1199E:21a-18: yul gyi stong pa de bzhin du /
T02TD1199E:21a-19: sems kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i dbang bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1199E:21a-20: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:21a-21: lha yi bde ba chen po kun //
T02TD1199E:21a-22: thabs dang rnal 'byor bde bas myong //
T02TD1199E:21a-23: sems kyi bde ba thams cad kyi //
T02TD1199E:21a-24: dbang bskur bde ba las byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:21a-26: byang chub sems kyis bkrus nas su //
T02TD1199E:21a-28: dbang bzhi pa'i rim pa kun rdzob dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-29: don dam byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD1199E:21a-30: slob ma'i sdig dang bral byas te //
T02TD1199E:21a-31: zhes pa ni chu'i dbang bskur bas lus kyi sgrib pa 'dag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-32: gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas ngag gi sgrib pa 'dag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-33: shes rab ye shes kyis dbang bskur bas /
T02TD1199E:21a-34: sems kyi gzung ba'i dri ma 'dag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:21a-35: dbang bzhi pas sems kyi 'dzin pa'i dri ma 'dag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:21a-36: de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa ni /
T02TD1199E:21a-37: sangs rgyas grong mchog spyan snga ru //
T02TD1199E:21a-40: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan snga ru'o //
T02TD1199E:21a-41: de la rjes su gnang ba'i tshig ni byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa bzhed nas /
T02TD1199E:21a-42: da ni sems can don rab kyi //
T02TD1199E:21a-43: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:21a-44: de ltar gnang ba byin nas /
T02TD1199E:21a-45: dbang bskur ba dang gnang ba nod pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02TD1199E:21b-0: 'jam pa'i @21b tshig gis dbugs dbyung ba brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:21b-1: de ring gson pa 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1199E:21b-3: rdzogs pa nyid du bdag gyur to //
T02TD1199E:21b-4: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:21b-5: de nas yon dbul ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:21b-6: rab tu mgu bas mig gdangs te //
T02TD1199E:21b-8: de dang de ni nges par dbul //
T02TD1199E:21b-9: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mdor bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:21b-11: bla ma thugs rje bdag gis kyang //
T02TD1199E:21b-12: zhes pa ni slob ma la phan par bzhed pa'i sems so //
T02TD1199E:21b-13: 'dzin pa med pa yis ni rang gi mngon sum gyi lam nyams su myong nas slob ma'i zhan pa sbyang ba'i phyir mngon sum gyi lam ston pa yin te dbul ba'i lam yin no //
T02TD1199E:21b-14: de nas de la tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod cing /
T02TD1199E:21b-15: gser ni stong phrag brgyar gnas kyang //
T02TD1199E:21b-17: khyed la bdag ni 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1199E:21b-18: zhes bya bas ni rab tu yon dbul ba ston to //
T02TD1199E:21b-19: mngon par 'dod pa rnyed nas su //
T02TD1199E:21b-20: 'di ltar yang yang mkhyen par gsol //
T02TD1199E:21b-21: zhes pa ni bdag gi lus dbul ba mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnyed kyi bar du rim gyis brjod par mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02TD1199E:21b-23: di ring sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1199E:21b-25: de nyid du ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD1199E:21b-26: zhes pa'i bar gyis bdag gis mngon sum gyis lam mthong nas gzhan la yang bstan par bya'o zhes slob mas tshig tu brjod pa'i sgo nas dam 'char gzhug go //
T02TD1199E:21b-27: las kyi phyag rgya 'ba' zhig gi sgo nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ram zhe na /
T02TD1199E:21b-28: slob ma'i mos pa shes byas te //
T02TD1199E:21b-30: chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang /
T02TD1199E:21b-31: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rlung me'i drod can las /
T02TD1199E:21b-32: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin rim gyis bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:21b-33: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:21b-34: dbang bskur cho ga bzhin byin nas //
T02TD1199E:21b-35: zab cing rgya che la mos na //
T02TD1199E:21b-36: zhes bya ba ni reg bya rdo rje ma las dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bzhin du bde ba stong pa nyid zab pa'i sems dang /
T02TD1199E:21b-37: dga' ba'i rnam pa gsum rgya che ba'i rang bzhin rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid la mos pa slob dpon gyis mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyi tshig gis nyams su myong ba bde ba stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:21b-38: kha cig tshig dbang rin po che //
T02TD1199E:21b-40: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T02TD1199E:22a-1: myong ba'i don gtan la phab pa yin pas /
T02TD1199E:22a-2: de yang mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:22a-3: dbang bskur mchog ni ma lus thob nas su //
T02TD1199E:22a-4: zhes bya ba ni phan yon 'bras bu rtogs pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:22a-6: ma lus ni dbang gsum thob nas so //
T02TD1199E:22a-7: rnyed dka' ni rjes su dpag dka'i lam gyis mi rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-8: mtshungs med ni yul gyi stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1199E:22a-9: rdo rje brdungs byas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-10: dpal gyis zin cing zhes bya ba ni rang don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-11: longs spyod zhing du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-12: byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD1199E:22a-13: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes so //
T02TD1199E:22a-14: gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni rjes gnang thob pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-15: 'jig rten sdig gi dgra las rgyal //
T02TD1199E:22a-16: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-17: blo ldan ni rten gyi gang zag go //
T02TD1199E:22a-18: go bgos rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-19: byang chub la dmigs sems ni rab rgyas gsal //
T02TD1199E:22a-20: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-21: dri med rnams la 'byor pa ni //
T02TD1199E:22a-22: 'dir rgyu zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku 'thob pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-23: le'u gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:22a-25: // / de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:22a-26: da ni dbang bzhi pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:22a-27: gzhan don la zhugs brtson 'grus can //
T02TD1199E:22a-28: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon sems kyi stong par 'dod do //
T02TD1199E:22a-29: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir ni slob ma bzhi pa thob par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-30: shes rab thabs kyi don bsgom pa //
T02TD1199E:22a-31: zhes pa ni shes rab ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1199E:22a-32: thabs ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa rang rig pa'i mngon sum mo //
T02TD1199E:22a-33: bsgom ni mngon sum du grub pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22a-35: da ni de'i rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:22a-36: gang zhig bsgom pas 'khor ba yi //
T02TD1199E:22a-37: rgal dka'i rgya mtshor mi gnas shing //
T02TD1199E:22a-38: rnal 'byor pa ni rang don tsam //
T02TD1199E:22a-39: bsgoms bas mya ngan las 'das la //
T02TD1199E:22a-40: zhes pa ni nyan thos gang zhig gang zag gi bdag med pa bsgom pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi gnas shing /
T02TD1199E:22a-41: theg pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1199E:22a-42: rang gi don tsam bsgoms pas /
T02TD1199E:22a-43: phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das pa thob po //
T02TD1199E:22a-44: byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1199E:22b-0: @22b shes rab kyis srid pa la mi gnas shing /
T02TD1199E:22b-1: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
T02TD1199E:22b-2: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:22b-3: gang zhig rab kyi mthar thug pas //
T02TD1199E:22b-4: dri med sangs rgyas snod du 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:22b-6: sa bcu gcig pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dri ma dang bral ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i stong pa ro gcig pa'i rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:22b-7: ci'i phyir rmad du byung zhe na /
T02TD1199E:22b-8: gnyen po 'phel ba dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:22b-9: 'o na sangs rgyas su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:22b-10: sgyu ma lta bu'i ngor bla med byang chub skye zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:22b-11: de ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par gnas pa dang 'phel 'gri ba [*'grib?] dang bral bar bstan cing /
T02TD1199E:22b-13: spang bya dang bral bar bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:22b-14: phung po lnga la sogs chos dang //
T02TD1199E:22b-15: theg pa gsum po dor mi bya //
T02TD1199E:22b-17: ma dag pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa dor bar mi bya zhing /
T02TD1199E:22b-18: de'i gnyen po theg pa gsum po yang dor bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:22b-20: chos dbyings mnyam pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:22b-21: mnyam pa gnyen po dag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:22b-22: mi mnyam pa phung po la sogs pa dag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:22b-23: de gnyis ka yang chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:22b-24: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:22b-25: chu shing lta bu zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:22b-26: dag pa dang ma dag pa gnyis ka med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:22b-27: gang la ji ltar gzung bar bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:22b-28: rang gi sems la de ltar gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:22b-29: de ltar spang bya dang gnyen po mnyam par bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:22b-30: da ni stong pa dang mi stong pa mnyam par bstan pa'i phyir stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig tu yang mi bsgom mo //
T02TD1199E:22b-31: mi stong pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig tu yang mi bsgom la /
T02TD1199E:22b-32: de ni blang ba dang dor ba mnyam pa nyid du ston pa ni stong pa nyid spang bar mi bya ste zhes pa chos can med pas chos nyid 'ba' zhig dor bar yang mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:22b-33: mi stong pa dor ram zhe na /
T02TD1199E:22b-34: dngos po'i chos mi stong ba yang dor ro //
T02TD1199E:22b-35: stong pa dang mi stong ba blang ba dang dor bar gzung ba las nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:22b-36: tha mal min pa'i rnam rtog skyes //
T02TD1199E:22b-38: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i rnam rtog du ma skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:22b-39: dbu ma rab tu mi gnas pa bzhin du de gnyis ka btang na nyes pa ci yod ce na /
T02TD1199E:22b-40: btang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1199E:22b-41: des na de gnyis spang bar bya //
T02TD1199E:23a-1: dor ba gnyis spang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-2: de'i 'bras bu ci yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:23a-3: 'dzin pa gnyis ni yongs btang ba //
T02TD1199E:23a-4: rnam par dag cing grol ba'i gnas //
T02TD1199E:23a-6: sgrib pa gnyis rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba'i stong pa nyid kyi grol ba'i gnas so //
T02TD1199E:23a-7: de ni dag pa dang ma dag pa'i mtha' las grol bar bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:23a-8: bdag ces bya ba rtog pa ste //
T02TD1199E:23a-9: des na de yang gtang bar bya //
T02TD1199E:23a-11: bdag dag go bdag ma dag go zhes gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-13: 'gyur ba med ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:23a-14: chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:23a-15: dri ma dang bral ba med pas na 'gyur ba med cing rang nyid la dri mas gos pa'i dogs pa yang med do //
T02TD1199E:23a-17: dag pa'i gnas la 'dun pa med //
T02TD1199E:23a-19: ma dag pa med pas na dag pa la 'dod pa mi skye'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-20: da ni thog ma dang tha ma'i mtha' dang bral ba ston te /
T02TD1199E:23a-21: dang po ni 'khor ba'i thog ma'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-22: tha ma ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-23: mtha' de gnyis nam mkha' dang bral ba grol ba nam mkha' lta bu rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-24: da ni yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i snying rje can gyis sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste /
T02TD1199E:23a-25: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ji bzhin du sems can yang yod ce 'am /
T02TD1199E:23a-26: med ces sgro btags pa dang dbang bskur ba'i gdams ngag sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:23a-27: sgyu ma dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:23a-28: de ltar spros pa bzhi 'am bcu drug dang bral bas na sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin la shes rab ces grags so //
T02TD1199E:23a-29: de ltar shes rab kyi rang bzhin bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:23a-30: da ni thabs kyi rang bzhin bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:23a-31: yid bzhin nor ltar sems can don //
T02TD1199E:23a-33: sems rang rig pa 'od gsal ba la sems can ci ltar mos pa ltar snang bas na sems can don no //
T02TD1199E:23a-34: ma lus byed pa'i snying rje che //
T02TD1199E:23a-35: zhes bya ba ni snod dang bcud ma lus pa sems 'od gsal ba'i snang ba yin pas na ma lus byed ces bya'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-36: de nyid sgyu ma sdug bsngal dang bral bas na snying rje'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-37: de yang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pas na dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'o //
T02TD1199E:23a-38: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul du gyur bas na /
T02TD1199E:23b-0: @23b dmigs pa med pa'i gnas zhes grags //
T02TD1199E:23b-2: de ltar thabs kyi rang bzhin bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:23b-3: da ni zung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:23b-4: de ltar yang bsgom pa gsum las sgom pa dang po ni mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:23b-5: zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-6: mngon sum gyi lam gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-7: yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-8: glo bur gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-9: glo bur dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1199E:23b-10: de la zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni blo dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:23b-11: blo dang rig pa dang shes rab rig pa gnyis ro gcig pa'o //
T02TD1199E:23b-12: dpe ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:23b-13: ji ltar mkha' dang mkha' nyid bzhin //
T02TD1199E:23b-15: nam mkha' dang mkha' nyid las khyad par gzhan spangs pa dang ma spangs pa las ma gtogs pa dngos po la skra'i rtsa mo'i tshad tsam yang med do //
T02TD1199E:23b-16: dbye ba med na ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02TD1199E:23b-17: sgom pa po yang rang rig pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:23b-18: bsgom par bya ba yang rang rig pa yin zhing /
T02TD1199E:23b-19: bsgom pa yang rang rig pa'i chos nyid yin pas /
T02TD1199E:23b-20: lta ba po lta sbyin dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-21: lta ba mig lta bar bya ba'i gzugs lta bu ni med de /
T02TD1199E:23b-22: de bas na tha mi dad pa'i shes pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i bsgom pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD1199E:23b-23: da ni bya ba dang byed pa zung du 'jug pa ston te /
T02TD1199E:23b-24: nyan thos kyi bya ba dang byed pa po dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-25: mu stegs kyi bza' bar bya ba dang za ba po las grol ba ni don dam par rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:23b-26: da ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed med pa ston te /
T02TD1199E:23b-27: gcig dang du ma med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis sgrub par byed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-28: bsgrub par bya ba cung zad kyang med de rang rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:23b-29: da ni blang dor med pa ston te /
T02TD1199E:23b-30: blang dor med pas spang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-31: rang rig yin pas blang bar bya ba med do //
T02TD1199E:23b-32: de yang ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:23b-33: bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i thabs kyis shes te rang gi sems yin la byin gyis rlob pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par skye ba'o //
T02TD1199E:23b-34: de yang gang gis she na /
T02TD1199E:23b-36: gzugs la dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-37: sgra las gra brnyan lta bu dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-38: dri la sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02TD1199E:23b-39: ro la mig yor gyi grong khyer lta bu ste /
T02TD1199E:23b-40: mig yor de la seng ge zla ba'i grong khyer zhes grag go //
T02TD1199E:23b-41: reg bya ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
T02TD1199E:24a-0: gzugs kyis stong pa nas reg bya'i bar du yul gyis stong pa ni @24a * //
T02TD1199E:24a-1: dbang po'i mngon sum gyis shes te /
T02TD1199E:24a-2: shes pa thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis shes so //
T02TD1199E:24a-3: de ltar na 'gro ba thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ma gtogs pa rnam par gnas pa cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med do //
T02TD1199E:24a-4: da ltar zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:24a-5: da ni mngon sum du lam gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:24a-6: ji ltar gzhon nu ma yi ni //
T02TD1199E:24a-7: dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa las //
T02TD1199E:24a-8: skyes pa'i rang bzhin ji bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:24a-9: zhes bya ba'i lus kyi bde ba mngon sum du skyes par gyur pa la rtsod pa med pa de bzhin du rang rig pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bha gar rtog pa med pa'i shes pa gzhan las skyes pa'i ye shes ni dbang bzhi pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:24a-10: cung zad skyes pa'i ye shes zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
T02TD1199E:24a-11: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
T02TD1199E:24a-12: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid stong pa cung zad tsam zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:24a-13: glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral na ji ltar rang gi sems nyid mthong zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24a-14: thog ma ni dga' dang mchog dga'o //
T02TD1199E:24a-15: dbus ni lhan cig skyes pa ste //
T02TD1199E:24a-16: de rnams las 'das pa'i 'od gsal ba ni rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD1199E:24a-17: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom //
T02TD1199E:24a-19: mngon sum yin na ji ltar dran pa yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24a-20: rang gis rig pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD1199E:24a-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa dang khyad par med par dran pa zhes ming du btags so //
T02TD1199E:24a-22: tshu rol mthong ba ni tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas na brjod par nus pa ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1199E:24a-23: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams las skyes pa'i shes pa ni ji ltar 'od gsal bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24a-26: reg bya la reg pa'i khyad par dang /
T02TD1199E:24a-27: lus kyi g-yo 'gul gyis dge ba dang mi dge ba byed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:24a-28: ngag gi sgo nas smra ba dang /
T02TD1199E:24a-29: dgod pa la sogs pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba brjod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:24a-30: lus kyi sgo nas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa la /
T02TD1199E:24a-31: bde ba chen po'i sems ma gtogs pa gzhan rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i glo bur gyi sems kyis mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:24a-32: snod dang bcud thams cad bde ba chen pos rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya ba yin gyi /
T02TD1199E:24a-33: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:24b-0: de ji ltar bsgom par @24b 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24b-1: de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:24b-2: rgyun du mos pa'i rnal 'byor skye //
T02TD1199E:24b-4: rang rig pas stong pa nyid mthong ba'i mngon sum la /
T02TD1199E:24b-5: bar du rnam par rtog pa'i bgegs med par byas nas rgyun bsring ba'i sgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:24b-6: de skad du yang don dam snying po las kyang /
T02TD1199E:24b-7: mngon sum shes pa rgyun bsrings pa //
T02TD1199E:24b-8: sgom pa zhes su de la bshad //
T02TD1199E:24b-11: dngos po ngo bo med pa yis //
T02TD1199E:24b-12: sgom pa dag ni mtshon bya ba //
T02TD1199E:24b-13: gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1199E:24b-14: sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste //
T02TD1199E:24b-15: sems kyi de kho na nyid kyis //
T02TD1199E:24b-18: de'i mngon sum grangs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24b-19: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02TD1199E:24b-20: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1199E:24b-21: rdo rje dang sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD1199E:24b-22: byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
T02TD1199E:24b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ces bya'o //
T02TD1199E:24b-24: mngon sum bsgom pa'i man ngag gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24b-25: mnyam pa'i sems byed ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:24b-26: nges pa'i shes pa mngon sum gyis zlos gar byed pa ni aa sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1199E:24b-27: dbang bzhi pa'i man ngag yin no //
T02TD1199E:24b-28: de ltar mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:24b-29: da ni yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste ;
T02TD1199E:24b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgom pa mchog / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1199E:24b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsgom pa'i chos kyi dbyings mngon sum gyi mchog go //
T02TD1199E:24b-32: ji ltar mchog yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24b-33: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang //
T02TD1199E:24b-34: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs //
T02TD1199E:24b-35: sogs pa'i sgras tshangs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:24b-36: brgya byin la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02TD1199E:24b-37: brtan pa snod dang g-yo ba bcud kyi 'jig rten 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sems kyi stong nyid de shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:24b-38: de bsgoms pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24b-39: dngos dang dngos med bral ba yin //
T02TD1199E:24b-40: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis las myur ba bstan to //
T02TD1199E:24b-41: dngos po dang dngos med ni sgyu ma dang stong pa'o //
T02TD1199E:24b-42: de ro gcig pa ni de las grol ba'o //
T02TD1199E:24b-43: myur ba las byung ba gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:24b-44: kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs nas //
T02TD1199E:24b-45: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ston la /
T02TD1199E:25a-0: tshigs bcad phyed 'og mas ye shes phun sum tshogs pa skye ba ston @25a * //
T02TD1199E:25a-2: / de ltar yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:25a-3: glo bur gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:25a-4: rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ni //
T02TD1199E:25a-6: ma rig pa'i 'khrul pa bag chags so //
T02TD1199E:25a-7: ye shes glog ni zil gyis mnan //
T02TD1199E:25a-8: zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i 'khrul pa'i nang du res 'ga' sgyu ma dang gzugs brnyan lta bu shes pa glog lta bu skye yang bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rmongs pa zil gyis mnan nas /
T02TD1199E:25a-9: stong pa nyid la sems 'dren mi nus so //
T02TD1199E:25a-10: stong pa nyid de la nges par ma skyes pas na khams gsum 'khor ba yin te /
T02TD1199E:25a-11: ma rig pa'i khams gsum 'khor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:25a-12: des na 'dod chags la sogs pas bsgos pa'i sems 'di ni spang bar dka' bas na /
T02TD1199E:25a-13: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis 'khor ba yin par gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:25a-14: glo bur gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:25a-15: dri ma dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:25a-16: chags pa la sogs pa'i dri ma mngon sum gyi lam gyis bcom nas rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa las grol ba'o //
T02TD1199E:25a-17: 'od gsal ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems can mchog 'di ni rgyu dbang bzhi pa 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:25a-18: de ltar zung du 'jug pa bshad nas ;
T02TD1199E:25a-20: des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1199E:25a-21: 'di las gzhan pa'i lam thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pas /
T02TD1199E:25a-22: des bde ba'i lam du 'gyur ba ni med do //
T02TD1199E:25a-23: de nas sangs rgyas kyi bde ba mtha' yas pa thams cad don du gnyer ba rnams zhi gnas kyi bde ba mngon sum du byed cing lhag mthong gi bde ba mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyu ni 'di las thabs gzhan ci yang med de zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:25a-24: de ltar zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:25a-25: da ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i zung 'jug bstan te /
T02TD1199E:25a-26: de la sbyor ba gdams ngag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:25a-27: sdug bsngal ma lus pa'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'dod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:25a-28: sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thob par 'dod bas sems kyi rang bzhin yod pa dang med pa brtags nas chu'i zla ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:25b-0: ji srid du rnam par rtog pa'i ling tog pa'i kun 'byung ba dang @25b bcas pa de srid du 'bras bu sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dang ldan par 'gyur la /
T02TD1199E:25b-1: nam zhig sems kyi stong nyid shes nas rnam par rtog pa spangs pa de'i tshe 'phags pa rnams dgyes pa'i bde ba rtog pa med pa skye zhing /
T02TD1199E:25b-2: rtog pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa zad par byas nas rang nyid kyi sems kyi stong nyid mthong nas chos thams cad kyi stong nyid kyang rgyas shing gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:25b-3: de skad du yang gdan bzhi las //
T02TD1199E:25b-4: mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1199E:25b-5: mtshon bya thams cad rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:25b-7: de ltar sbyor ba gdams ngag gi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:25b-8: da ni dngos gzhi bsgom pa'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:25b-9: de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:25b-10: rnal 'byor nyes pa byas nas su //
T02TD1199E:25b-13: stong nyid nges par byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:25b-14: de yang thabs gang gis she na /
T02TD1199E:25b-15: rjes su rang gi dam tshig nyams pa bskang bar bya zhes smos te /
T02TD1199E:25b-16: dam tshig bsrungs pa'i stengs su bla mas man ngag rjes su gnang nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:25b-17: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:25b-18: gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po //
T02TD1199E:25b-19: rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag / chos log sogs pa spang bya zhing //
T02TD1199E:25b-20: yul gyi mtshan nyid las kyang rig / mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni //
T02TD1199E:25b-21: bla ma'i lam gyis thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:25b-23: thabs kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:25b-25: thun mong dngos grub skye ba yi //
T02TD1199E:25b-27: tshig bcad gcig gis bcos ma'i bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1199E:25b-28: bzlas pa dang sngags dang phyag rgya mdor bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:25b-29: de skad du slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas /
T02TD1199E:25b-30: ji ga glang po rnyed gyur nas //
T02TD1199E:25b-31: glang po'i rjes ni tshol byed dam //
T02TD1199E:25b-33: 'o na gang gis mtshon zhe na /
T02TD1199E:25b-34: rang 'dod lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1199E:25b-35: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mthar thug pa'i //
T02TD1199E:25b-36: mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid dngos byas nas //
T02TD1199E:25b-37: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rang 'dod pa'i lhar bsgoms nas /
T02TD1199E:25b-38: rdzogs pa'i rim pa rang 'dod pa'i lha phyag rgya la mngon sum gyis mtshon par byas nas /
T02TD1199E:26a-0: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mthar thug pa'i 'khor ba dang mya ngan las @26a * //
T02TD1199E:26a-1: 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs shing khams gsum po nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:26a-2: de gang gis bsgoms pas she na /
T02TD1199E:26a-3: mkhas mchog nyid la dmigs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:26a-4: rang rig pa mngon sum gyis nyin dang mtshan du goms par byas pas so //
T02TD1199E:26a-5: de ltar bcos ma dang bral ba'i sgom pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:26a-6: da ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:26a-7: ri rtse dang ni zhi byed gnas //
T02TD1199E:26a-9: sngags shes pas ni gnas bcos te //
T02TD1199E:26a-10: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:26a-11: des ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:26a-12: bde dang ldan pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:26a-14: zag bcas kyi bde ba dga' ba dang mchog dga' la sogs pa dang ldan pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:26a-15: bde ba stong pa de'i thabs gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:26a-16: shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par //
T02TD1199E:26a-17: sangs rgyas nyid ni rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:26a-18: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi la stong pa nyid ma bsgoms par rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:26a-19: de ltar gnas dang ldan pa'i sgom pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:26a-20: da ni mjug bsdu ba ston pa //
T02TD1199E:26a-21: de bas de ltar rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD1199E:26a-23: 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rang bzhin phyag rgya bzhi spangs shing de dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mngon sum gyi lam med na stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig gam rang rig pa 'ba' zhig gis dngos grub mi 'thob bo //
T02TD1199E:26a-24: de ltar rim gyis stong pa nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:26a-25: da ni zung du 'jug pa'i thabs gsum pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:26a-26: 'di las ye shes skyes pas na //
T02TD1199E:26a-27: phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1199E:26a-28: zhes bya ba ni zla ba tshes pa bzhin du zhi gnas kyi bde ba la lhag mthong gi bde ba skye ba ni yul phyag rgya bzhi la rag las pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:26a-29: de ltar tshigs bcad phyed kyis mdor bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:26a-30: da ni phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:26a-31: gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1199E:26a-32: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1199E:26a-33: bram ze'i rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas spyan du bskyed nas snyoms par zhugs pa las /
T02TD1199E:26a-34: dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid las /
T02TD1199E:26b-0: bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste me long lta bu'i stong @26b pa nyid bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:26b-1: zhe sdang rtag tu phyag rgya che //
T02TD1199E:26b-3: rdo rje'i rigs la mos pa'i gang zag gis rgyal rigs kyi bu mo m'a ma k'i'i rigs su bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:26b-4: lhan cig skyes dga'i mthar stong pa'i rgyas btab pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid do //
T02TD1199E:26b-5: phrag dog las kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1199E:26b-6: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rigs la mos pa'i gang zag gi dmangs rigs kyi bu mo sgrol mar bskyed nas lhan cig skyes dga' bskyed pa'i mthar bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni las kyi phyag rgya ste bya ba nan tan gyi chos nyid do //
T02TD1199E:26b-7: 'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1199E:26b-8: zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs la mos pa'i gang zag gis rje'u rigs kyi bu mo gos dkar mor bskyed la dga' ba gsum gyi mthar bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1199E:26b-9: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid do //
T02TD1199E:26b-10: de skad du mtshan brjod las /
T02TD1199E:26b-11: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02TD1199E:26b-12: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
T02TD1199E:26b-13: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:26b-14: phyag rgya de dag rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1199E:26b-15: rdzogs par byed pas bstan par bya //
T02TD1199E:26b-16: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mngon sum du skyed par byed pa bde ba chen po rdzogs par byed pas /
T02TD1199E:26b-17: phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu'i tshogs pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1199E:26b-18: rigs dang gnyis ka mngon sum du //
T02TD1199E:26b-19: lha yi gzugs su bsam par bya //
T02TD1199E:26b-20: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyangs nas lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ni dang ba'i dad pa bskyed nas bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:26b-21: rmongs pas zhi 'gyur khro bas drag / ces bya ba ni gti mug gi stong pa nyid bsgoms pas zhi bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1199E:26b-22: zhe sdang gi chos nyid bsgoms pas dag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:26b-23: 'dod chags kyi chos nyid bsgoms pas chags pa chen po dang /
T02TD1199E:26b-24: phrag dog gi chos nyid bsgoms pas sems can gyi don rab tu byed pas na rgyal ba lnga'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:26b-27: / sems de nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:26b-29: yul phyag rgya bshad nas da ni dus bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:26b-31: nyi ma phyed ni snang ba mched pa'o //
T02TD1199E:26b-32: mtshan mo ni snang ba ste /
T02TD1199E:27a-0: dga' ba gsum 'od gsal ba ni 'od gsal ba dang bcas pa'i ye shes ni phyag rgya'i sbyor @27a * //
T02TD1199E:27a-2: de ltar dus bshad nas bslab par bya ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:27a-3: skye bo mi srun pa rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor lta bu 'am /
T02TD1199E:27a-4: mu stegs can lta bu bstan pa la smod pa'i 'jigs pas /
T02TD1199E:27a-5: rang gi sems nyid snang ba'i phyag rgya'i lha mo la mos par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:27a-6: de lta bu'i bag tsha ba med pa'i rnam par dben pa'i gnas yin na phyag rgya bzhi mngon sum du bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:27a-7: gal te mngon sum shes rab ma rnyed na //
T02TD1199E:27a-8: byol song ma la goms par bya //
T02TD1199E:27a-10: byol song gi sgra ni logs na gnas pa la bya ste /
T02TD1199E:27a-11: rang gi phyag rgya ma yin pa'i ngan spyod ma la yang de goms par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:27a-12: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:27a-13: rnyed dang ma rnyed bde kun gyi //
T02TD1199E:27a-16: ye shes pa na re byol song gi sgras ni /
T02TD1199E:27a-18: lte ba'i mtheb tshad gang gi gtum mo drod rlung 'khyil pa 'khyog par 'gro bas na byol song ma zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD1199E:27a-19: de ltar mngon sum gyi lam phyag rgya bzhi nyin re 'am zla ba 'am lor mngon sum gyi yul du ma byas na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:27a-20: de nas ldang ba'i thabs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:27a-21: dam nyams bag med gang 'gyur na //
T02TD1199E:27a-23: dbang bskur zhing slar yang mngon sum gyi lam dor bar mi byed cing sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:27a-24: de ltar zung 'jug gi mtshan nyid bshad nas mjug bsdu ba ni /
T02TD1199E:27a-25: des na ma lus sngom ldan zhing //
T02TD1199E:27a-26: rdzas dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1199E:27a-28: sbom ldan ni rten gyi gang zag go //
T02TD1199E:27a-32: byang chub kyi sems dga' bral du mi 'gyur bar bzlog par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:27a-33: de ltar zung du 'jug pa gsum po bstan pa la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T02TD1199E:27a-34: dang po ni bdag byin rlob pa'i thabs kyis skal [?] khung nas nam mkha' mthong ba bzhin du yul dang yul can gyis stong nyid cig car du mthong ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:27a-35: gnyis pa ni seng ge phrug pa bzhin du gzung ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab cing 'dzin pa la mi bskyod pa'i rgyas btab nas /
T02TD1199E:27b-0: sems kyi stong nyid shes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btab nas rim gyis bsgom pa yin @27b no ;
T02TD1199E:27b-1: / gsum pa ni yul las kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD1199E:27b-2: zla ba tshes pa ltar zag bcas la brten pa'i bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:27b-3: de ltar rgyud dgu'i thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor la blo dang ldan pas dus rtag tu gnas par byas nas /
T02TD1199E:27b-4: srid pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gcig pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang bsgom mo //
T02TD1199E:27b-5: ci'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:27b-6: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig / bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la //
T02TD1199E:27b-8: mngon sum don gyi rnam par skyes //
T02TD1199E:27b-9: rgyas 'debs zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1199E:27b-11: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:27b-13: // / de ltar mchog tu gyur pa'i lam zab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:27b-14: da ni las dang po pa'i sgom pa bskyed pa'i rim pa du ma bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:27b-15: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba ;
T02TD1199E:27b-17: ci zhig 'chad pa yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:27b-20: rgyud dgu'i rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa lha sgom pa bla na med pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:27b-21: de yang don du dang ldan zhe na /
T02TD1199E:27b-22: sgrub pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa dang ;
T02TD1199E:27b-23: gnas dang sgrub pa'i thabs dang thun mong gi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
T02TD1199E:27b-24: khyad par gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
T02TD1199E:27b-25: de la yan lag gi gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na ste /
T02TD1199E:27b-26: yid du'ang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas mgon po thams cad kyi bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:27b-27: de la rnam par dben pa'i gnas sam nags tshal yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:27b-29: bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1199E:27b-32: thabs ni sna tshogs kun du bsdus //
T02TD1199E:27b-33: zhes bya ba rten gyi gang zag rgyu'i rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ston pas na /
T02TD1199E:27b-34: sna tshogs kun gyi phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1199E:27b-35: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:27b-36: sna tshogs kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam shes dang /
T02TD1199E:27b-38: ji ltar bde bas bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1199E:27b-40: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga la ma chags pa'i sems dang stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:28a-1: bshad nas thun mong gi sgrub pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:28a-2: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba //
T02TD1199E:28a-4: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dkyil 'khor la sems can gyi mos pa ni zhi ba 'am /
T02TD1199E:28a-6: dbang ngam khro bo'i skur snang ba'am /
T02TD1199E:28a-7: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdag gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i ngor bstan pa ni brjod par ga la nus te mi nus so //
T02TD1199E:28a-8: de yang thabs dang shes rab kyis 'dul ba'i ngor lha bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:28a-9: bris sku la sogs pa lha'i skur mos pa thams cad dang ;
T02TD1199E:28a-10: sems kyi mos pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:28a-11: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1199E:28a-12: gdul bya rnams kyi mos pa dang sbyar nas /
T02TD1199E:28a-13: rgyud dgu'i brjod bya bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:28a-14: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor tha dad par snang ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD1199E:28a-15: stong pa'i rdo rje can nyid gcig / ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:28a-16: don dam par chos kyi sku gcig yin yang /
T02TD1199E:28a-17: gdul bya'i mos pa la brten nas rigs rnam pa lnga la sogs pa bshad do //
T02TD1199E:28a-18: de ltar thun mong gi sgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:28a-19: bye brag gi sgrub pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:28a-20: rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:28a-22: gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa //
T02TD1199E:28a-23: zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i rgyud do //
T02TD1199E:28a-24: dbyibs dang kha dog phyag la sogs //
T02TD1199E:28a-25: zhes bya ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang /
T02TD1199E:28a-26: zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa dang /
T02TD1199E:28a-27: zhal gsum phyag drug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:28a-28: sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga dang zhes bya ba lha rnams kyi bzlas pa'i bye brag go //
T02TD1199E:28a-29: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cho ga rnams //
T02TD1199E:28a-30: zhes bya ba ni sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD1199E:28a-33: de'i lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02TD1199E:28a-34: sbyor ba tshad med pa bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1199E:28a-35: dngos gzhi cho ga'i yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:28a-36: de la yan lag dang po ni stong pa'i byang chub bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:28a-37: gnyis pa ni yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan spro ba dang bsdu ba'o //
T02TD1199E:28a-38: gsum pa ni sku rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:28a-39: bzhi pa ni phung po dang /
T02TD1199E:28a-40: khams dang skye mched kyi lha bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:28a-41: de ltar dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba mdor bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:28a-42: khyad par du zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:28b-0: mdun du ram las nyi @28b ma bsgom //
T02TD1199E:28b-1: zhes bya ba ni tshogs sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-2: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-3: stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs nas /
T02TD1199E:28b-4: srung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba ston pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:28b-5: de yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las khro bo bcu sprul nas rab dang dra ba dang me 'od kyi phreng ba dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-6: yang na ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje de'i 'od zer gyi ra ba dang dra ba bsam pa dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-7: yang na ku ku ri'i bzhin du rdo rje chen po nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i nang du lha bsgom par bya'o zhes 'chad do //
T02TD1199E:28b-8: ra ba dang dra ba'i nang du lha bskyed pa'i rten yi ge ae las chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gru gsum bsams la /
T02TD1199E:28b-9: de'i dbus su dpa' bo gcig pa'i gdan ro bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:28b-10: de'i steng du rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid 'dug ste /
T02TD1199E:28b-11: de'i snying gar yi ge h'um dmar nag thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can 'od zer 'phro ba bsams la de yongs su gyur ba las zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:28b-12: dpa' bo de ni shes rab stong pa nyid ches che bas /
T02TD1199E:28b-13: sku mdog sngon po 'ang thabs snying rje dang ldan pas na cung zad dmar ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:28b-14: da ni tshogs rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'khor dang bcas pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:28b-15: rdo rje las skyes rtse chen po ;
T02TD1199E:28b-16: / zhes pa ni tshogs sogs pa'i tshe snying ga'i yi ge h'um las 'od 'phros pas tshogs sogs pa'i lha bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:28b-17: rdo rje las skyes zhes gsungs pa'i phyir na spyan drangs pa dang 'od kyis snang bar byas pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:28b-18: de'i gtso bo ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:28b-21: de rnams kyi lha gang bsgom pa dang mthun par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:28b-22: de la lha mo gnyis ni phyag na ri dags kyi mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-23: nyi ma zhes pa rang byung gi khrag dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-24: chu skyes bya ba dri chu dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-25: sman zhes bya ba sha chen po dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-26: dri zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-27: ro zhes bya ba chang dang /
T02TD1199E:28b-30: de ltar dpa' bo bsgom pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i chos kun gyi lam las rnam par grol ba lha'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:29a-2: a'a li las zla ba me long lta bu dang /
T02TD1199E:29a-3: k'a li las nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyi dbus su sa bon dang mtshan ma so sor rtog pa'i rang gi sems mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can no //
T02TD1199E:29a-4: de las 'od 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa lhar bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:29a-5: slar bsdus pa bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes las rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje'i skur bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:29a-6: bcom ldan 'das de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi pho brang gi dbus su ni nyi ma'i 'od can thugs kyi rigs su gyur par h'um las bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:29a-7: lo bco lnga pa lta bu'i lang tshol bab pa /
T02TD1199E:29a-8: drag po 'jigs byed khyo shug zhabs kyis mnan pa /
T02TD1199E:29a-9: zhi gnas mtshon pa'i rdo rje khatv'am ga dang /
T02TD1199E:29a-10: snying rje'i rang bzhin gyi thod pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1199E:29a-11: g-yas pa na lhag mthong gi rang bzhin rdo rje sngon po bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1199E:29a-12: sngar bshad pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba dur khrod kyi dbus na bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:29a-13: de ltar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:29a-14: da ni zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:29a-15: sngon du tshogs sogs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:29a-16: tshad med pa'i rnal 'byor bsrung ba dang /
T02TD1199E:29a-17: stong pa nyid bsgom pa bdag bsrung ba ba dang /
T02TD1199E:29a-18: gnas bsrung bar byas la ae gru gsum nam mkha' stong pa'i dbus su 'byung ba bzhir gyur pa las sam /
T02TD1199E:29a-19: yang na 'byung ba bzhi'i steng du sngar gsungs pa lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:29a-20: de'i steng du 'jigs byed khyo shug gi stan la mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa las sam yang na yi ge h'um las byung ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yum rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa phyag gzhan gnyis kyis thod pa dang khro bo'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD1199E:29a-21: dpa' bo gcig po'am yang na lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:29a-22: de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched la yig 'bru bkod pas byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:29a-23: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:29a-27: bzlas pa dang mchod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:29b-0: bsgom bzlas kyis skyon thun tha mar ye shes sems dpa' gshegs @29b su gsol ba dang /
T02TD1199E:29b-1: dam tshig sems dpa' lus la bsdus nas rigs lnga'i sa bon gyis bsrungs la ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:29b-2: de nyid kyi don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:29b-3: rnal 'byor de nyid ces pa ni //
T02TD1199E:29b-4: phyag bzhi pa bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD1199E:29b-5: de nyid rigs gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:29b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1199E:29b-7: zhes smos pas rdo rje'i rigs yin no //
T02TD1199E:29b-8: ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas 'di gsung gi he ru ka yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:29b-9: phyag bzhin dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin mtshon pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:29b-11: de'i phyag mtshan bzhi ni thod pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang rdo rje dang /
T02TD1199E:29b-12: dril bu zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:29b-13: yum rdo rje phag mo ni lha mo gos dkar mo yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:29b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1199E:29b-15: zhes pa ni sku mdog dang phyag mtshan mtshungs so //
T02TD1199E:29b-16: de ltar phyag bzhi pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:29b-17: de ni phyag drug pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:29b-19: stong pa'i byang chub bsgoms pa'i rjes la 'byung ba bzhi'i steng du gzhal yas khang bsgoms la /
T02TD1199E:29b-20: padma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'am /
T02TD1199E:29b-21: yang na mngon par byang chub pa lnga las bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:29b-22: lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:29b-23: zhes pa ni bdag nyid lha der bsgoms la 'khor rnams yig 'bru las bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:29b-24: de la zhal dang po nag po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yin la /
T02TD1199E:29b-25: g-yas dkar ba ni sku me long lta bu dang /
T02TD1199E:29b-26: g-yon dmar ba ni gsung so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1199E:29b-27: rgyan rnams kun gyis zhes pa ni rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:29b-28: thod pa'i gdan la bzhugs par bsgom //
T02TD1199E:29b-31: ye shes dpal gyi zhal nas ni bhring gi ri ti gdan du bting bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD1199E:29b-32: phyag g-yon na thod pa dang dril bu dang gzhu dang /
T02TD1199E:29b-33: g-yas pa na rtse gsum dang rdo rje dang /
T02TD1199E:29b-35: yang na rtsa ba'i rgyud dang mthun par bya ba yin te /
T02TD1199E:29b-36: gnyis kas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:30a-0: yum gyi phyag gnyis na thod pa dang gri gug bsnams shing khams gsum gyi bdag @30a * //
T02TD1199E:30a-1: nyid 'joms pa'i phyir ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:30a-2: sangs rgyas rang bzhin 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs rnams rnam par 'phro //
T02TD1199E:30a-3: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams bsdus nas btsun mo'i bha gar bzhugs pas lha mo'i 'khor lo bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30a-4: 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi zhal dang phyag mtshan ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD1199E:30a-5: kha dog ni sngo ba dang /
T02TD1199E:30a-13: sna tshogs rol mo brdung zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1199E:30a-17: rnga rings ma rnams ni zur bzhir dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30a-18: sgo rnams su lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD1199E:30a-21: phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlab pa ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:30a-24: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:30a-25: bha ga'i dbus su bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1199E:30a-26: de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam //
T02TD1199E:30a-28: de'i bzlas pa ni gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:30a-29: aom a'a: h'um hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1199E:30a-31: aom badzra ki ti ki ti h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1199E:30a-32: aom dang a'a: dang h'um ni sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD1199E:30a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni yi ge gcig pa'i yi ge h'um ngo //
T02TD1199E:30a-34: lha mo thams cad kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po ni hr'i:'o //
T02TD1199E:30a-35: mchod pa'i lha mo'i ni ae aee /
T02TD1199E:30a-37: sgo srung rnams kyi ni aa a'a /
T02TD1199E:30a-39: de nas sgrub pa pos rdo rje zhes pa ni h'um gis rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:30a-40: aas padma bskyed nas snyoms par zhugs pa las lha mo bzhi'i chogs spros pas /
T02TD1199E:30a-41: bdud rtsi lnga'i lha mos mchod pa dang 'khyud pa dang /
T02TD1199E:30a-44: me tog la sogs pa bzhis bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30a-45: gal te phrin las kyi dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na phrin las bzhi'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30a-46: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:30a-48: // / de ltar dpa' bo du ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:30a-49: da ni dpa' mo du ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:30a-50: nyon cig rdo rje tshul ci bzhin //
T02TD1199E:30a-51: zhes pa ni lha bsrung ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD1199E:30a-52: 'khor lo bsgrub bya'i khyad par rnams //
T02TD1199E:30b-0: @30b zhes bya ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi khyad par mi 'dra'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-1: zhi dang rgyas dang zhes bya ba //
T02TD1199E:30b-2: tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ni 'bras bu bstan to //
T02TD1199E:30b-3: re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo la //
T02TD1199E:30b-4: zhes bya ba ni shar nas nub tu ri mo gnyis dang /
T02TD1199E:30b-5: lho dang byang du ri mo gnyis rgya gram du btab la mtha' ma mu khyud nyis rim gyis bskor ba'i nang du autpala rdo rjes bskor ba bris la yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1199E:30b-6: dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba'i aom shar du t'a /
T02TD1199E:30b-14: zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-15: zhi ba la gur kum gyis sam /
T02TD1199E:30b-16: rgyas pa la li khris sam /
T02TD1199E:30b-18: mngon spyod pa dug gis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-19: zhi ba la gro ga dang /
T02TD1199E:30b-21: dbang la smad g-yogs kyi ras la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-22: sa bon 'di ni kun las te //
T02TD1199E:30b-23: zhes bya ba ni phrin las bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-24: che ge mo bsrung zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD1199E:30b-25: zhes pa ni bsrung ba la /
T02TD1199E:30b-26: che ge mo raksha zhes bya ba dang spel bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-27: de yang ji ltar spel zhe na /
T02TD1199E:30b-28: phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i thog mthar spel //
T02TD1199E:30b-32: thog mtha' spel ba ni thog mar aom dang tha mar sv'a h'a bcas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-33: dbus su rab tu sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1199E:30b-34: zhes bya ba ni aom che ge mo t'a re tu tt'a re che ge mo raksha sv'a h'a zhes pa dang spel ba'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-36: stong nyid mnyam pa'i ye shes la //
T02TD1199E:30b-37: zhes bya ba ni aom sva bh'a wa /
T02TD1199E:30b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pas stong par bsgom mo //
T02TD1199E:30b-39: bdag gi gzugs ni rab byas la //
T02TD1199E:30b-40: zhes pa ni yig 'bru lha'i 'khor lor bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-41: mnyam nyid kun rig gnas su ni //
T02TD1199E:30b-42: zhes pa ni mnyam nyid ni nam mkha'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-43: kun ni zhi ba la chu dang /
T02TD1199E:30b-46: mngon spyod la me'i dkyil 'khor la rig pa'i yi ge rnams zhugs pa'i gnas su bya'o //
T02TD1199E:30b-47: der srung ba'i 'khor lo lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' bcug ste /
T02TD1199E:30b-48: lhar dbang bskur zhing bdud rtsi myangs la bsgoms pa dang /
T02TD1199E:30b-50: seng ge dang glang po la sogs pa 'jigs pa brgyad las ring du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:31a-0: @31a * // da ni bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:31a-1: sems can dngos po med pa ru //
T02TD1199E:31a-2: zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i byang chub bo //
T02TD1199E:31a-3: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bskyed nas de'i steng du t'am yongs su gyur pa las autpala /
T02TD1199E:31a-4: de las rje btsun dngos grub thams cad stsol ba g-yas skyabs sbyin g-yon autpala bsnams pa /
T02TD1199E:31a-5: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la yan lag drug tu yi ge'i go cha bskon nas /
T02TD1199E:31a-6: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:31a-13: sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis //
T02TD1199E:31a-14: zhes bya ba ni rje btsun ma'i snying po'i zhabs su /
T02TD1199E:31a-15: zhi ba la sv'a h'a dang /
T02TD1199E:31a-18: mngon spyod la phat bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31a-19: de ltar sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:31a-20: de ni lha mo ku ru ku lle'i bshad pa bya ste /
T02TD1199E:31a-21: snga ma bzhin du 'khrul 'khor bris la /
T02TD1199E:31a-30: nub byang du h'a bris nas /
T02TD1199E:31a-31: snga ma bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pas bsgrubs te /
T02TD1199E:31a-32: mchod pa byas nas las bcu gnyis byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:31a-34: stong pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31a-35: de'i dbus su yi ge hr'i: bsam pa ni sa bon te /
T02TD1199E:31a-36: de las bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag bzhi par bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31a-37: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:31a-41: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31a-42: ldang ba'i tshe go chas bsrungs la ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31a-43: de ltar ku ru ku lle'i sgrub thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:31a-44: da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khrul 'khor bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:31a-45: sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas zhes pa ni 'khrul 'khor bri ba'o //
T02TD1199E:31a-46: de yang snga ma nyid las mtshams bzhi cha gnyis su byas pa'i re'u mig bcu gnyis la /
T02TD1199E:31a-47: sngon du gsungs pa bzhin du bsgrub //
T02TD1199E:31b-0: yig 'bru lhar bskyed @31b nas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-5: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31b-6: las ci'i phyir 'khrul 'khor byed ce na /
T02TD1199E:31b-7: thabs dang shes rab 'phel ba'i las la zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD1199E:31b-8: de la sngags dgong pa ni aom nas sv'a h'a'i bar du yig 'bru bkod nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31b-9: de la bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa ni gdan aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la de'i dbus su h'um las zhes bya ba zhes re pha med pa ste zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31b-10: de la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-17: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:31b-18: da ni dpa' bo bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-19: dpa' mo bzhi bskyed pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:31b-20: thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:31b-21: stong pa'i byang chub kyi rjes la zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng du thod pa'i gdan la rnam snang gi sa bon bhr'um dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-22: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tr'am dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-23: snang ba mtha' yas kyi hr'i: dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-24: don yod grub pa'i aa dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-25: sangs rgyas spyan gyi bum dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-29: las bskyed la phung po dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-31: skye mched byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD1199E:31b-32: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:31b-39: ldang ba'i tshe na thams cad kyang rigs lnga'i sngags kyis gnas drug tu bsrungs la ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:31b-40: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:31b-42: // / de ltar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo re re'i sgrub thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:31b-43: nga ni bdag med ma dang bcas pa'i zhal brgyad pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:31b-44: sgrub thabs de nyid nyon zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po la bod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:31b-45: gang gis sdang dag ma rungs pa'i //
T02TD1199E:31b-46: sems can 'dul 'gyur zhes pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02TD1199E:31b-47: dgos pa de dang bcas pa'i mkha' 'gro dpal he ru ka dang mkha' 'gro ma dgu'i 'khor lo bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-1: mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:32a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1199E:32a-3: ces pa ni rgyu'i he ru ka'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-5: zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i he ru ka'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-6: 'bar ba'i phreng ba nas tshigs bcad phyed ni mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1199E:32a-7: de ltar rgyas par bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:32a-8: shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:32a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD1199E:32a-10: sa bon phreng ba de nas dgod //
T02TD1199E:32a-12: rgyu'i he ru ka bskyed nas yab yum gyi bha ga'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su lha mo brgyad kyi yig 'bru'i sa bon dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-13: de nas thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las mngal skyes kyi tshul gyis lha mo brgyad bskyed nas rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-14: de nas rgyu'i he ru ka zhu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:32a-15: phyogs bzhi'i lha mo ma gtogs pa sa'i lha mo pukka sv'i dang /
T02TD1199E:32a-16: chu'i lha mo ri khrod ma dang /
T02TD1199E:32a-18: rlung gi dom bi n'i bzhis glus bskul ba dang /
T02TD1199E:32a-19: 'bras bu'i he ru ka bskyed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:32a-20: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:32a-21: rgyu'i he ru ka mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:32a-22: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhal nas zhugs te /
T02TD1199E:32a-23: btsun mo yum gyi bha gar lha mo brgyad kyi yig 'brur gyur pa dang lha mo brgyad mngal skyes kyi rim pas phyogs skyong brgyad kyi thog tu bzhag la /
T02TD1199E:32a-24: de nas rgyu'i he ru ka chos kyi skur zhu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:32a-25: de las mtshams kyi 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung gi rang bzhin 'od kyi thig le dkar dmar bskul bas thig le gnyis nyi zla'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /
T02TD1199E:32a-26: aam h'um yig 'bru gnyis dang thod pa dang phyag mtshan gri gug gnyis dang /
T02TD1199E:32a-27: 'od zer spro bsdu gnyis dang rgyu brgyad las /
T02TD1199E:32a-28: 'bras bu he ru ka sprul pa'i sku rdo rje can ni chen por bzhengs zhes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-29: zhabs ni sa la bsnun ba yis //
T02TD1199E:32a-30: zhes pa ni bdud bzhi'i steng na gar dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-31: gam tsam la sogs pa ni lha mo'i sa bon no //
T02TD1199E:32a-32: dga' ba'i bdag po'i sa bon dang //
T02TD1199E:32a-34: 'bras bu he ru ka yab yum gyi sa bon no //
T02TD1199E:32a-35: sa bon de yang gang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:32a-36: h'um dang aam ni 'bar ba las //
T02TD1199E:32a-38: ma mo'i grong khyer zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:32a-40: dpa' ba ni bdud bzhi gnon pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-0: @32b 'jigs pa ni spyan gsum khro gnyer phyag bcu drug dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-1: brjid pa ni zhal dbus ma'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-2: drag po ni zhal g-yas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-3: 'jigs su rung ba ni zhal g-yon pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-4: snying rje ni spyan dmar ba'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-5: rngam pa ni zhal gdongs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-6: zhi ba ni thal bas byugs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-7: mgo bo'i do shal mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-8: sgo bzhi ni mi 'am cis 'dul bar byed pas na shar du rta'i gdong can /
T02TD1199E:32b-9: byang du phag gi gdong can /
T02TD1199E:32b-11: lhor seng ge'i gdong can no //
T02TD1199E:32b-12: mtshams kyi lha mo bzhi ni phyag gnyis kyis gling bu 'bud pa sngo ba dang /
T02TD1199E:32b-13: pi wang brdung ba ser ba dang /
T02TD1199E:32b-14: rnga bo che brdung ba dmar ba dang /
T02TD1199E:32b-15: rdza rnga brdung ba ni ljang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-16: sdo ser dkar po zhes bya ba ni sgo ba bzhil [*bzhi la?] zhal gsum gsum yod pa zhal gnyis ni tha mal pa'i gdong la gcig ni dud 'gro'i gdong yin no //
T02TD1199E:32b-17: des na sgob rnams kyi sku mdog dang sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-18: de rnams la yig 'bru dgod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:32b-20: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:32b-27: ldang ba'i tshe na dkyil 'khor bsdus la /
T02TD1199E:32b-28: rigs drug gi yi ge bkod la ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-29: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel ba'o /
T02TD1199E:32b-31: // / de ltar zhal brgyad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:32b-32: da ni ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:32b-33: nyon cig ces pa ni rdo rje snying po la bod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-34: gnyis po spangs nas su zhes pa ni thabs dor ba'i dpa' mo 'ba' zhig bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-35: gnyis med chos kyi ye shes ni //
T02TD1199E:32b-36: zhes pa lha mo gcig pus dbyings dang ye shes ro gcig par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-37: mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs zhes pa ni rdo rje rigs kyi lha mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
T02TD1199E:32b-38: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni rnal 'byor kun gyi dang po zhes pa ni lha'i sku bskyed pa'i thog mar stod pa'i byang chub bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-39: de la sngags dang pa ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid do //
T02TD1199E:32b-40: sngags gnyis pa ni lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:32b-41: sngags gsum pa ni sgyu ma dang stong pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-1: de'i don stong pa nyid kyang bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:33a-2: de ltar stong pa'i byang chub bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:33a-3: de'i gnas bshad pa ni yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:33a-4: gnas der bla re bre ba dang /
T02TD1199E:33a-5: ba dan dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /
T02TD1199E:33a-7: me tog gis dgram pa yang bya'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-8: gnas der ci zhig bsgom zhe na /
T02TD1199E:33a-9: blo ldan mchod pas sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD1199E:33a-11: skad cig tsam gyi rnal 'byor gyis ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-12: de skad du ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:33a-14: tshad med pa bzhi bzhis sems can gyi don byed pa'i dus dang /
T02TD1199E:33a-16: ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa stong pa'i byang chub kyi dus su skad cig mas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-17: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor byas nas stong pa'i byang chub bsgom pa'i rjes la rdo rje'i sa sbyang bar bya ste /
T02TD1199E:33a-18: bya ba'i cho ga de nyid kyis //
T02TD1199E:33a-19: ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:33a-26: ye shes kyi snang ba bsgom pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-27: de'i steng du sum las ri'i rgyal po ri rab bskyed par bya ba ni phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhir gnas pa'i /
T02TD1199E:33a-28: lhun po'i gzugs su bsams nas ni //
T02TD1199E:33a-30: de'i steng du bhr'um las gser las byas pa'i grong khyer ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:33a-31: sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:33a-32: rta babs dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-33: de'i dbus su aa sim aa las seng ge'i gdan lnga bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:33a-34: de'i steng du gdugs dkar po dang nyi ma'i gdan yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-35: de ltar rten gyi dang po'i sbyor ba bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:33a-36: brten pa lha'i dang po'i sbyor ba bskyed pa ni /
T02TD1199E:33a-37: rang gi dbugs ni yi ge h'um //
T02TD1199E:33a-39: rang gi dbugs ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02TD1199E:33a-40: ye shes mkha' 'gro dbus su bsam //
T02TD1199E:33a-41: zhes pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-42: zhal gnyis pa la sogs pa ni go lha'o //
T02TD1199E:33a-43: shar du yang yi ge h'um las byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:33b-0: @33b rlung ga gnas rnams su mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD1199E:33b-7: 'ug pa mo la sogs pa brgyad ni dkyil 'khor la bkod nas /
T02TD1199E:33b-8: de'i phyi rol gyi rim pa la /
T02TD1199E:33b-10: byang du mar me ma dang /
T02TD1199E:33b-12: lhor kam po tse bsgoms la phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:33b-13: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:33b-20: de la bdud rtsi myong ba ni dang po lha mo ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mdun du thod pa'i dbus su bdud rtsi lnga bzhag pa ni /
T02TD1199E:33b-21: dam tshig dag ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1199E:33b-22: zhes bya ba lta bu yin no //
T02TD1199E:33b-23: rlung dang me zhes pa ni yum dang kshu mo //
T02TD1199E:33b-24: bdun pa la zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'i steng du rigs lnga'i sa bon h'um aom tr'am hr'i: aa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1199E:33b-25: de ltar na bdun dgod pa'am /
T02TD1199E:33b-26: ye shes dpal gyi zhal snga nas ni ram dang yam ni 'og tu bdud rtsi lnga'i gdan yin la /
T02TD1199E:33b-27: gnyis pa nas brtsis pa'i bdun pa ni ha yin la /
T02TD1199E:33b-28: de la thig le aam dang /
T02TD1199E:33b-29: sgra au dang ldan pas yi ge h'um du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:33b-30: h'um de lan gnyis su 'gyur te /
T02TD1199E:33b-31: de sna bug gi rlung gis rdo rje'i sa bon gyis bskul nas /
T02TD1199E:33b-32: rlung g-yos nas me sbar ba dang /
T02TD1199E:33b-33: steng nas h'um gis mnan pas bdud rtsi'i char pa'i rgyun 'bab par bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:33b-34: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:33b-36: // / de ltar ye shes mkha' 'gro bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:33b-37: da ni bdag med ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:33b-38: de nas bdag med sgrub thabs zhes bya ba ni tshigs bcad phyed kyis mdor bstan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:33b-40: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD1199E:33b-45: stong pa'i byang chub bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
T02TD1199E:33b-46: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su nam mkha'i dbyings su ae gru gsum de'i dbus su ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo //
T02TD1199E:33b-47: 'khor lo de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:33b-48: 'khor lo ji lta'i tshul bzhin du //
T02TD1199E:34a-0: sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang rta babs dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang bcas @34a * //
T02TD1199E:34a-2: / de'i sngon du ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:34a-3: sngon du ji ltar glu blangs zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:34a-4: 'khor lo'i sngon du lam las sam /
T02TD1199E:34a-7: yam las rlung mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du rim par bsgoms la /
T02TD1199E:34a-8: lha rnams kyi rtags rtse gsum pa dang me 'od dang ba dan rim bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-9: 'khor lo'i dbyibs kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:34a-10: ae las byung ba'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad las byung ba'i 'khor lo rim pa gnyis rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-11: 'khor lo gcig pa gang du dgod ce na /
T02TD1199E:34a-12: gcig ni padma'i lte ba la'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-13: gnyis ni mkha' spyod dang sa spyod sku dang gsung dang /
T02TD1199E:34a-14: goo r'i la sogs pa'i lha mo rdo rje can dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor gnyis bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-15: de rnams su gdan ci zhig ce na /
T02TD1199E:34a-16: ro'i gdan bco lnga yang dag par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-17: de ltar rten gyi dang po sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:34a-18: da ni brten pa lha'i dang po'i sbyor ba bshad pa ni zla ba me long lta bu dang /
T02TD1199E:34a-19: nyi ma mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:34a-20: yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1199E:34a-21: 'od zer spro bsdu bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin las rgyu'i rdo rje bdag med ma sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-22: de yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'bras bu'i rdo rje bdag med ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-23: ci'i phyir mngal skyes kyi rim pas ma yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:34a-24: a'a li k'a li'i sbyor bas ni //
T02TD1199E:34a-27: de'i dbus su yig 'bru aam dang /
T02TD1199E:34a-28: phyag mtshan gyi gri gug ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-29: de'i gdan ni nyi ma dang zla ba'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-30: de'i rgyun ni yi ge aa las byung ba'i gri gug gi gzugs yin pas /
T02TD1199E:34a-31: bsrub bya srub byed kyi sbyor ba mngal skyes kyi rim pa las 'dod par mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-32: sems dpa'i gzugs las byung ba rung //
T02TD1199E:34a-33: zhes pa ni rgyu'i rdo rje bdag med ma las so //
T02TD1199E:34a-34: dkyil 'khor bdag mo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:34a-35: zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i bdag med ma'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-36: zhal dang phyag la sogs sngon bzhin //
T02TD1199E:34a-37: zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag med ma gnyis 'dra ba'o //
T02TD1199E:34a-38: kha dog kyang mtshungs sam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:34a-41: rgyu ni dkar mo yin la //
T02TD1199E:34a-42: 'bras bu ni nag mo yin no //
T02TD1199E:34a-43: yum grub pa 'ba' zhig tsam yin nam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:34b-0: @34b thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
T02TD1199E:34b-2: 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba las bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34b-3: de 'ba' zhig de ltar bskyed dam zhe na lha mo thams cad kyang de ltar bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34b-5: rgyu'i bdag med mar 'gyur ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:34b-6: 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi yum gyi thugs ka nas bskyed par rigs so zhen ma yin te /
T02TD1199E:34b-7: shes rab a'a li thabs k'a li //
T02TD1199E:34b-8: zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag dang //
T02TD1199E:34b-9: sa bon yi ge so so las //
T02TD1199E:34b-10: goo r'i la sogs yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1199E:34b-12: zla ba dang nyi ma bco lnga dang /
T02TD1199E:34b-13: yig 'bru bco lnga dang phyag mtshan bco lnga las lha mo bco lnga skyes pa yin no zhes smos so //
T02TD1199E:34b-14: de ltar dkyil 'khor ba rnams kun //
T02TD1199E:34b-15: nan tan bskyed de brtag par bya //
T02TD1199E:34b-16: zhes pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa lnga las /
T02TD1199E:34b-17: lha mo bco lnga so sor bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:34b-18: slob dpon rin chen rdo rje ni gtso bo byang chub pa lngas bskyed pa bzhin du 'khor rnams la yang rgyu'i bdag med ma dkar mo bcu bzhi las /
T02TD1199E:34b-19: 'bras bu'i bdag med ma bcu bzhi mi 'dra ba bcu bzhi bskyed par 'dod do //
T02TD1199E:34b-20: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhal nas rgyu'i bdag med ma srid pa lnga pa dang /
