T02TD1199E:34b-21: mes po lta bu'i rnal 'byor yin pas rgyu'i bdag med ma gcig yin la /
T02TD1199E:34b-22: de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo bco lnga bskyed cing phyag mtshan bco lnga yang lhan cig tu bskyed cing /
T02TD1199E:34b-23: 'od zer spro bsdu bco lnga yang lhan cig tu byas pa la sogs lha mo bco lnga cig car bskyed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:34b-24: zhal dang phyag mtshan sogs sngon bzhin zhes pa ni sngon zhes pa ni mdun gyi sgra yin la /
T02TD1199E:34b-25: de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1199E:34b-26: phyi'i 'bras bu'i bdag med ma'i sgra dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD1199E:34b-27: sku mdog ni zla ba lta bu yin no //
T02TD1199E:34b-29: nyi ma zla ba'i bye brag gis //
T02TD1199E:34b-30: yig 'bru so so'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1199E:34b-31: shes pa ji ltar 'dod ce na //
T02TD1199E:34b-32: 'bras bu bco lnga la ltos nas rgyu bco lnga bzhag pa yin gyis tha dad pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:34b-33: de ltar na dkyil 'khor nang ma la mdun du bdag med ma dang /
T02TD1199E:34b-34: shar du rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1199E:34b-36: nub tu chu'i rnal 'byor ma dang /
T02TD1199E:34b-38: phyi rol gyi rim par shar du goo r'i ma dang /
T02TD1199E:34b-40: nub tu ro langs ma dang /
T02TD1199E:34b-41: byang du za phod ma dang /
T02TD1199E:35a-2: lho nub tu ri khrod ma dang /
T02TD1199E:35a-3: nub byang du gtum mo dang /
T02TD1199E:35a-4: byang shar du g-yung mo dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:35a-5: gal te dkyil 'khor bslang ba yin na /
T02TD1199E:35a-7: 'og tu sa spyod ma gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:35a-8: lhor mkha' spyod ma sngo ba dang ser ba dang /
T02TD1199E:35a-9: byang dus spyod ma dmar pa dang /
T02TD1199E:35a-10: sngo ba phyed gzugs ma'i mdog can no //
T02TD1199E:35a-11: thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms pa'i rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:35a-12: g-yon pa 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi'i thod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:35a-13: g-yas na nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'joms pa'i gri gug dang ro'i steng na gar mdzad pas lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa'o //
T02TD1199E:35a-14: bzhad cing khro la sgeg pa dang //
T02TD1199E:35a-15: zhes pa ni bdag med ma ni bzhad pa'i nyams can no //
T02TD1199E:35a-16: nang gi lha mo bzhi ni khro ba'i nyams can no //
T02TD1199E:35a-17: phyi rol gyi lha mo rnams ni sgeg pa'i nyams can no //
T02TD1199E:35a-18: mchod pa'i gzugs su yang dag bstan //
T02TD1199E:35a-19: zhes pa ni thams cad kyang thabs shes rab bo //
T02TD1199E:35a-20: 'od zer sna tshogs sangs rgyas sprin //
T02TD1199E:35a-21: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer spro bsdus sems can 'dul ba'o //
T02TD1199E:35a-22: de nyid gsum bsdus dbus su bsgom //
T02TD1199E:35a-23: zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi lha mo'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1199E:35a-24: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:35a-26: // / de ltar bdag med ma bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:35a-27: da ni thabs kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:35a-28: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1199E:35a-30: rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar brjod //
T02TD1199E:35a-31: ces pa'i bar du mtshan bstan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:35a-32: phyag rgya chen po bsgrubs nas su //
T02TD1199E:35a-34: thams cad du ni blta bar bya //
T02TD1199E:35a-35: zhes pa'i bar gyis gnas bstan to //
T02TD1199E:35a-36: gnas de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bstan nas thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:35a-37: sar pa legs par bkal nas kyang //
T02TD1199E:35a-39: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1199E:35a-41: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab mo //
T02TD1199E:35a-42: zhes pa'i bar gyis thig gdab pa'i thabs bstan to //
T02TD1199E:35a-44: de nas nang du zhugs nas su //
T02TD1199E:35a-45: zhes pa la sogs pas nang gi dkyil 'khor du lha dgod pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:35a-46: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya //
T02TD1199E:35b-0: zhes bya ba ni lugs ma'am 'bur du brkos pa dang bris pa la sogs pa ci rigs par @35b gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:35b-1: de ltar bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas /
T02TD1199E:35b-2: bdag nyid lhar bsgom pa bshad pa ni dkyil 'khor cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:35b-3: de la dang po sngags pas lha'i khang par bzhugs nas /
T02TD1199E:35b-5: aa las dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po //
T02TD1199E:35b-6: de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs la mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-7: sdig pa bshags pa dang dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-9: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-12: sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD1199E:35b-13: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD1199E:35b-15: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1199E:35b-16: zhes pa'i bar gyis smon pa'i sems bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:35b-17: da ni 'jug pa'i sems bskyed bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:35b-18: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD1199E:35b-19: zhes pa ni rigs 'dzin gyi sdom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:35b-20: bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02TD1199E:35b-21: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i phas pham pa bcu bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:35b-22: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD1199E:35b-23: zhes pa ni lha thams cad kyi sngom pa ma lus pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:35b-24: sems can don byed tshul khrims ni //
T02TD1199E:35b-25: zhes pa ni phrin las bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:35b-26: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1199E:35b-27: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad bsgom pa'i tshe rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-28: mi bzod pa'i tshe rdo rje sngon po dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-29: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tshe rin po che ser po dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-30: snang ba mtha' yas kyi tshe padma dmar po dang /
T02TD1199E:35b-31: don yod grub pa'i tshe sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:35b-32: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD1199E:35b-33: ces pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud kyi rgyas par bshad pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:35b-34: ma bsgral zhes pa ni zhi bas so //
T02TD1199E:35b-35: ma grol zhes pa ni rgyas pas so //
T02TD1199E:35b-36: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhes pa ni dbang gis so //
T02TD1199E:35b-37: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD1199E:35b-38: ces pa ni mngon spyod kyis so //
T02TD1199E:36a-0: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pa bsgom pa'i phyir de bshad par bya'o snyom du dgongs nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs @36a * //
T02TD1199E:36a-1: te bka' stsal pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:36a-2: de nas bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs nas zhes pa ni 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas su bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-3: de nas snying ga'i rdo rje la badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags yid kyis bris nas de nas don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-4: de nas rnal 'byor pa'i lus mi bskyod par bsgoms la /
T02TD1199E:36a-5: me long lta bu'i snang ba bsgoms nas aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes bya ba sngags dang pos brtan par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-6: de'i steng du dbyangs yig bcu drug gru gsum du bkod la stong pa nyid bcu drug gi yon tan bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-7: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan du bsgoms la /
T02TD1199E:36a-8: mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pa zla ba gnyis pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-9: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes brtan par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-10: gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i tshul du bkod nas lha'i yon tan bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-11: de nas snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed la zla ba gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje bsgoms te /
T02TD1199E:36a-12: aom tishtha ta badzras brtan par byas la /
T02TD1199E:36a-13: zag pa med pa'i yon tan bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-14: de nas don yod grub par bskyed la 'od zer spro bsdus de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams kyi sku gsung thugs bcug ste /
T02TD1199E:36a-15: badzra a'a tma ko& ham gis brtan par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:36a-16: snang ba med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1199E:36a-17: gnas med pa'i mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02TD1199E:36a-18: ma skyes pa'i sngon pa med pa dang /
T02TD1199E:36a-19: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD1199E:36a-20: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi yon tan bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:36a-21: gzhig tu med pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang chags pas gzung du med pa'i chos kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1199E:36a-22: nyer len med pa las kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1199E:36a-23: rdo rje'i bdag nyid rnal par smin pa'i sgrib pa med pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid de chos kyi skur gyur pa'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-24: de nas rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms la snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje la zhal bzhi pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:36a-25: aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga t'a sta th'a ham zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36a-26: da ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa lugs las bzlog la bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:36a-27: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gang las byung zhe na /
T02TD1199E:36a-28: zhi ba gsang ba'i bdag nyid las so //
T02TD1199E:36b-0: gsang ba gang las @36b she na /
T02TD1199E:36b-1: spyod pa rdo rje las so //
T02TD1199E:36b-2: spyod pa gang las byung zhe na /
T02TD1199E:36b-3: spyod yul zla ba gnyis pa las so //
T02TD1199E:36b-4: zla ba gnyis pa gang las byung zhe na /
T02TD1199E:36b-5: de nyid rtogs pa zla ba dang po las so //
T02TD1199E:36b-6: de ltar mngon par byang chub pa lnga ni /
T02TD1199E:36b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid mi slob pa'i lam gcig tu skye ba las so //
T02TD1199E:36b-8: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02TD1199E:36b-9: de ltar na mngal skyes kyi rim pa ji ltar 'thad ce na /
T02TD1199E:36b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1199E:36b-11: zla ba gnyis pa ni padma yin la /
T02TD1199E:36b-12: de'i steng gi rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas yin pas rdo rje padma'i steng du gnas zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36b-13: de nas 'od zer spro bsdu byas pa las so //
T02TD1199E:36b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung zhing de nyid las rnam par snang mdzad kyang 'byung ste /
T02TD1199E:36b-15: de ni rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang yin la /
T02TD1199E:36b-16: de nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang bskyed pas na rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i mngal skyes kyi rim pa bha ga dang padma'i sbyor ba las byung ba'o zhes 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:36b-17: de ltar rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:36b-18: da ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:36b-19: steng dang 'og tu sngags rnams dgod byas nas //
T02TD1199E:36b-20: zhes pa ni steng gi ri rab bo //
T02TD1199E:36b-21: 'og ni 'byung ba bzhi'i sngags bkod nas dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:36b-22: ri rgyal lhun po'i gzugs ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD1199E:36b-23: zhes pa ni sum las kha dog bzhi pa rtse mo brgyad dang ldan pa gser gyi ri bdun dang rol pa'i mtsho bdun gyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:36b-24: de'i steng du ae gru gsum las byung ba'i nam mkha' stong pa'i dbus su bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad de yongs su gyur pa las 'od zer sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo zag pa med pa'i srid pa las byung ba bsgoms la /
T02TD1199E:36b-25: de'i nang du pam las byung ba'i padma de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:36b-26: de nyid kyi rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:36b-27: rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan //
T02TD1199E:36b-29: rlung dang me'i steng du sa dang chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:36b-30: de'i sa bon gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:36b-31: ya ra la was shin tu mdzes par byas //
T02TD1199E:36b-33: 'byung ba bzhi'i sa bon las bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:36b-34: de nas steng zhes pa ni /
T02TD1199E:36b-35: sum las bskyed pa'i ri rab kyi steng du'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-1: las ni zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa'i yi ge bhr'um de nyid las so //
T02TD1199E:37a-2: rnam par snang mdzad de yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang de bzhin gshegs pas sku'i sgo nas brten cing /
T02TD1199E:37a-3: gsung gi sgo nas bsngags la /
T02TD1199E:37a-4: thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-5: gzhal yas khang rtse mo rdo rje rin po che las brtsegs pa'i nang du /
T02TD1199E:37a-6: rgyu'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lha'i sa bon sngags 'di bkod nas de dang bcas pa'i sku'i rnam par snang mdzad de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga par gyur nas de'i 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba las rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sku mdog dkar po bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-7: zla mdog dang mtshungs zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD1199E:37a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-9: de nas shar phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad ni dbu gsum phyag drug pa g-yas sdo zhing g-yon dmar ba dbus ma dkar ba 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1199E:37a-13: lcags kyu dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-14: don yod grub pa ni g-yas dkar ba g-yon dmar ba dbus ma ljang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-15: phyag dang po na sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-17: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas /
T02TD1199E:37a-18: byang du don yod grub pa ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-19: rin chen 'byung ldan zhal dbus ma ser zhing g-yas sngo ba dang g-yon dkar ba'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-20: phyag dang po gnyis ni rin po che dang /
T02TD1199E:37a-22: snang ba mtha' yas ni g-yas sngo zhing g-yon dkar ba dbus dmar ba'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-23: phyag dang po na padma dang dril bu bsdams pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-24: phyag lhag ma rnams ni thams cad kyang ral gri dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang /
T02TD1199E:37a-29: sgrol ma rnams ni rang rang gi gtso bo dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37a-31: drag mo dang rdo rje gzugs dang /
T02TD1199E:37a-32: rdo rje chags pa mo dang /
T02TD1199E:37a-33: rdo rje zhi ba mo dang /
T02TD1199E:37a-34: rdo rje gnod sbyin mo dang /
T02TD1199E:37a-36: rdo rje sgra can ma dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-0: rdo rje sa rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang sna tshogs @37b rdo rje dang ral gri dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37b-1: 'khor lo rim pa gnyis kyi phyi rol gyi zur la gling bu ma dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-4: rdza rnga bsnams pa sngo ba dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-7: ljang ba dang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1199E:37b-8: phyi rol gyi lha'i snam bu la bskal bzang bcu drug bkod nas /
T02TD1199E:37b-9: de'i zur du me tog ma dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-16: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i sgor ni lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-18: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:37b-19: de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-20: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-29: rigs drug gi sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:37b-30: de ltar bsnyen pa bsgom bzhin du sta gon gyi lha dgod pa byas nas /
T02TD1199E:37b-31: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshe de ltar lugs ma 'am /
T02TD1199E:37b-32: 'bur du brkos pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-33: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:37b-39: bstod pa ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya ba'o //
T02TD1199E:37b-40: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas /
T02TD1199E:37b-41: da ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:37b-42: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang bcas pa bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:37b-43: de'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la /
T02TD1199E:37b-44: zla ba phyed pa lta bu'i gzugs can ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri mo bzhis bskor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:37b-45: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i rdo rje sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
T02TD1199E:37b-47: lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:37b-48: de'i 'khor thams cad kyang skra 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-0: mtshams kyi me tog ma la sogs pa'i bar du lha mo thams cad kyang zhal gcig @38a * //
T02TD1199E:38a-1: phyag gnyis pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-2: 'di rnams ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams la goo r'i la sogs pa'i yig 'bru dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-4: dkar mo'i ni h'a ring ba'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-5: tsoo r'i'i ni hi thung ngo //
T02TD1199E:38a-12: me tog ma'i ni aa thung ngu'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-13: bdug pa mo'i ni a'a ring ba'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-14: mar me ma'i ni aa thung ngu'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-15: dri chab ma'i ni a'am ring po'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-16: sgo bzhir ni dzam ram bam h'um ngo //
T02TD1199E:38a-17: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i ra ba'i nang du dur khrod brgyad dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:38a-18: zhing skyong brgyad dang phyogs skyong brgyad dang /
T02TD1199E:38a-21: pho nya brgyad dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-22: de yang mnyam sbyor las 'byung ba'i rim pas gdul bya dang phyogs skyong ba de rnams ji ltar sngon byung ba'i rim pas bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:38a-23: drag po dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang khyab 'jug dang bcas pa tshangs pa ste /
T02TD1199E:38a-24: bdud bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba brgyad 'dul ba ni sngon bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling du byon nas /
T02TD1199E:38a-25: de rnams gdan bting bas rgyas btab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:38a-26: sems brgyal zhing ngag rengs nas rmongs par byas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:38a-27: btsun mo rnams phrogs shing tshogs kyi 'khor lo rnams gsol bas longs spyad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:38a-28: rnam par shes pa brgyal bas na thar par byas pa dang gnas gyur nas ye shes thob pas na slar thar pa mdzad do zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD1199E:38a-29: de ltar dbang byas pa dang longs spyad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:38a-30: btul ba'i rjes la slar yang gsos nas bsrung ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi dur khrod du bkod pa nyid du mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:38a-31: des 'dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:38a-32: thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1199E:38a-34: rigs drug gi he ru ka nyon mongs pa drug dang ldan pa'i sems can dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:38a-35: phyag g-yon pa na thod pa kha tv'am ga dang bcas pa bsnams shing /
T02TD1199E:38a-36: phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje 'bar ba bsnams pa rang gi brla g-yon pa mnan nas /
T02TD1199E:38a-37: phyed krung gis gar mdzad cing /
T02TD1199E:38a-38: gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgrang ba yi //
T02TD1199E:38a-39: rjes thogs nyid las 'gyur ba'i rgyal thob la //
T02TD1199E:38b-0: rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas @38b rmongs mdzad de //
T02TD1199E:38b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog ste kun gsol pa //
T02TD1199E:38b-2: rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog mdzad pa bstan du gsol //
T02TD1199E:38b-3: rnam pa sna tshogs rgyas gdab rmongs byas bstan du gsol //
T02TD1199E:38b-4: che mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhugs //
T02TD1199E:38b-5: h'um aa la la ho zhes pas btul nas /
T02TD1199E:38b-6: tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi dregs pa bcom nas rang gi btsun mo phrogs pa rnams kyang slar yang de la byin nas dur khrod kyi srung mar bzhag pa yin no zhes gtam rgyud rnying pas brjod pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:38b-7: de ltar btul zin pa'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs she na slar zhi ba'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:38b-8: 'od zer sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs //
T02TD1199E:38b-9: sangs rgyas sprin rnams rab tu spro //
T02TD1199E:38b-11: de lta bu'i dam tshig gi 'khor lo ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa la sogs pa las brgyad byas nas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor bsgoms na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD1199E:38b-12: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:38b-14: // / de ltar rab tu byed pa drug gis bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:38b-15: da ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu byed pa drug pa ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:38b-16: de la dang po tshogs 'khor gyi yan lag tu ngag gi brda bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38b-17: de la brda ni gnas skabs gnyis su dgod par gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:38b-18: de la thog mar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo 'du ba byed pas na brda shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems ma'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38b-19: tha mar tshogs 'khor byed pa'i dus su tha mal pa'i ngag dor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i brdar gyur pa 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38b-20: de yang chos bcu gcig pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1199E:38b-21: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02TD1199E:38b-22: chu skyar las ni chu yin te //
T02TD1199E:38b-23: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02TD1199E:38b-24: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
T02TD1199E:38b-26: rdo rje theg pa 'di las ni ngag gi brda dang /
T02TD1199E:38b-28: yan lag gi brda rnam pa gsum gyis phan tshun tha snyad du bya'o //
T02TD1199E:38b-29: de yang ji lta bu la tha snyad du bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:38b-30: mkha' 'gro ma'i kun du spyod pa las //
T02TD1199E:38b-31: dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang //
T02TD1199E:39a-2: de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma //
T02TD1199E:39a-4: de rnams su mtshan nyid cis mtshon zhe na /
T02TD1199E:39a-6: spyod lam dang mtshan nyid gsum gyis shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:39a-7: dbyibs ni lus po ring thung dang phra ba dang lag pa'i ri mo dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:39a-8: spyod lam ni gos dang dri dang khyim du ri mo 'dri ba dang /
T02TD1199E:39a-9: mal du 'dre zhing ldog pa dang /
T02TD1199E:39a-10: srog chags kyi rigs dga' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:39a-11: mi dga' ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:39a-12: de la dang po ngag gi brda bstan to //
T02TD1199E:39a-13: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhes pa nas bshad du gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis mdor bstan to //
T02TD1199E:39a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni brda mi shes pa las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD1199E:39a-15: bka' stsal to zhes pa ni bar gyi skabs dbye ba bstan te /
T02TD1199E:39a-16: mu mug ces pa nas 'dus pa nyid du bya zhes pa'i bar gyis dgyes rdor gyi rgyud kyi brda bstan to //
T02TD1199E:39a-17: mu khyi zhes pa nas dri sta zhes pa'i bar gyis gdan bzhi'i brda bstan to //
T02TD1199E:39a-18: da ni zhes pa nas au du spar sha na zhes pa'i bar gyis 'khor lo bde mchog gi brda bstan to //
T02TD1199E:39a-19: brda da dag ni le'u bdun pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po nas ston pas de 'dir ma bshad do //
T02TD1199E:39a-20: de dag gi steng dang 'og na gnas zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab la brdar btags pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:39a-21: phyag rgya phyag rgya'i len zhes pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus sam /
T02TD1199E:39a-22: dbang bskur ba'i dus su ngo shes par byed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:39a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brdar gyur pa 'di brjod na ngag gi 'khrul 'khor las dngos grub bskyed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:39a-24: brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:39a-27: dbang gi lha mo bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:39a-28: rdo rje snying po'i zhes pa'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis nyon cig ces skabs dbye ba bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:39a-29: de la bde mchog gi rgyud 'bum pa'i nang nas gsungs pa'i lha mo bdun gyi mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa ni gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma gnyis ni rgyal rigs te sangs rgyas spyan dang nye ba'i rigs so //
T02TD1199E:39a-30: mdzes ma dang yongs gyur ma gnyis ni rje'u'i rigs te /
T02TD1199E:39a-31: sgrol ma dang nye ba'i rigs so //
T02TD1199E:39b-0: byis bcas mo dang mi ldog ma @39b gnyis ni bram ze'i rigs te /
T02TD1199E:39b-1: gos dkar mo dang de'i nye ba'i rigs so //
T02TD1199E:39b-2: 'di dpa' mo zhes pa ni dmangs rigs mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs su 'gyur ba yin te /
T02TD1199E:39b-3: nye ba'i rigs ni med do //
T02TD1199E:39b-4: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni rtogs par sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD1199E:39b-5: de'i khyim du ji lta bu zhig 'dri zhe na /
T02TD1199E:39b-6: sangs rgyas spyan gyi rigs gnyis kyis thod pa dang dgra sta 'dri bar byed do //
T02TD1199E:39b-7: sgrol ma'i rigs gnyis kyis mche ba dang rgyal mtshan 'dri bar byed do //
T02TD1199E:39b-8: gos dkar mo'i rigs gnyis kyis ral gri dang dgra sta 'dri bar byed do //
T02TD1199E:39b-9: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs gnyis kyis khyim du dung 'dri bar byed do //
T02TD1199E:39b-10: lus sprul pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni drag po 'jigs byed kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya khyim du 'dri bar byed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:39b-11: brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:39b-13: // / de ltar dbang gi lha mo bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:39b-14: da ni dag byed kyi lha mo dang /
T02TD1199E:39b-16: bkas gnang ba'i lha mo dang gsum gyi mtshan nyid ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:39b-17: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1199E:39b-18: mdzes pa yi ni mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1199E:39b-21: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis padma'i rigs kyi dag byed kyi lha mo bshad do //
T02TD1199E:39b-22: lus ni sngo bsangs cung zad skya //
T02TD1199E:39b-24: mkha' 'gro ma ni shes par bya //
T02TD1199E:39b-25: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha mo mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02TD1199E:39b-26: dmar zhing ser la mig dmar zhing //
T02TD1199E:39b-29: ces pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha'i rigs bshad do //
T02TD1199E:39b-30: bud gang ser zhing cung zad sngo //
T02TD1199E:39b-32: bde gshegs rigs kyi rjes 'gro yin //
T02TD1199E:39b-33: zhes pa'i bar gyis dag byed kyi lha mo rin po che'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02TD1199E:39b-34: cung zad sngo zhing cung zad ljang //
T02TD1199E:39b-35: zhes pa nas rdo rje phag mo'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02TD1199E:39b-36: ser zhing ser ba'i mdog tu snang //
T02TD1199E:39b-39: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha mo du ma skyes ma'i rigs kyi lha mo bstan to //
T02TD1199E:39b-40: bud med gang zhig sha la sred //
T02TD1199E:39b-42: he ru ka yi rigs 'byung yin //
T02TD1199E:39b-43: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha mo mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs bstan to //
T02TD1199E:40a-1: gang zhig mdog ni sprin sngon 'dra //
T02TD1199E:40a-3: mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med //
T02TD1199E:40a-4: ces pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha mo gzugs can ma'i rigs bstan to //
T02TD1199E:40a-5: gang gis skra ni 'khyil pa dang //
T02TD1199E:40a-8: zhes pa'i bar gyis bkas gnang ba'i lha mo padma'i rigs bstan to //
T02TD1199E:40a-9: dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang //
T02TD1199E:40a-11: phyag rgya'i lan du 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1199E:40a-12: zhes pa'i bar gyi bkas gnang ba'i lha mo las kyi rigs bstan to //
T02TD1199E:40a-13: thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang //
T02TD1199E:40a-15: khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed //
T02TD1199E:40a-16: ces pa'i bar gyis bkas gnang ba'i lha mo he ru ka'i rigs bstan to //
T02TD1199E:40a-17: lus kun la ni ba spu yod //
T02TD1199E:40a-19: khyim du mche ba bris te mchod /
T02TD1199E:40a-20: ces pa'i bar gyis bkas gnang ba'i phag mo'i rigs su bstan to //
T02TD1199E:40a-21: brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:40a-23: // / de ltar mtshan nyid bstan nas dpa' bo'i lha mo'i brda bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:40a-24: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1199E:40a-26: slob dpon gnyis pas bskul bar bya //
T02TD1199E:40a-27: zhes pa'i bar gyis brda'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02TD1199E:40a-28: brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:40a-30: // / de ltar brda dang mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:40a-31: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams bsags nas /
T02TD1199E:40a-32: de'i gnas bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:40a-33: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1199E:40a-35: mdzes pa'i bshes la nan tan bya //
T02TD1199E:40a-36: zhes pa'i bar gyis mdor bstan te //
T02TD1199E:40a-37: mdza' ba dam pa kun 'dus pa //
T02TD1199E:40a-38: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02TD1199E:40a-40: de la ci phyir dam pa zhes bya ba ni dri'i thig le'i dkyil 'khor dang me tog gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1199E:40a-42: phyag mtshan dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1199E:40a-43: lag pa'i phyag rgya dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1199E:40a-44: sku phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor las tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di dam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:40a-45: de lta bu'i mdza' ba dam pa kun 'dus pa ste /
T02TD1199E:40a-46: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams bsnyen bsgrub bzhis lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga la dgos pa med pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i longs spyod bya'o //
T02TD1199E:40b-0: de yang lhag @40b ma ni gcig la gcig gis zos pa'i lhag ma la rtog pa med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:40b-1: snod gnyis ni rang bzhin gyi don snod gnyis la longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:40b-2: mdzes pa'i bshos la nan tan bya //
T02TD1199E:40b-3: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus la lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:40b-4: lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dgang gzar blugs gzar du byas la phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor lnga'i zhal du aom sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1199E:40b-6: ba sham ku ru ho dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-7: m'a ra ya phat dang bcas pa nang gi sbyin sreg byas pa ni nan tan du byas zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:40b-8: de'i gnas gang lags zhes zhus pa dang bde mchog gi rgyud dang sbyar nas gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'am /
T02TD1199E:40b-9: dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang sbyar nas gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:40b-10: de yang dur khrod bzhi dang bcas pa gnas bcu bzhi yin no //
T02TD1199E:40b-11: sngon gdul bya 'dul ba'i ched du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnas sprul pa'i sku'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:40b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa de yang gdul bya rnams kyi brda dang sbyar nas lha rnams kyi gnas zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-13: dri za rnams kyi nye ba'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-14: gnod sbyin rnams kyi zhing zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-15: de'i 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i zhing zhes btags pa dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-16: srin po rnams kyi tshando ha zhes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-17: 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i tsha ndo ha zhes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-19: 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i 'du sa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-20: lha ma yin rnams kyi dur khrod dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-21: 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i dur khrod dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-22: mi 'am ci rnams kyi grong mtha' dang nye ba'i grong mtha' zhes bya ba'i brdas btags pa dang /
T02TD1199E:40b-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa'i sa bcu gnyis kyi yul stong pa nyid kyang de nyid dang tha mi dad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:40b-24: de'i gnas kyi dbye ba zhus pa'i lan du /
T02TD1199E:40b-25: gnas ni dz'a landha ra zhes pa nas /
T02TD1199E:40b-26: de yang dur khrod ces pa'i bar gyis ming bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:40b-27: de dag las lhag pa'i yul bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:40b-28: rdul bral yul na tsu ta'i shing //
T02TD1199E:40b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yul brgyad na shing brgyad gnas pa /
T02TD1199E:40b-30: phyogs skyong brgyad gnas pa btul nas dur khrod kyi bdag por bzhag pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:40b-31: de yang 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:41a-0: sngon byung ba rdo rje gdan nyid du @41a * //
T02TD1199E:41a-1: drag po 'jigs byed nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
T02TD1199E:41a-2: 'dul byed sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum gyis btul nas /
T02TD1199E:41a-3: skyes pa rnams lus dang ngag dang yid gsum dbang du byas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:41a-4: btsun mo dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo la longs spyod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:41a-5: gdul bya de nyid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gags pas srog thim pa dang /
T02TD1199E:41a-6: ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes thim pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:41a-7: de dang rjes su mthun par grong mtha' dang /
T02TD1199E:41a-9: dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod dang /
T02TD1199E:41a-11: khva ddong [*khvad dong?] ma la sogs pas de bzhin du btul ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:41a-12: rdul bral gyi yul nas dz'a landha ra'i bar du phyi rol gyi yul rnams su zhing skyong brgyad dbang du byas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:41a-13: longs spyod pa dang thim pa'i rjes la slar g-yos nas dur khrod du srung mar bzhag pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:41a-14: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:41a-15: rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas ni //
T02TD1199E:41a-16: las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed //
T02TD1199E:41a-17: phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni //
T02TD1199E:41a-20: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
T02TD1199E:41a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:41a-22: rnal 'byor ma yi brda yis bshad //
T02TD1199E:41a-23: ces pa ni sngon gyi gdul bya rnams kyis brdar btags pa'o //
T02TD1199E:41a-24: pu la sogs pa ji bzhin du //
T02TD1199E:41a-25: zhes pa ni pull'i ra ma la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'am /
T02TD1199E:41a-26: bzhi bcu tham pa sngon ji ltar grub pa bzhin du 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas su dgod pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:41a-27: nang du lus kyi gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:41a-28: bu ga bzhi la lha'i 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan la dgod pas na /
T02TD1199E:41a-29: phyi dang nang du bsam par bya //
T02TD1199E:41a-31: de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ltar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:41a-32: de skad du mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:41a-33: thod pa padmo yin par bshad //
T02TD1199E:41a-34: kha tv'am ga yang rgyal mtshan che //
T02TD1199E:41a-35: sangs rgyas phyag rgya padmo rnams //
T02TD1199E:41a-36: bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin //
T02TD1199E:41a-37: sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1199E:41a-38: skyes bu sangs rgyas kun bshad do //
T02TD1199E:41a-39: 'di nyid dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD1199E:41a-40: lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na //
T02TD1199E:41a-41: skye bo dam can kun tshogs pa //
T02TD1199E:41a-42: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa na //
T02TD1199E:41b-0: de rnams @41b kyi 'du ba'i dus bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:41b-1: yi dags phyogs kyi bcu bzhi dang //
T02TD1199E:41b-2: zhes bya ba mar gyi ngo'i nyi shu dgu dang /
T02TD1199E:41b-3: tshes bzhi la mchod pa chen po bya ste /
T02TD1199E:41b-4: rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon gyis bsad //
T02TD1199E:41b-5: ces pa ni gsal shing la bskyon pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:41b-7: skye ba bdun pa bsten par bya //
T02TD1199E:41b-8: zhes pa ni skye ba bdun pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:41b-9: bde mchog las 'byung ba bzhin du phyugs bdun gyis bya'o //
T02TD1199E:41b-10: 'bad de snying rje bskyed nas su //
T02TD1199E:41b-11: mkhas pas gsad pa'i las rnams bya //
T02TD1199E:41b-12: zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:41b-13: bag zan las byas pa'i phyugs nang du khrag gis bkang la tsandan dmar pos byugs nas dkar gsum dang mngar gsum ldan pa ro dang gcig tu gyur pa'i zas de mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma sbyin pa dang /
T02TD1199E:41b-14: rnal 'byor pas tshogs kyi bza' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:41b-15: nang gi sbyin sreg bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:41b-16: de ltar rnal 'byor pas ji lta bur bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:41b-18: de bas kun du snying rje spyad //
T02TD1199E:41b-20: bdag dang gzhan mnyam nyid du sems pa'i rnal 'byor pas mkha' 'gro ma rnams la 'tsho ba'i thabs med pas na snying rje bskyed pas sha dang khrag de sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:41b-21: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:41b-22: bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs //
T02TD1199E:41b-23: tsandan dmar pos bsgrubs pa dang //
T02TD1199E:41b-24: bag phye zan las byas pa'i sha / rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:41b-25: las dang po pas de ltar yin du zin kyang /
T02TD1199E:41b-26: brtan pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:41b-27: gso bar nus na dngos su bsgral bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02TD1199E:41b-28: ji ltar bdag bzhin sems can de //
T02TD1199E:41b-29: de ltar sems can de bzhin bdag / ji ltar rnal 'byor pas bsams na //
T02TD1199E:41b-30: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:41b-31: zhes pas bdag dang gzhan brje ba'i snying rje chen pos phyis gso bar nus na dngos su bsgral bar gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:41b-32: brtag pa lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:41b-35: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:41b-36: gsang ba'i padma'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1199E:41b-37: zhes pa ni rgyud kyi rim pa 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:42a-1: dang ye shes 'dres pa zhes pa ni sems kyi rgyud dang sngags kyi rim pa'i rjes la rgyal ba bzhi'i ye shes kyi rim pa'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-3: gsang ba'i rim pas de la stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-4: de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa yin pas na ye shes rtogs pa'i dbang phyug nyan par 'tshal ba'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-5: de ltar zhus pa'i rjes la bka' stsal pa ni /
T02TD1199E:42a-6: byang chub rim pa'i rdo rje can //
T02TD1199E:42a-7: gdan bzhi pa ni yang dag bsten //
T02TD1199E:42a-9: bdag gi gdan rgyud kyi rim pa dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-10: gzhan gyi gdan gtum mo drod kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-11: sbyor ba'i gdan dga' ba bzhi'i rim pa dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-12: gsang ba'i gdan stong pa nyid kyi rim pa dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-13: byang chub pa'i rim pa rdo rje can zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-14: de yang gnas gang du bsgom zhe na /
T02TD1199E:42a-15: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su //
T02TD1199E:42a-16: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
T02TD1199E:42a-18: de'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:42a-19: 'dod chags la sogs rigs spangs te //
T02TD1199E:42a-20: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis bkod do //
T02TD1199E:42a-21: da ni bsgom pa'i thabs ston te //
T02TD1199E:42a-22: spyi bo nas ni rkang mthar thug / ces pa la spyi bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-23: rkang pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:42a-24: rtsa yi gsang ba padma ste //
T02TD1199E:42a-25: zhes pa ni snying ga sa dang lte ba me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:42a-26: cha dang mdog ni sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1199E:42a-28: cha ni spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-29: lkog ma'i bcu drug dang snying ga'i brgyad dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-30: lte ba'i drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-31: mdog ni 'khor lo bzhi la yi ge dgod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-32: de bzhin du ni gdan dag ste //
T02TD1199E:42a-33: zhes pa ni yi ge dgod pa de bzhin du 'khor lo bzhi la dga' ba bzhis gdan du byas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-34: de ltar ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:42a-35: sku spyi gtsug tu dga' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-36: gsung lkog mar mchog dga' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-37: thugs snying gar sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang /
T02TD1199E:42a-38: rdo rje'i lte bar lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:42a-39: chos kyi dbyings su rol pa ni //
T02TD1199E:42a-41: lte ba me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi dbus su byang chub sems kyi rol pa'o //
T02TD1199E:42a-42: 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan pa des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD1199E:42a-43: bsdus te gong bu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1199E:42a-44: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:42b-0: @42b 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1199E:42b-1: bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas nas /
T02TD1199E:42b-2: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1199E:42b-3: de ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:42b-4: sngags dang ye shes kyi rim pa bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:42b-5: chu dang me yi khams dag gis //
T02TD1199E:42b-6: gcig tu gyur pa go 'phang mchog / ces smos te /
T02TD1199E:42b-7: me'i khams gtum mo drod kyi rim pas bsregs nas /
T02TD1199E:42b-8: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun dang 'khor lo bzhi la ro gcig par gyur pas na /
T02TD1199E:42b-9: bde ba'i go 'phang mchog ces bya'o //
T02TD1199E:42b-10: de ltar gtum mo drod shes rab dang byang chub kyi sems thabs kyi sbyor ba las lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa thob nas dbang po drug dang phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dag sangs rgyas nyid du yang dag par mthong bas /
T02TD1199E:42b-11: bstan bcos las byung ba'i lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid yang dag par shes pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:42b-12: de ltar sngags dang ye shes kyi rim pa yang dag par bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:42b-13: da ni gsang ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:42b-14: slob dpon lung gi rjes 'gro zhing //
T02TD1199E:42b-15: gsang chen de nyid don bsgoms pa //
T02TD1199E:42b-16: zhes pa ni slob dpon gyis nyams su myong ba'i mngon sum gyi lam bstan nas sems kyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa ni gsang chen de nyid kyi don bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:42b-17: gcig nas gcig brgyud de nyid can //
T02TD1199E:42b-18: zhes pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bla ma'i brgyud pas so //
T02TD1199E:42b-19: stong pa nyid la sogs mtshan nyid //
T02TD1199E:42b-20: ces pa ni stong pa nyid dang sogs kyis mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i tshogs thams cad mtshon par bya ba dbang gi dus kyis mtshon par byed pas na /
T02TD1199E:42b-21: thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas //
T02TD1199E:42b-24: snod dang bcud thams cad gzhal bya yin zhing dbang gi dus su skyes pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin la /
T02TD1199E:42b-25: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rnam pas chos thams cad gzhal bya yin no //
T02TD1199E:42b-27: dri ma bkrus pa'i lus kyis ni //
T02TD1199E:42b-28: mngon par byang chub rim par 'gro //
T02TD1199E:42b-30: ye shes kyi rim pa stong pa nyid bsgoms pas /
T02TD1199E:42b-31: mngon par byang chub pa lnga yis lha bskyed pa dang 'dra bar stong pa'i byang chub dang /
T02TD1199E:42b-32: yig 'bru bsdu ba dang sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:43a-1: dgod pa dang mtshungs par 'gro ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:43a-3: shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:43a-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02TD1199E:43a-5: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:43a-7: las dang po pa bskyed pa'i rim pa la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin na byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas lhar bskyed nas bsgom pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:43a-8: yang na me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du skad cig rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43a-9: ji lta bu bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:43a-12: sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no //
T02TD1199E:43a-13: phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings te //
T02TD1199E:43a-14: zhes pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bkan te mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar nas gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs bar ma sprad nas chos 'byung gru gsum nyis rtseg tu gyur pa'i phyag rgya ni phyag rgya che bcings te /
T02TD1199E:43a-15: de rang nyid kyi thugs kar 'dzin par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:43a-16: gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1199E:43a-17: zhes pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:43a-18: ye shes padma'i gdan la bsam //
T02TD1199E:43a-19: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi snang ba'i padma'i gdan la bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43a-20: chu shing me tog lte ba nas //
T02TD1199E:43a-21: snying ga'i bar du 'greng ste gnas //
T02TD1199E:43a-22: zhes pa ni snying padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa'i steng du yig 'bru brgyad bkod la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43a-23: sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1199E:43a-24: zhes pa ni sngar rgyud kyi rim pa las bshad pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad phyir bzlog nas kha gyen du bstan pa'i bar du /
T02TD1199E:43a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bon yi ge aom dkar po dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43a-26: de gyur pa las bdag nyid dang 'dra ba zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD1199E:43a-27: rnam par shes pa dang ye shes mtshon par byed pa dri ma med pa'i sku bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43a-29: dbus na gnas pa rnam shes te //
T02TD1199E:43a-30: ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing //
T02TD1199E:43a-31: dri med ye shes skur snang yang //
T02TD1199E:43a-32: dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol //
T02TD1199E:43a-34: shar gyi 'dab ma la yi ge aam las mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:43b-0: lho'i 'dab mar aum las @43b rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD1199E:43b-1: nub kyi 'dab ma la yi ge aem las 'od dpag med dang /
T02TD1199E:43b-2: byang gi 'dab mar aom las don yod grub pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43b-3: kha cig na re nyi zla kha sbyor gyi dbus su yig 'bru bcug la de zhu ba las sgong skyes kyi rim pas bskyed par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD1199E:43b-4: dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon //
T02TD1199E:43b-5: zhes pa ni aa ai au ae ao ste thabs kyi rang bzhin byung ba rnams so //
T02TD1199E:43b-6: zla phyed thig ler ldan pa zhes pa ni /
T02TD1199E:43b-7: steng du zla ba phyed pa'i thig le dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:43b-8: 'od dang ldan pa rim bzhin dgod //
T02TD1199E:43b-9: ces bya ba ni 'od kyi gong bu lnga dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1199E:43b-10: sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon dang 'od dang bcas pa'i skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43b-12: sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod //
T02TD1199E:43b-13: ces pa ni ri r'i dang li l'i bzhi yum bzhi'i sa bon te 'od kyi gong bu'i dbus su'o //
T02TD1199E:43b-14: de skad du yang gdan bzhi las //
T02TD1199E:43b-15: rdul phran tsa na lta bu'i gzugs //
T02TD1199E:43b-16: a'a li k'a li'i sa bon ni //
T02TD1199E:43b-17: rdul phran zhes bya dbus su ste //
T02TD1199E:43b-18: rnam pa med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1199E:43b-20: de yi dbus su de yi sems //
T02TD1199E:43b-21: yi ge ru ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1199E:43b-22: zhes pa ni sems mtshon par byed pa'i thabs bskyed rim gyi yi ges rdzogs rim gyi bde ba'i thabs mtshon pas na de'i sems yi ger sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43b-23: de ltar lha dgod pa'i rjes la lag pa g-yas pa dgang gzar g-yon blugs gzar du byas nas /
T02TD1199E:43b-24: rdo rje mer byin gyis brlabs nas phyi dang nang gi lha mos mchod nas dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'am /
T02TD1199E:43b-25: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43b-26: las dang po pa'i bskyed rim la mos na rdo rje gdan bzhi dang mthun par mtshon byed yin te /
T02TD1199E:43b-27: bsnyen bsgrub bzhis lhar bskyed la 'khor lo bzhi la dkyil 'khor bzhi bkod nas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1199E:43b-28: mchod pa dang bstod pa'i rjes la tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod pa byas la /
T02TD1199E:43b-29: rdo rje'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:43b-30: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1199E:43b-31: ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing //
T02TD1199E:43b-32: dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa //
T02TD1199E:43b-33: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1199E:43b-34: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can //
T02TD1199E:43b-36: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1199E:44a-0: @44a * // sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi //
T02TD1199E:44a-2: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1199E:44a-3: srid gsum 'bar ba'i sku ni rjes chags ldan //
T02TD1199E:44a-4: 'od zer sngon po stong phrag nyi ma stong dang ldan //
T02TD1199E:44a-5: rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dpar ldan //
T02TD1199E:44a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchod dang sngags pa lhan cig gar byed shog / rnam pa mang po 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa //
T02TD1199E:44a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas rnam par sprul /
T02TD1199E:44a-8: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1199E:44a-9: rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa //
T02TD1199E:44a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu mas thams cad rnam sprul rnam par sprul //
T02TD1199E:44a-11: h'um h'um h'um zhes bya ba'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:44a-13: dbyibs dang dri dang ro bde bas //
T02TD1199E:44a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog / lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri //
T02TD1199E:44a-15: ro dang reg pa bde myong bas //
T02TD1199E:44a-16: sangs rgyas sgyu mar byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1199E:44a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1199E:44a-18: dngos grub dang ni bde ba rnams //
T02TD1199E:44a-21: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:44a-22: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sems 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin yi ge dang /
T02TD1199E:44a-26: rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:44a-28: stong pa'i mtshan nyid med pa las //
T02TD1199E:44a-29: ji ltar yi ge sbyar bar bgyi //
T02TD1199E:44a-30: zhes zhus pa'i lan bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:44a-31: stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni //
T02TD1199E:44a-32: chu shing snyi ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin //
T02TD1199E:44a-33: zhes pa ni sems kyis stong pa nyid mtshon par byed pa lha'i yig 'bru kun du brtags pa yin pas //
T02TD1199E:44a-34: dper na chu shing snying po med kyang 'bras bu'i ro mngar bar 'byung ba bzhin du yi ge'i snying po med pa las bde ba stong pa snying por 'gyur ba mtshon pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:44a-35: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i bde ba skyes nas stong pa nyid bsgoms pas chog mod yi ge bsgom pa ci dgos she na /
T02TD1199E:44a-37: bya ba'i rgyud bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par zhen pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams rgyud 'dir 'jug pa ni yi ge la mngon par zhen pas de'i don bshad do //
T02TD1199E:44b-0: yan @44b lag med pa'i rdo rje ni bde ba stong pa nyid dran pa sad par byed pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T02TD1199E:44b-1: dbus kyi rnam shes ye shes de //
T02TD1199E:44b-2: zhes pa ni lus kyi dbus na rnam shes de dga' ba gsum dang ye shes bde ba chen po rtog pa med pa gnas pa'i 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin ye shes ni yi ge'i gzugs su med cing mtshon bya dang mtshon byed dang bral bas /
T02TD1199E:44b-3: mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku'o //
T02TD1199E:44b-5: gang zag gi bdag gis stong pas dngos po las 'gro zhing nyams su myong ba sgyu ma ltar gnas pas dngos po med pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
T02TD1199E:44b-6: yi ge lnga'i gzugs su med kyang nyams su myong ba dang stong pa'i dbus nas bde ba rtog pa med par gnas pa de nyid la rnal 'byor pas sems gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:44b-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis ni //
T02TD1199E:44b-8: mtshan nyid ji bzhin shes byas nas //
T02TD1199E:44b-10: karma mu dra la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang mnyam par sbyor bas /
T02TD1199E:44b-11: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shes par byas nas nyams su myong ba'i rjes la /
T02TD1199E:44b-12: de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam du 'gro ba bla ma nyid kyi lung las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:44b-13: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam du ji ltar 'gro zhe na rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang bas sems kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las /
T02TD1199E:44b-14: bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i las bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:44b-15: bde ba rtog med kyis kun nas bslang bas bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du 'gro'i mi g-yo ba'i las bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:44b-16: bde ba chen por rtogs nas 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid du shes nas /
T02TD1199E:44b-17: de ni myur du byang chub kyi lam du rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:44b-18: de ltar rgyud kyi rim pa lha'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1199E:44b-19: sngags kyi rim pa yi ge'i 'khor lo bstan nas thig le ye shes kyi rim pa bsgom pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:44b-20: ye shes rnam shes gzugs dag ni //
T02TD1199E:44b-21: bstan bcos las ni mtshan nyid brtag / de kho na nyid dpa' bos bshad //
T02TD1199E:44b-22: ces pa ni rnam shes dga' ba gsum dang /
T02TD1199E:45a-0: ye shes 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin thig le'i gzugs su bshad pa'i bstan bcos kyis mtshon par byed pa dpa' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes pa ni @45a * //
T02TD1199E:45a-2: 'od zer dkar pos rnam brgyan par //
T02TD1199E:45a-3: 'di ni kun du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:45a-4: zhes pa ni gnas lngar byang chub sems kyi thig le bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:45a-5: de yang yi ge gang gis mtshon par bya zhe na dbus su byang chub kyi sems mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge kshum dang bshad pa'i dangs ma'i mtshon byed smram dang /
T02TD1199E:45a-6: gci ba'i dangs ma mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD1199E:45a-7: sha'i dangs ma'i mtshon byed ymryum /
T02TD1199E:45a-8: khrag gi dangs ma'i mtshon byed kshmryum dang /
T02TD1199E:45a-9: brtsegs pa lnga'i mchod rten snying gar bcug ste bkod nas 'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs can du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:45a-10: de'i rjes la mgo bo dang /
T02TD1199E:45a-13: snying ga dang lte bar yang yi ge de rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:45a-14: bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par bya //
T02TD1199E:45a-15: snying ga'i padma'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1199E:45a-16: mthe bong tsam gyis zlum por bya //
T02TD1199E:45a-17: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi mtshan ma yungs kar gyi tshad tsam bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:45a-18: de ltar rtsa dang thig le'i gnas lugs sangs rgyas dkon mchog bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:45a-19: chos dkon mchog ni de'i dbus kyi sa bon ni /
T02TD1199E:45a-20: a'a li k'a li dag las btu //
T02TD1199E:45a-21: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i brtsegs pa'i mchod rten lnga bsam pa'am /
T02TD1199E:45a-23: phyogs bzhir ai dang au dang ae dang ao de rnams kha dog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba gtum mo drod ni mtshon byed bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:45a-24: de nas dge 'dun dkon mchog ni gtum mo drod kyi thig le bzhu nas de'i dbus kyi sgo rnams la bdud rtsi lnga ro gcig pa'i thig le rab tu bsam par grags pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:45a-26: skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong cha //
T02TD1199E:45a-27: rdul phran kun du rnam par gnas //
T02TD1199E:45a-29: skra'i rtse mo ltar phra ba aa wa dh'u t'i'i dbus su'o //
T02TD1199E:45a-30: der ci zhig mtshon par bya zhe na rnam par shes pa'i dngos po'o //
T02TD1199E:45a-31: mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can //
T02TD1199E:45a-32: sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes pas //
T02TD1199E:45a-33: thig le gnas nas go 'phang blta //
T02TD1199E:45b-0: bde ba rtog med rtogs par dka' ba bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ro gcig pa'i thig le de kho na nyid kyi man ngag thabs kyi thig les bdag @45b po'i rkyen byas nas /
T02TD1199E:45b-1: nang gi lus reg bya la brten nas bde ba rtog pa med pa skye ste /
T02TD1199E:45b-2: de bas na mtshon par byed ces bya'o //
T02TD1199E:45b-3: thig le bsgom pa la bye brag du yod ce na /
T02TD1199E:45b-4: snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo dang ni //
T02TD1199E:45b-5: thigs pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu //
T02TD1199E:45b-7: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1199E:45b-8: de'i dbus su byang chub sems kyi thig le bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1199E:45b-9: thigs pa'i lam ni spyi gtsug nas 'bab pa'i lam ni lkog ma dang snying ga nas babs pa'i lam gyi sgo ni lte ba'o //
T02TD1199E:45b-10: gnas de dag tu byang chub sems kyi thig le mi shigs pa'i rlangs pa can gyi /
T02TD1199E:45b-11: wa santa dang ti la ka bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:45b-12: rjes su dpag pa'i lam gyis ci'i phyir mi rtogs she na /
T02TD1199E:45b-13: phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang //
T02TD1199E:45b-14: bstan bcos las kyang ring ba yin //
T02TD1199E:45b-16: mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las kyang sems kyi stong nyid bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:45b-17: bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste //
T02TD1199E:45b-18: de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka' //
T02TD1199E:45b-20: bstan bcos las bshad pa yin yang bla ma'i gdams ngag dang bral bas mngon sum du myong ba ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:45b-21: de ltar thig le bsgom pa bshad nas //
T02TD1199E:45b-22: chags pa'i lam gyi gsang ba'i rim pa bsgom pa bshad pa ni bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la gus pa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos /
T02TD1199E:45b-23: las kyi phyag rgya la dmigs nas //
T02TD1199E:45b-24: mi g-yo 'tshe ba med pa ru ste mi g-yo ba ni rtog pa med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:45b-25: 'tshe ba med pa ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:45b-26: mnyam par bzhag ste dngos po bsgom //
T02TD1199E:45b-27: zhes pa ni yul reg bya'i stong pa nyid bsgoms pas chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas par shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:45b-28: de ltar chags pa'i lam bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:45b-29: grol ba'i lam bas chos kyi phyag rgya la gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:45b-30: chos kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te //
T02TD1199E:45b-33: chos ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yid kyi mngon sum gyi yul yin pas na chos so //
T02TD1199E:45b-34: de yang yid bde ba bskyed pa'i yul ni chos kyi phyag rgya yin pas /
T02TD1199E:45b-35: yid kyis 'jug cing rtog pa dang bcas pa'i yid ni 'dag par byed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:45b-36: yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1199E:45b-37: zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i tshe /
T02TD1199E:46a-1: rgyal po dang 'dra bas kun nas bslang nas ngag gi smra ba dang lus kyi byed pa 'byung bas de bas na thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin las byung bar blo dang ldan pas shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:46a-2: yid thams cad bskyed pa rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na /
T02TD1199E:46a-3: ji ltar rtog pa med pa'i ye shes skye zhe na /
T02TD1199E:46a-4: gal te bzlas brjod rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:46a-5: snying gis bsam dang bsgom pa ste //
T02TD1199E:46a-6: sdom dang rgyur gyur sa bon ni //
T02TD1199E:46a-7: de kho na ni gzugs yin no //
T02TD1199E:46a-9: bzlas brjod ces pa ni rlung me'i drod can no //
T02TD1199E:46a-10: de kho nar ni gzugs yin no zhes pa ni bde ba bskyed kyang stong pa mi rtog pa'o //
T02TD1199E:46a-12: de kho na nyid mthong ba yin //
T02TD1199E:46a-13: zhes pa ni rgyu sngags kyi rim pa dang 'bras bu ye shes kyi rim pa ni de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i rim pa slob dpon gyis ma bstan par rtogs pa ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:46a-14: gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la //
T02TD1199E:46a-15: sa bon lnga ni dmigs par bya //
T02TD1199E:46a-16: zhes pa ni yul 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i steng du yi ge lnga'i mchod rten bsam pas yul lnga la rtog pa med pa'i thabs yin no //
T02TD1199E:46a-17: kun nas kun du 'jug pa'i tshe //
T02TD1199E:46a-18: mgo dang mgo min yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:46a-19: zhes pa ni yul kun la rmongs pa'i dbang gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa 'byung ba na /
T02TD1199E:46a-20: mgo ni spyi gtsug nas mgo min gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshams kyi bar du gnas pa'i rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i lte ba'i bu ga ru dbugs 'byung 'jug aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug nas gnas pas na /
T02TD1199E:46a-21: rtag tu rtsa bar gzir bar bya //
T02TD1199E:46a-23: rtsa gsum gyi sum mdo lte ba'i rtsa bar dus rtag tu rlung bcug nas byang chub sems kyi thig les sgo bcad bzhin du bkag na rnam shes dang ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:46a-24: de yang lha mo dpal mo'i zhal nas yul la mchod rten brtsigs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:46a-25: lus la sgo bcad pa ni rtog med skye ba'i thabs yin te /
T02TD1199E:46a-26: yul rtog med skye ba ni yi ge lnga dran par byed la rlung nang du btsug pas ni rtog pa'i rkyen ma tshang bar byas nas rtog pa med pa skye ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:46a-27: don dam snying po'i nang nas kyang //
T02TD1199E:46a-28: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T02TD1199E:46a-29: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med pa //
T02TD1199E:46a-30: gnas pa'i shes pa'i yul rnams ni //
T02TD1199E:46a-31: mthong ba'i blo de rtog med yin //
T02TD1199E:46b-0: @46b des na srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1199E:46b-1: ngag gi yi ge spangs nas su //
T02TD1199E:46b-2: yid kyi bzlas par yang dag ldan //
T02TD1199E:46b-4: rnam par rtog pa'i yi ge spangs nas srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug pa rtog med kyi bzlas pa dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:46b-5: rtag par chos kyi dbyings nyid ni //
T02TD1199E:46b-6: mi g-yo go 'phang rgyun du gnas //
T02TD1199E:46b-7: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings ni nam mkha'i rlung ste /
T02TD1199E:46b-8: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas rtog pa med pa'i shes pa mi g-yo ba'i dga' ba bde ba'i go 'phang du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:46b-9: rtag tu phra zhing gos med pas //
T02TD1199E:46b-10: zhes pa ni rang rig pa rtog pa med par rang bzhin brgyad cus ma gos pa'i rnam par shes pa ye shes la thim pas rnam par shes pa sems 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig par gyur pas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rim pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:46b-11: de la chags pa'i lam dang grol ba'i lam gnyis kas /
T02TD1199E:46b-12: mar me lta bus thams cad du //
T02TD1199E:46b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa dang po dang sa brgyad pa'i bar gyis rtags brgyad bshad pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:46b-14: sa dgu pa dang sa bcu pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yin pas rtags dang dngos gzhi khyad par yin no //
T02TD1199E:46b-15: mi slob pa'i rang bzhin sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pas rtags bshad mi dgos so //
T02TD1199E:46b-16: de ltar chags pa'i lam dang grol ba'i lam gnyis bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:46b-17: rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad pa ni rdo rje snying po la bos nas mnyan par gyis zhes skabs dbye ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:46b-18: de ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na lam ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa gnyis kyis te /
T02TD1199E:46b-19: de la ril por 'dzin pa ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i sgo nas stong pa nyid la cig car 'jug pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:46b-20: dngos po rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD1199E:46b-21: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02TD1199E:46b-23: sems kyis stong pa nyid shes na chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid zo chun gyi 'khor lo bzhin du cig car shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:46b-25: phyis ni re re'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1199E:46b-26: lha rnams la ni rab tu brjod //
T02TD1199E:46b-28: thams cad stong par shes nas re re nas bde ba chen po'i rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:46b-30: chu ni dangs par gyur pa las //
T02TD1199E:46b-31: nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar //
T02TD1199E:47a-4: thams cad 'od gsal ba'i rang snang bar shes par byas nas gal te lha'i 'khor lor snang ba bzung na yang dngos po med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:47a-5: mi shes sgrib phyogs rnam sbyangs nas //
T02TD1199E:47a-6: lus can phung po khams dang ni //
T02TD1199E:47a-7: skye mched rang bzhin gyis ni dag / rang rig bdag nyid kyis dag ste //
T02TD1199E:47a-8: zhes bya ba ni rim dang cig car gyis 'od gsal bar rtogs nas phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin dang rig pa'i bdag nyid du snang bas gzung 'dzin dang bral bas dag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:47a-10: gzhan du dag cing grol mi 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:47a-12: yul rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:47a-13: rang rig pa ni bde ba mchog / ces bya ba ni thams cad rang rig pa 'od gsal ba'i snang bas yul thams cad rgyas btab pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:47a-14: gzugs sogs yul lam gzhan yang rung //
T02TD1199E:47a-15: rnal 'byor pa la gang zhig snang //
T02TD1199E:47a-16: zhes bya ba ni yul snod du snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:47a-17: bcud sems can du snang ba ste //
T02TD1199E:47a-18: snod dang bcud thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du grub pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:47a-19: de ltar na bsgom pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:47a-20: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:47a-21: rnam dag sangs rgyas rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:47a-23: lhun gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin shes na 'khor ba yongs su shes pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:47a-25: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:47a-26: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston te //
T02TD1199E:47a-28: de ltar thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:47a-29: da ni rnam par dag pa'i grangs zhus pa yin te //
T02TD1199E:47a-30: bka' stsal pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1199E:47a-31: ci'i slad du zhe na gtan tshigs zhus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:47a-33: glo bur gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:47a-34: 'dzin pa ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:47a-35: 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa la gnyis med kyang /
T02TD1199E:47a-36: ming dang gzugs la sogs pa tshogs drug gi yul dang /
T02TD1199E:47a-37: yul can gnyis su snang ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:47a-38: de nyid nyams su myong du zin kyang /
T02TD1199E:47a-39: bsten bya 'di dag rnam dag pas //
T02TD1199E:47b-0: dug @47b med byas te bsten par bya //
T02TD1199E:47b-1: zhes pa ni gnyis su 'dzin pa kun du brtags pa dang gnyis su snang ba gzhan gyi dbang gnyis nub nas gnyis su med pa 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa grub pa'o //
T02TD1199E:47b-2: de ltar grub pa ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:47b-3: gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1199E:47b-5: phung po lnga sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1199E:47b-6: dbang po rnams sems dpa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1199E:47b-7: 'byung ba rnams lha mo'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1199E:47b-8: snod bcud thams cad gnas gyur nas ye shes kyi rnam par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:47b-9: gang la ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na //
T02TD1199E:47b-10: phung sogs lus can rnams kyi lus //
T02TD1199E:47b-11: lha 'di dag gi bdag nyid yin //
T02TD1199E:47b-13: dbang bzhi pa'i don rtogs na thams cad bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin no //
T02TD1199E:47b-14: de thabs gang gis yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:47b-15: bde dang sdug bsngal bdag nyid las //
T02TD1199E:47b-17: bde ba ni 'gog pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:47b-18: sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'o //
T02TD1199E:47b-19: las dang nyon mongs la sogs skye //
T02TD1199E:47b-20: zhes pa ni las ni 'du byed dang sred pa'o //
T02TD1199E:47b-21: nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa dang sred len no //
T02TD1199E:47b-22: skye ba ni rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:47b-29: de rnams kyi rtsa ba ni skyed par byed pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02TD1199E:47b-30: de 'gog pa rang bzhin brgyad cu 'gags pa'i bde ba rtog med dang /
T02TD1199E:47b-31: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lam gyi bde ba'o //
T02TD1199E:47b-32: de ltar na rgyu kun 'byung dang lam gnyis la brten nas 'bras bu sdug bsngal dang 'gog pa 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:47b-33: skye dang 'jig pa la brten nas //
T02TD1199E:47b-36: brtag pa lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:47b-38: // / de ltar rnam par dag pa'i rab tu byed pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:47b-39: da ni spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:47b-40: byang chub la ni gnas pa yi //
T02TD1199E:47b-41: sangs rgyas sras la phan bya'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:47b-42: zhes bya bas ni dgos pa ston to //
T02TD1199E:47b-43: lus med rdo rje can de nyid //
T02TD1199E:47b-45: tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i lus bcos nas /
T02TD1199E:48a-0: 'od gsal ba'i lus rtogs pas na rdo rje can de nyid @48a * //
T02TD1199E:48a-2: / shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog / ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:48a-3: chos rnams kun las byung ba ni //
T02TD1199E:48a-4: zhes bya ni rgyu ba dang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa ni thabs te /
T02TD1199E:48a-5: thabs dang shes rab de las byung ba ni spyod ba'o //
T02TD1199E:48a-6: de ni mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:48a-7: de nyid spyod pa bla na med //
T02TD1199E:48a-8: rtog pa rnams dang bral ba yi //
T02TD1199E:48a-9: spyod pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:48a-10: dngos gzhi sgyu ma lta bu dang stong par rtogs pa las rjes la rtog pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ni spyod pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sems can gyi don du longs spyod pas padma 'dam las skyes kyang 'dam gyi nyes pas ma gos pa bzhin du 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos pas na spyod pa bla na med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:48a-11: de nas bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang bstod pa dang gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02TD1199E:48a-12: spyod pa thugs la bzhag nas bshad par bya //
T02TD1199E:48a-13: zhes mdor bstan gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:48a-14: de ltar mdor bstan bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:48a-16: rga shi dba' glong 'khyil pa yi //
T02TD1199E:48a-18: skye rga na 'chi'i dba' glong 'khrug pa'i rgya mtsho'i rab tu 'jigs pa las sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa ni bskyed rdzogs kyi spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:48a-19: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:48a-20: nyen med pa ni 'gro ba'i gru //
T02TD1199E:48a-22: tshong pa rnams chu bo las sgrol ba bzhin du spyod pas sgrol bas na gru'o //
T02TD1199E:48a-23: skam sar phyin pa lta bu'i 'bras bu ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD1199E:48a-24: myur du dngos grub byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:48a-25: 'jig rten dang thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub gsum gyis skam sar phyin par byed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:48a-26: de ltar rjes su 'gro ba bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:48a-28: yid 'ong yon tan kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1199E:48a-29: zhes bya ba gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dang /
T02TD1199E:48a-30: sems ni rin chen las byung ba //
T02TD1199E:48b-0: zhes pa rang don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud 'dod pa'i don rnams rab tu sgrub pa la 'di med par gyur na 'bras bu rdo rje can gyi bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i bkra shis rgyu dri ma med pa kun nas byung ba'i yon tan dam pa'i yan lag can gyi dngos grub kyi bde ba skye bar mi 'gyur ba de @48b bas na mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod pa 'bras bu mchog ster ba'i thabs mchog 'di la thar pa 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis spyod par bya'o zhes pa dgos pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:48b-1: de ltar rjes su 'gro ldog gi sgo nas spyod pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:48b-3: lha min dgra ngang brgya byin dang //
T02TD1199E:48b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1199E:48b-5: lha min dgra ni gdong drug go //
T02TD1199E:48b-7: grong khyer sum dgra ni lha chen po'o //
T02TD1199E:48b-8: tshangs sogs zhes bya bas ni khyab 'jug la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02TD1199E:48b-9: de rnams kyis zhabs kyi padmor mchod pa ni bde bar gshegs pa ste ye shes lnga'i go 'phang mchog dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:48b-10: 'bras bu de gang gis thob ce na /
T02TD1199E:48b-11: sdig bcos spyod pa 'dis myur thob //
T02TD1199E:48b-13: de ltar dgos pa dang 'bras bu bstan nas //
T02TD1199E:48b-14: da ni bshad par dam bca' ba ston te /
T02TD1199E:48b-15: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1199E:48b-16: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi gnas //
T02TD1199E:48b-17: rnal 'byor pas ni sgom byed pa //
T02TD1199E:48b-18: aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa bshad //
T02TD1199E:48b-20: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi gnas ni rtog pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dag pas 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi gnas ni go 'phang ngo //
T02TD1199E:48b-21: gnas de la bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa brtan pa thob pa'i rtags byung ba'i tshe /
T02TD1199E:48b-22: 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i zlos gar byed pas na aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa ste /
T02TD1199E:48b-23: aa wa dh'u t'i'i zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i bag la nyal ni nyes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:48b-24: aa zhes bya bas ni dgag pa ston pa ste /
T02TD1199E:48b-25: khams gsum pa'i nyes bral gyi spyod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:48b-26: bshad ces bya ba thugs la bzhag nas gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:48b-27: de ltar dam bca' ba bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:48b-28: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'i spyod pa dpa' bo gcig pu dang rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:48b-29: rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas //
T02TD1199E:48b-30: shin tu gsang ba'i dam tshig spyad //
T02TD1199E:48b-32: bskyed pa'i rim pa la mthong ba'i mtshan ma dang reg pa'i mtshan ma dang thos pa'i mtshan ma thob nas sprul pa'i sku dang tha mi dad par shes nas gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa thams cad spangs la /
T02TD1199E:49a-0: dpa' bo gcig pu'am dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los rgyal tshab lta bu'i spyod @49a * //
T02TD1199E:49a-1: pa 'jig rten pa la shin tu gsang ba'i dam tshig yin yang mtshan ma thob pa'i dus de'i tshe mngon du bya'o //
T02TD1199E:49a-2: ji ltar brtsam par bya zhe na //
T02TD1199E:49a-3: de ltar brtsams nas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1199E:49a-4: rgyu mthun 'bras bu'i tshul du ste //
T02TD1199E:49a-6: dang por rtsom nas ni lha gang la me tog phog pa'o //
T02TD1199E:49a-7: rgyu mthun pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i spyod pa 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra bas rgyu 'bras bu'i zlos gar can no //
T02TD1199E:49a-8: de nas byis pa'i rol pas rgyu //
T02TD1199E:49a-9: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la de mi sems pa ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:49a-11: bsdus te bsgoms la zhen par bya //
T02TD1199E:49a-13: bsdus pa ni snod bcud do //
T02TD1199E:49a-14: bsgoms la zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' ba'i sems dang bral bar nges pa'o //
T02TD1199E:49a-15: dgos pa ji lta bu'i yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:49a-16: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas nyon mongs pas kun nas bslangs nas mi dge ba 'byung ba'am dge ba'i sems kun nas bslangs nas bsod nams kyi las byed pa ste /
T02TD1199E:49a-17: de gnyis ni mtho ris dang ngan song 'grub pa'i bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i las yin la /
T02TD1199E:49a-18: rnal 'byor pas bskyed rim la brtan pa thob pa'i rjes kyi spyod pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pas kyang de'i sems pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pas bsam gtan gyi sdom pa mi g-yo ba'i las yin no //
T02TD1199E:49a-19: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la thob pa'i rjes kyi spyod pa ni bde ba chen po stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pas zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ye shes kyi tshogs dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes dang mthun pa dngos rjes khyad par med pas na ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:49a-20: bskyed rim gyi dpa' bo gcig pu'i spyod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:49a-21: skye bo sna tshogs 'dul bas na //
T02TD1199E:49a-22: gzhon nu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:49a-23: zhes pa ni gzhon nu ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs yin la /
T02TD1199E:49a-24: des mtshon pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02TD1199E:49a-25: spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa gdul bya ji ltar mos pa ltar bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1199E:49a-26: de dus ni gang gi tshe zhe na /
T02TD1199E:49a-27: ci gsungs spyod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1199E:49a-29: spyod lam bzhi la lha'i rnam par gnas pas so //
T02TD1199E:49a-30: dngos grub sna tshogs bla med 'grub //
T02TD1199E:49b-1: 'gro kun bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02TD1199E:49b-2: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i spyod lam gyi che snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang 'gro ba rigs drug lha'i rang bzhin du mos pa ni /
T02TD1199E:49b-3: kun du bzang po mtshungs med pa //
T02TD1199E:49b-5: 'gro ba drug dang grub mtha' thams cad ji ltar mos pa'i gzugs su ston pas na kun du bzang po ste /
T02TD1199E:49b-6: des dngos grub mi 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1199E:49b-7: de ltar dpa' bo gcig pu bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:49b-8: rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa ston pa ni /
T02TD1199E:49b-9: dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can //
T02TD1199E:49b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1199E:49b-11: rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhabs la phyag byas nas bya ba byas shing mtshan ma thob pa'i blo can gyis thams cad kyang dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin du mos pa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa la brten par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:49b-12: dogs pa kun las phyir phyogs nas //
T02TD1199E:49b-13: de nas rang 'dod bzhin du spyad //
T02TD1199E:49b-15: dogs pa kun gyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gzung bar mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02TD1199E:49b-16: phyir phyogs nas zhes pa ni gzung 'dzin la'o //
T02TD1199E:49b-17: sems pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral nas rang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang lhan cig skyes dga' rang bzhin du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis spyod pas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i tshul du spyod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:49b-19: ji bzhin yang dag don rig pa //
T02TD1199E:49b-22: dngos po sgyu ma lta bur rig nas 'gro ba la snying rje chen po bskyed de /
T02TD1199E:49b-23: gzugs la sogs pa la stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i blo yis seng ge bzhin du kun du rgyu ste /
T02TD1199E:49b-24: rnam par rtog pas bag tsha ba med do zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1199E:49b-25: rang sems brtan byas gnas med par //
T02TD1199E:49b-27: gzungs 'dzin gyi rtog pa dang bral bas brtan par byas nas yul lnga la chags pa med pas gnas med pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:49b-28: yang dag lta bas 'jug par bya //
T02TD1199E:49b-29: zhes bya ba ni dngos po rnams la gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan lta bur 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:49b-30: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa dang rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:49b-31: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:50a-2: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i rang bzhin phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin rmi lam dang sgyu ma bzhin du dngos po thams cad shes par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:50a-3: sgrib pa kun las grol ba ni //
T02TD1199E:50a-4: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags bzhin du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ma chags pa'i sems kyis longs spyad pas na /
T02TD1199E:50a-5: dbang phyug ldan par 'tsho bar bya //
T02TD1199E:50a-7: de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ni //
T02TD1199E:50a-8: zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:50a-14: sdug bsngal ba las ring du gyur pas na rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD1199E:50a-16: rtag tu mi rtog par gyur dang //
T02TD1199E:50a-17: gnyis med nges par bya ba yi //
T02TD1199E:50a-18: pha rol phyin drug sbyor bas ni //
T02TD1199E:50a-19: sangs rgyas dngos grub nges par 'grub //
T02TD1199E:50a-21: gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa dang bral bas dge ba chos sdud kyi rang bzhin pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T02TD1199E:50a-22: tshad med pa bzhi dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can don byed kyi thabs kyis sems can gyi don la stobs dang ldan yang gdul bya ni 'di /
T02TD1199E:50a-23: 'dul bar byed pa ni 'di zhes sems can gyi dngos por brtag par mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:50a-24: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:50a-25: da ni phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:50a-26: byang chub la dmigs sems kyis ni //
T02TD1199E:50a-27: phyogs las rnam rgyal spyod pa brtsam //
T02TD1199E:50a-29: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i byang chub la dmigs nas thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid kyis dbang shes rab ye shes ji lta ba bzhin thob nas mngon sum gyi don rgyun bsrings pas /
T02TD1199E:50a-30: de nyid goms par byas pa dang //
T02TD1199E:50a-32: de ltar na dogs pa kun la rgyab kyis phyogs na tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:50a-33: rtog pa kun las rnam grol bas //
T02TD1199E:50a-34: zhes bya bas ni gzung ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD1199E:50a-35: 'dzin pa la mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa ni /
T02TD1199E:50a-36: rtog pa kun las grol ba yi //
T02TD1199E:50b-0: sems @50b can bsam pa'i khyad par gyi //
T02TD1199E:50b-1: zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i lam pa dang /
T02TD1199E:50b-3: rang lhag par gnas pa'i rim pas sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang chu zla la sogs pa'i sbyor bas snod dang bcud thams cad la longs spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:50b-4: chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na //
T02TD1199E:50b-5: grogs po med par gcig pur rgyu //
T02TD1199E:50b-6: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rnam par rtog pas kun du brtags pa'i gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:50b-7: rtog pa med pas gzhan gyi dbang gis gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa dang gnyis su med pa'i sems kyis chos nyid kyi gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pas na grogs med gcig pur rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1199E:50b-8: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1199E:50b-9: zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang sdang ba dang rmongs pa'i dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du longs spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:50b-10: ci'i phyir dogs pa med ce na /
T02TD1199E:50b-11: khams gsum 'di dag ma lus la //
T02TD1199E:50b-12: thams cad de yi longs spyod don //
T02TD1199E:50b-13: zhes bya ba ni lus yul ma lus pa thams cad la shes pa de'i rtog pa med pa'i longs spyad pa'i don ni 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02TD1199E:50b-14: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gzugs //
T02TD1199E:50b-15: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1199E:50b-17: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:50b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sprul //
T02TD1199E:50b-20: rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1199E:50b-21: zhes bya ba ni dbang shes rab ye shes thob pas /
T02TD1199E:50b-22: gzung ba rang bzhin med par rtogs nas reg bya'i chos nyid rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
T02TD1199E:50b-23: sa bcu gcig pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la yang mi 'dud na lugs ma sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD1199E:50b-24: dngos po 'di dag kun rang bzhin //
T02TD1199E:50b-25: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1199E:50b-27: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:50b-28: 'od gsal ba de nyid lhar snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:50b-29: rdo rje can du snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:51a-0: mchod rten la sogs par snang ba de la gzhan gang cung zad bstan pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das @51a * //
T02TD1199E:51a-1: bde ba chen po rdo rje can gyis sems can mos pa'i don du gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:51a-2: gsungs pa'i don de dag la nges pa'i don dang /
T02TD1199E:51a-3: drang ba'i don du shes par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:51a-4: ji ltar don dam pa'i bdud rtsi don du gnyer bas bde ba rtog pa med pa'i snying po blangs te /
T02TD1199E:51a-5: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i tshig 'dor bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:51a-6: de bzhin chos kyi bdud rtsi ni rnyed nas zhes bya ba ni bde ba stong ba nyid rtogs nas gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa sbun pa lta bu spang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:51a-7: rtog pa'i gnas ni kun btang nas //
T02TD1199E:51a-8: blo ldan re zhig mi rtog gnas //
T02TD1199E:51a-9: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i don gyi mjug sdud pa ste /
T02TD1199E:51a-10: thugs rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:51a-11: des gsungs pa de la dngos grub the tshom med par 'gyur te /
T02TD1199E:51a-12: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum gyis myong ba bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:51a-15: zhes bya ba ni rtog pa'i nyes dmigs so //
T02TD1199E:51a-16: rtog pa las ni rnam grol na //
T02TD1199E:51a-17: dri med zhi ba'i gnas su 'gro //
T02TD1199E:51a-18: zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang bral ba'i phan yon no //
T02TD1199E:51a-19: dri med ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
