T02TD1199E:51a-20: zhi ba ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:51a-21: gnas ni sku gsum gyi go 'phang ngo //
T02TD1199E:51a-22: skyon dang yon tan ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan /
T02TD1199E:51a-23: des na rtog pa'i dra ba bcad //
T02TD1199E:51a-25: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa dang //
T02TD1199E:51a-26: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag bsten pa'i //
T02TD1199E:51a-27: dam tshig gang yin de la gnas //
T02TD1199E:51a-28: zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bde ba rtog pa med pa'i sbyod pa bsten pa ltar /
T02TD1199E:51a-29: rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtag tu bsten zhing dam tshig de la gnas par bya'o zhes gdams ngag gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:51a-30: mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa la gdams ngag bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:51a-31: sngags shes pas ni dngos grub la //
T02TD1199E:51a-33: sngags shes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pas mchog gi dngos grub la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du chags par mi bya ste /
T02TD1199E:51b-0: sgom pa po dang 'bras bu dngos grub dang thob pa'i thabs bskyed @51b rdzogs gnyis la bskyed tshul du sbyar ba thams cad du ni blta bar bya zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:51b-1: de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pa'i phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyod pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:51b-2: da ni dbang bzhi pa thob pas shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:51b-3: dang por bza' ba ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa ni /
T02TD1199E:51b-4: khye bod rda mo glang chen sogs //
T02TD1199E:51b-5: khrag btung rtag tu sha ston bya //
T02TD1199E:51b-7: sha yi gzugs su brtag par bya //
T02TD1199E:51b-8: zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin te yan lag gi don ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:51b-9: da ni mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i ro mnyam ston te //
T02TD1199E:51b-10: skye bo gzhan gyis bza' min gang //
T02TD1199E:51b-12: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga 'jig rten pa rnams kyis smod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:51b-13: bsgrub pa'i dbang pos bza' ba dang //
T02TD1199E:51b-14: zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob tu don rang gi mtshan nyid rten 'brel yin par mtshungs la de don dam par bza' ba dang mi bza' ba dang bral pas na mtha' gnyis su mi rtog pa dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-15: ma dang srid mo la sogs pa rigs gcig par bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-16: rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs la sogs par bgrod par bya ba de dang rnal 'byor pa des ro mnyam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-17: bya ba ma yin pa mi dge ba dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-18: bya ba ni dge ba dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-19: sdud pa yid du 'ong ba dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-20: mi sdud pa yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-22: btung ba ma yin pa rdo rje'i chu la sogs pa rnams mtha' gnyis su sngags pas blang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-23: dor bar brtag pa mi bya ste /
T02TD1199E:51b-24: bde ba rtog pa med pas rgyas btab pas der snang ba'i rang bzhin gyis bsngags pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems mgu bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:51b-25: da ni spyod pa ro mnyam ston te /
T02TD1199E:51b-26: ji ltar sems g-yengs mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD1199E:51b-27: de ltar chang ni btung bar bya //
T02TD1199E:51b-28: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lus dang sems bde ba skyes pa nam chags pa'i sems kyis sems can la bsngo ba rdo rje chen po'i rgyas btab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:51b-29: dad pa dang dang bas dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis rgyas btab pa dang nyams su myong bar stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pas ye shes kyi tshogs kyang grub pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:52a-1: chang gi ro la rgya rnam pa gsum gyis btab nas btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:52a-2: smad pa ni gdol pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:52a-3: dregs chen ni dbang thob pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:52a-4: rigs bzang ni bram ze la sogs so //
T02TD1199E:52a-5: rigs ngan ni dmangs rigs so //
T02TD1199E:52a-6: nad pa ni sdug bsngal can dag nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1199E:52a-7: gzhan mthong na'ang zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba ris drug gi bye brag tha mal pa mthong na yang thams cad kyang rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa 'am rgyal ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:52a-8: da ni gnyen po dang spang bya ro mnyam par ston te /
T02TD1199E:52a-9: glegs bam bklag par mi bya ste //
T02TD1199E:52a-11: dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa bcos ma'i sems kyis glegs bam bklag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:52a-12: mandala la sogs pa mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1199E:52a-13: bcos ma'i lugs ma la sogs pa la phyag mi bya ste /
T02TD1199E:52a-14: thams cad kyang bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba'i snang bar shes na glegs bam bklag pa dang /
T02TD1199E:52a-15: mandala bya ba dang sngags bzlas pa la sogs byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1199E:52a-16: de skad du yang rigs pa mchog las /
T02TD1199E:52a-17: de nyid rtog pa'i rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD1199E:52a-18: bcom ma yi ni blo can ni //
T02TD1199E:52a-19: rnal 'byor ma yi khyad par gyis //
T02TD1199E:52a-20: bsod nams ye shes tshogs su 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:52a-23: mi dge ba bcu rnams kyang gnang ngam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:52a-24: brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya //
T02TD1199E:52a-25: gzhan gyi bud med skal bzang bsten //
T02TD1199E:52a-26: gdug la byams par mi bya ste //
T02TD1199E:52a-27: sangs rgyas rnams ni gsad par bya //
T02TD1199E:52a-29: gnyis su zhen pa ni nub /
T02TD1199E:52a-30: gnyis su snang ba ni bral ba bzhin thob pas /
T02TD1199E:52a-31: gnyis su med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i gseng brtol ba na /
T02TD1199E:52a-32: mi dge ba bcu spyad kyang zag pa med pa'i sdom par 'gyur ba ni //
T02TD1199E:52a-33: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //
T02TD1199E:52a-34: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin dang //
T02TD1199E:52a-35: rang gis dang gi ye shes ni //
T02TD1199E:52a-36: legs mthong de la sdig pa med //
T02TD1199E:52a-38: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa 'od gsal ba thob pa'i tshe /
T02TD1199E:52a-39: su la mchod pa bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:52a-40: ye shes kun sems zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1199E:52a-41: rgyal ba kun gyi slob dpon mchod //
T02TD1199E:52a-43: ye shes kun sems zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1199E:52b-0: sems ni gseng brtol nas @52b chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes pa'i slob dpon no //
T02TD1199E:52b-1: ci'i phyir slob dpon mchod ce na /
T02TD1199E:52b-2: dngos grub sna tshogs ster bas na //
T02TD1199E:52b-3: blo dang ldan pas rtag mchod bya //
T02TD1199E:52b-5: de ltar spros pa med pa re mnyam gyi spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:52b-6: da ni de'i phan yon bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:52b-7: gang phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1199E:52b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams pas //
T02TD1199E:52b-9: slob dpon bspu'i [*ba spu'i?] khung gcig mchog //
T02TD1199E:52b-10: de phyir slob dpon mchod byed la //
T02TD1199E:52b-11: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas gzigs //
T02TD1199E:52b-13: sems rang rig pa 'od gsal ni /
T02TD1199E:52b-14: ting nge 'dzin mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyis slob ma la rtogs par byed pa de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas byin gyis rlob cing chos kyi sku'i don ston pas na ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang mchog tu gyur ba de'i phyir slob dpon la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:52b-15: shin tu spros pa med pa yin na /
T02TD1199E:52b-16: slob dpon la ci'i phyir mchod pa bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:52b-17: sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol bas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:52b-18: rgyu mtshan des na slob dpon la mi smad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:52b-19: rdo rje spun la mi smad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:52b-20: slob dpon gyis gnang ba gus par blang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:52b-21: pha dang ma dang mes po la sogs pa thams cad ltos pa med par rtsva bzhin du btang nas /
T02TD1199E:52b-22: mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyal srid bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:52b-23: brtag pa lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:52b-25: // / de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i spyod pa rnam pa bzhi mdor bsdus pa'i le'u de bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:52b-26: da ni de'i rgyas par bshad pa ston pas na /
T02TD1199E:52b-27: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1199E:52b-29: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD1199E:52b-31: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD1199E:52b-32: yang dag bshad bya ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i dngos rjes ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:52b-33: de dus kyis spyod pa bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:52b-34: spyod pa pha rol son mtshan nyid //
T02TD1199E:52b-35: gang gis ring gnas rdo rje yi //
T02TD1199E:52b-36: rnal 'byor bas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:52b-37: dngos gzhi la bskyed rdzogs kyi mtshan ma thob pa ni /
T02TD1199E:53a-2: de'i mtshan nyid ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i du ba dang smig rgyu la sogs pa'i rtags lnga dang /
T02TD1199E:53a-3: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mar me dang srin bu me khyer la sogs pa rtags rnam pa brgyad rang gi rtogs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:53a-4: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis lus ngag gis 'gyur ba'i sgo nas rtogs pa ni gang gis ring gnas nye ring gi rgyud las ring bar gyur pa /
T02TD1199E:53a-5: gzhan gyi rgyud yin yang ldang ba dang zo mdog bde ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyis rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bar shes par the tshom med pa'o //
T02TD1199E:53a-6: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:53a-7: mkha' 'gro ma sogs gtor ma yi //
T02TD1199E:53a-8: bza' dang bca' ba ji snyed pa //
T02TD1199E:53a-9: rnal 'byor bas ni bza' bar bya //
T02TD1199E:53a-11: mkha' 'gro ma ni lha'i rigs so //
T02TD1199E:53a-12: sogs zhes bya ba ni dri za dang gnong sbyin dang /
T02TD1199E:53a-13: srin po dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i gtor ma dang mchod pa bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:53a-14: ro yi thal bas bsgo bya zhing //
T02TD1199E:53a-15: zhes bya ba ni gdul bya drag po 'jigs byed yin pas ro'i thal ba dang gos dang kham phor la sogs pa la spyod pa dang mtshan mo gsang ste rgyu bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:53a-16: ci'i phyir bzlog pa'i spyod pas mi 'dul zhe na /
T02TD1199E:53a-17: rjes su mthun pa dbugs dbyung gi lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:53a-19: ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo dang //
T02TD1199E:53a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:53a-21: dus ni gang gi tshe zhe na /
T02TD1199E:53a-22: mtshan mo ma mo'i khyim dang ni //
T02TD1199E:53a-24: gnas de dag tu spyod pa byed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas cung zad drod thob pa'i dus de'i tshe spyod pa byed par 'dod pas zhes bya ba smos pas ni spyod pa byed par mi 'dod pa spangs pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:53a-25: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa med pa bzad po'i stobs can dang /
T02TD1199E:53a-26: sems 'od gsal la mos pa'i sems brtan pa gnyis ni drod thob par gyur kyang spyod pa byed par mi 'dod de g-yeng ba shas chung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:53a-27: smon lam gyi stobs can tshogs bsags dgos pa dang /
T02TD1199E:53a-28: khyad par du 'gro ba dmigs pa dgos pa gnyis pa ni drod thob nas dngos rjes ro mnyam pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1199E:53b-0: rjes la mtshan ma'i g-yeng ba dgag pa'i @53b phyir spyod pa bya'o //
T02TD1199E:53b-1: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1199E:53b-2: gal te bdag nyid grub 'dod na //
T02TD1199E:53b-3: slar yang byis pa'i spyod pa bya //
T02TD1199E:53b-5: des na byis pa'i rol pas rgyu zhes pa mdor bstan pa'i bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:53b-6: 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1199E:53b-7: kha dog bcos ma'i ras rnyid bgo //
T02TD1199E:53b-8: zhes pa ni bsdus te bgos la zhen par bya zhes pa mdor bstan pa'i bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:53b-9: sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:53b-10: blo dang ldan pas rgyu bar bya //
T02TD1199E:53b-11: 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag gyur te //
T02TD1199E:53b-13: skye bo sna tshogs 'dul bas na //
T02TD1199E:53b-14: gzhon nu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1199E:53b-15: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:53b-16: de ltar dpa' bo gcig pu'i spyod pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:53b-17: rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:53b-18: dkyil 'khor pa ni brtag par bya //
T02TD1199E:53b-19: ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas //
T02TD1199E:53b-20: phyogs bcu rnams su spro bar bya //
T02TD1199E:53b-22: 'gro ba ji ltar mos pa ltar kun du bzang po dang mtshungs pa'i spyod pas /
T02TD1199E:53b-23: 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ltar snying ga'i h'um las ba spu'i khung bu nas 'ong spros nas phyogs bcur dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:53b-24: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:53b-25: da ni gsang ba'i dbang thob pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa bya ba ni /
T02TD1199E:53b-26: ri yi sum la ma rtse mor ni //
T02TD1199E:53b-27: gnas ni shin tu mnyam par bya //
T02TD1199E:53b-28: zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /
T02TD1199E:53b-29: bstod pa dang smad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:53b-30: bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams shin tu mnyam par bya ba'o //
T02TD1199E:53b-31: de yang sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD1199E:53b-32: padma'i chal ni yid 'ong 'gro ma du ni //
T02TD1199E:53b-33: gnas de sgrub pos dngos bsgoms na //
T02TD1199E:53b-34: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:53b-36: padma'i tshal ni lo bcu gnyis dang bcu drug dang nyis shu dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1199E:53b-37: rdzing bu yid 'ong ni bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyangs pa ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'i sngags skyes so //
T02TD1199E:54a-0: sgrub pos dngos bsgoms zhes bya ba ni dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas der 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad zil gyis mnan nas gang zhig rnyed pa de dag bza' zhes bya @54a * //
T02TD1199E:54a-2: bzang ngan gyi rnams par rtog pa spongs nas ro la rtog ma med pa'i sems kyis bza' ba dang rdzas la gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54a-3: gunydza la sogs sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1199E:54a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'ol ma sel sogs pa ci rnyed pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan bya zhing ma rnyed pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba la sogs pa la 'dod par mi bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54a-5: srog chags yan lag las byung bgo //
T02TD1199E:54a-6: zhes bya ba ni glang po che dang stag gi pags pa la sogs ci rnyed pa bgo zhing ras yug chen ka shi ka'i gos la sogs pa ma rnyed par mi tshol ba'o //
T02TD1199E:54a-7: rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa ro mnyam pa ci dgos she na /
T02TD1199E:54a-8: bde don gnyer la bde ba sbyin //
T02TD1199E:54a-10: bsam gtan gyi sdom pa mi g-yo ba'i las /
T02TD1199E:54a-11: bde ba rtog pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ba la lus dang yid bde ba'i thabs ro mnyam pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54a-12: grags pa'i sgra la khyad par yod dam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:54a-13: la lar sam skri ta yang ni //
T02TD1199E:54a-14: bzlog ste pra kri ta yang brjod //
T02TD1199E:54a-16: grags pa dang ma grags pa ro mnyam pa'i don to //
T02TD1199E:54a-17: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1199E:54a-18: bza' dang bza' min ji snyed bza' //
T02TD1199E:54a-19: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar smyon pa nad kyis dbang po nyams par rtog pa rnams so sor brtags min du song ba bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug pa'i mthus so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis rtog pa bkag nas /
T02TD1199E:54a-20: smyon pa'i spyod pa dang mthun par bza' ba dang bza' ba ma yin pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa smad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:54a-21: nya sha dang zan dron la sogs pa bstod pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag ro mnyam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54a-22: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:54a-23: da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pa la phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa bshad pa ni gzhan gyi yul du grub pa ste zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1199E:54a-24: gzhan gyi yul ni grong dar kun dga' rab la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:54a-25: bde mchog gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD1199E:54a-26: ri su la tshang tshing zhes bya ba //
T02TD1199E:54a-27: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //
T02TD1199E:54a-28: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bde mchog gi gnas su 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i bsam pas /
T02TD1199E:54b-0: rnal 'byor pa shes rab can gyis dbang shes rab ye @54b shes kyi don bsgoms pas /
T02TD1199E:54b-1: sgrub pa bo drod thob par gyur ba'i tshe /
T02TD1199E:54b-2: phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-3: ci'i phyir phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-4: ci'i phyir phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:54b-5: sgrib pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1199E:54b-6: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
T02TD1199E:54b-10: phyogs las rgyal zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1199E:54b-11: phyogs bcu dag tu gnas pa'i dngos //
T02TD1199E:54b-12: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1199E:54b-14: bde ba rtogs pa med pas spyod lam bzhi la gzung 'dzin dang bral bas na phyogs kun las rgyal ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-15: de ltar des pa'i tshig bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:54b-16: da ni chags pa'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas /
T02TD1199E:54b-17: de ltar re zhig rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1199E:54b-18: mi shigs bar ni brtan byas nas //
T02TD1199E:54b-20: mi shigs pa'i srog aa wa dh'u ta'i ra bcug nas bde ba stong ba nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin du brtag par byas nas so //
T02TD1199E:54b-21: shin tu gzugs mdzes 'dod ldan ma //
T02TD1199E:54b-22: rig pa'i lha mo gzung bar bya ;
T02TD1199E:54b-23: / zhes bya ba ni dge byed dang dbang gi lha mo'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-24: lha mo dga' ma rol dga' ma //
T02TD1199E:54b-25: zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-26: rin chen rgyan sogs kyis spras pa /
T02TD1199E:54b-27: rigs pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo dang //
T02TD1199E:54b-28: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bsgrub sbyangs pa'i sngags las skyes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-29: lha dang gnod sbyin yang na ni //
T02TD1199E:54b-30: zhes bya ba ni lha dang dri za ni mkha' spyod do //
T02TD1199E:54b-31: gnod sbyin dang srin po ni sa spyod do //
T02TD1199E:54b-32: sa 'og gnas pa'i lha min dang //
T02TD1199E:54b-33: klu yi bu mo dag dang ni //
T02TD1199E:54b-34: zhes bya ba ni sa 'og tu sbyod pa ste de ltar na gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-35: rnal 'byor pas ni de dag las //
T02TD1199E:54b-36: gang 'dod pa'i rigs lha mo gcig / ces bya ba la lhan cig skyes pa dang sngags skyes dang zhing skyes la gang 'dod pa cig sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-37: lcags kyu zhags pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1199E:54b-38: nye bar bkug ste bsdu byas nas //
T02TD1199E:54b-39: zhes bya ba ni rlung gyen du bzlog pa'i sbyor ba ni lcags kyu yin la /
T02TD1199E:54b-40: g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi rlung 'then pa ni zhags pa'o //
T02TD1199E:54b-41: nye bar bkug pa ni byang chub kyi sems bzlog nas 'bad pa med par 'jig rten dang thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub ci dgos pa ster ba dang /
T02TD1199E:54b-42: rga ba dang na ba las rnam par grol ba'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
T02TD1199E:55a-0: khams gsum gyi rtog ba las @55a * //
T02TD1199E:55a-2: de ltar chags pa'i lam gyi phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:55a-3: da ni grol ba'i lam gyi phyogs las rgyal ba bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:55a-4: lus ni sbyin par btang nas su //
T02TD1199E:55a-5: phyi nas spyod pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD1199E:55a-7: lus la chags pa med pa'i blo bskyed nas //
T02TD1199E:55a-8: ma chags pa'i rtags su du ba dang /
T02TD1199E:55a-9: smig rgyu la sogs pa zhi gnas kyi rtags lnga dang /
T02TD1199E:55a-10: mar me lta bu'i lhag mthong gi rtags brgyad thob nas /
T02TD1199E:55a-11: de'i rjes la spyod pa brtsam par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:55a-12: skal ldan skal med phye bas na //
T02TD1199E:55a-13: des na gtang bar byang mi bya //
T02TD1199E:55a-14: zhes bya ba ni skal ba med cing dbang bskur ba ma thob pa la rang gis ji ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i man ngag mi ston yang skal ba dang ldan pa dbang shes rab ye shes thob nas /
T02TD1199E:55a-15: rdzogs pa'i rim pas bsgom pa la rang gis nyams su myong ba'i don bstan dgos pa yin ba des na gtang bar mi bya zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:55a-16: des na spyod ba gzhan don du yang 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1199E:55a-17: bza' dang ston mo byung ba yis //
T02TD1199E:55a-18: gang zhig rnyed pa bza' bya ste //
T02TD1199E:55a-19: zhes bya ba ni blang dor gyi rnam par rtog pa'i phyogs las rgyal ba'i rtog pa med pa'i bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:55a-21: 'di la lhag par zhen mi bya //
T02TD1199E:55a-22: zhes bya ba ni blang dor med par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sbyang ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1199E:55a-23: bslab pa dang ni cho ga dang //
T02TD1199E:55a-24: ro tsha dag pas grol bar bya //
T02TD1199E:55a-25: zhes bya ba ni bslab pa ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom ba'i bslab pa ste /
T02TD1199E:55a-26: rang gi shes rab ye shes kyi dang bang thob nas bde ba stong ba nyid mngon sum du rtogs pa'i tshe las dang po pa'i gnyen po nyan thos kyi bslab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:55a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa drang ba'i don du gsungs pa las rnam par grol bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:55a-28: cho ga ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bcos ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ste /
T02TD1199E:55a-29: bde ba stong nyid kyi don rtogs pa'i tshe bcos ma las grol bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:55a-31: kha cig glang po rnyed gyur nas //
T02TD1199E:55a-32: glang po'i rjes ni tshol byed dam //
T02TD1199E:55a-34: dper na pha rol don gnyer 'ga' //
T02TD1199E:55a-35: gzings la brten nas don gnyer te //
T02TD1199E:55b-0: @55b pa rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed //
T02TD1199E:55b-1: phyi rol bcos ma de bzhin do //
T02TD1199E:55b-3: ngo tsha dag las zhes bya ba ni khrus dang gtsang sbra la sogs pa 'jig rten na bstod pa dor na ngo tsha ba yin yang /
T02TD1199E:55b-4: rang gi bde ba stong ba nyid rtogs pa'i tshe 'jig rten pa'i chos brgyad las grol bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:55b-5: srid pa'i rang bzhin gshegs pa dang //
T02TD1199E:55b-6: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis stong bar rtogs pas srid pa la mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:55b-7: brtse chen sbyor bas rgyu bar bya //
T02TD1199E:55b-9: snying rjes bu gcig pa ltar sems pas mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:55b-10: rgyu ba ni spyod lam bzhis gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:55b-11: des phyogs las rnam rgyal bshad na /
T02TD1199E:55b-12: da ni dbang bzhi pa thob pas shin tu spros pa med pa zung du 'jug pa'i spyod pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:55b-13: sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dka' thub dang //
T02TD1199E:55b-14: sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spang //
T02TD1199E:55b-16: bde ba chen pos rgyas btab nas sgyu ma dang stong ba ro gcig par shes nas mi dge ba'i gnyen por dge ba zag bcas kyi sbyin sreg rtogs pa dang bcas pas bskrad ba dang phyi'i yul lnga dang nang gi bdud rtsi lnga lha mor bskyed pa'i mchod sbyin dang /
T02TD1199E:55b-17: sdom pa gsum la gnas pa'i dka' thub dang /
T02TD1199E:55b-20: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsgom pa'i bsam gtan ni bcos ma yin pas rnam par spang ngo //
T02TD1199E:55b-21: dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol /
T02TD1199E:55b-22: shin tu rnal 'byor ldan pas spyad //
T02TD1199E:55b-23: ces bya ba ni dam tshig dang sdom pa ni rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslad [*bslang?] pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsod nams kyi las shin tu rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dbang bzhi thob pas bde ba stong ba nyid rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zag med kyi sdom pa yin pas zag bcas kyi sdom pa las grol bar spyad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1199E:55b-24: brgya byin lha yi gdon dag ni //
T02TD1199E:55b-25: mdun na des par gnas rgyur kyang //
T02TD1199E:55b-27: dbang bzhi pa'i gseng brtol ba'i tshe na thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin las ma 'das par rtogs pas gdon la sogs pa glo bur gyi rnam rtog gi snang ba yin pas na /
T02TD1199E:55b-28: mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i tshul du rgyu bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-0: @56a * // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:56a-1: zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-2: sgrub pos rtag tu snying rje dang //
T02TD1199E:56a-3: rnal 'byor btung la dga' bya yin //
T02TD1199E:56a-5: snying rje ni rtogs pa dang bral ba'i myong ba'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-6: de la stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i btung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-7: de nyid bde ba chan po'i 'od gsal ba yin pas de la dga' bar bya'i //
T02TD1199E:56a-8: gzugs sdu gu dang sgra snyan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:56a-11: reg bya yid du 'od ba la sogs pa ni btung ba gzhan te /
T02TD1199E:56a-12: btung ba de la sems can chags pa ni bzi ba'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-13: min zhes pa ni dgag pa'i sgra ste /
T02TD1199E:56a-14: chags par mi bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1199E:56a-15: zung du 'jug pa dang po bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:56a-16: bskyed rdzogs zung du 'jug pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:56a-17: de nas ldan rgyal tshab kyis //
T02TD1199E:56a-18: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1199E:56a-19: zhes bya ba ni zung gi spyod pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-20: gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba //
T02TD1199E:56a-21: brtul zhugs spyod pa bshad par bya //
T02TD1199E:56a-22: zhes bya ba ni dngos gzhi bdag rdzogs par longs spyod pa 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa dang mthun par rjes la ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa bsgoms pas na dngos grub kyi mthar 'gro ba yin pas spyod pa de bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-23: rna ba gnyis la 'khyil ba gzung //
T02TD1199E:56a-24: zhes bya ni snang ba mtha' yas so sor rtog pa gzung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-25: spyi bor 'khor bcang ba ni mi bskyod pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-26: lag pa gnyis la gdu bu zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad me long lta bu'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-27: rked par skar rags ni dpal he ru ka'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-28: rkang pa'i gdu bu ni don yod grub bya ba nan tan gyi rnam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-29: lag pa'i rtsa ba'i dpung rgyan dang mgrin pa'i phreng ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56a-30: rnam par rtog pa'i yul du phyag rgya drug bsgom pa ni bskyed rim kun du brtags pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:56a-31: zad par chu bzhin du mtshan ma thob pas phyag rgya drug snang ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi snang ba yin la dbang bzhi bas gseng brtol nas 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'i phyag drug gnang ba ni yongs su grub pa chos nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56b-0: rnam pa dang nyams su myong ba gnyis mar me'i 'od bzhin du zung du @56b 'jug pas na gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56b-1: de ltar zung 'jug rgyal tshab lta bu bshad nas dpa' bo gcig pu bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:56b-2: stag gi pags pa gon nas su //
T02TD1199E:56b-3: mi 'chi bcu phyed bza' bar bya //
T02TD1199E:56b-5: sems can mos pa'i dbang gis drag po 'jigs byed gdul ba'i phyir stag dang glang po che'i pags pa gyon pa dang /
T02TD1199E:56b-6: bcu phyed kyi bdud rtsi bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:56b-7: skyes bus shin tu mnyam bzhag pas //
T02TD1199E:56b-8: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor gnas //
T02TD1199E:56b-9: zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi sku gar gyi nyams dgu dang mthun pa'o //
T02TD1199E:56b-10: rgyu zhes sdang gis bslang ba med na /
T02TD1199E:56b-11: ci'i phyir mngon spyod kyi gzugs su snang zhe na /
T02TD1199E:56b-12: khro bo'i skur snang ba la rgyu rnam pa gsum ste so so'i skye bo rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tshe che sdang gis kun nas bslangs nas khro bor snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:56b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba zag bcas kyis bslangs nas tshar bcad cing phan gdags pa'i phyir khro bor snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:56b-14: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa yin yang thugs rje chen po dbang gis khro bor snang ba'o //
T02TD1199E:56b-15: dbang bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni stong nyid kyi gseng brtol bas zag pa med pa'i bde ba rtogs pa yin yang snying rjes kun nas bslang bas dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas so //
T02TD1199E:56b-16: de ltar na mi dge ba bcu yang gsum shes par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:56b-17: so so'i skye bo'i tshe nyon mongs pa kun nas bslang ba'i mi dge ba bcu dang /
T02TD1199E:56b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la dge ba zha bcas snying rjes kun nas bslang ba'i mi dge ba bcu dang /
T02TD1199E:56b-19: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas zag pa spangs kyang sems can gzhan gyi don du mi dge ba'i mngon spyod mdzad pa ltar snang ngo //
T02TD1199E:56b-20: dang po ni theg pa gsum gyis dor bar bya ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:56b-21: bar ma ni kun nas bslang ba'i dge ba bsod nams kyi tshogs yin la /
T02TD1199E:56b-22: tha ma ni gzhan don ye shes kyi tshogs yin no //
T02TD1199E:56b-23: de yang sngags kyi spyod pa'i gnas skabs su mi tshangs par spyod pa ni khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir gnang ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:57a-0: srog gcod pa ni gnang ba'i skabs med @57a * //
T02TD1199E:57a-1: de des thob nas zag pa med pa'i sdom pa skyes pa'i tshe srog gcod pa la sogs pa yang gzhan gyi don du gnang ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:57a-2: bdag byin gyis rlob pa la ye shes zhabs ni mi dge ba bcu'i nang nas mnar sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba gsum ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma thob yin la /
T02TD1199E:57a-3: lus dag gi bdun ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /
T02TD1199E:57a-4: lung du ma bstan pa gsum kas kyang kun nas bslong bas bcas pa'i kha na mtho ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:57a-5: sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshe dge ba zag med kyis kun nas bslang ba'i tshe bdun yang byar rung ngo zhe'o //
T02TD1199E:57a-6: de ltar na dbang bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mngon spyod kyi bya ba rnams zag med kyi sdom par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:57a-8: rnal ma'i lam la brten nas ni //
T02TD1199E:57a-9: thams cad byas kyang rnam par gro //
T02TD1199E:57a-11: bzhi mdzes mig gi dkyus ring zhing //
T02TD1199E:57a-12: rang gis dbang bskur snying rjer ldan //
T02TD1199E:57a-13: rdo rje'i bu mo 'di bzung ste //
T02TD1199E:57a-14: brtul zhugs spyad na sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:57a-15: zhes bya ba ni bde ting nge 'dzin 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir zhi gnas kyi rgyu tshogs pa bzhin mdzes mig dkyus ring ba brtsal ba dang //
T02TD1199E:57a-16: sdom pa gsum la gnas pa'i phyir rang gis dbang bskur ba dang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir snying rje dang ldan pa dang rigs mnyam par bya ba'i phyir dmangs rigs rdo rje lta bu'i bu mo gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:57a-17: brtul zhugs spyad na zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi lha mo de bzung nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa la stong pa nyid gyis [*kyis] rgyas gang ba pa'o //
T02TD1199E:57a-18: rdo rje'i rigs ni med gyur na //
T02TD1199E:57a-20: dung can dang padma can dang ri dags can ma rnyed na'o //
T02TD1199E:57a-24: rigs lang dang ni rjes mthun pa //
T02TD1199E:57a-25: skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par 'dod //
T02TD1199E:57a-26: rin chen rgyal po'i rigs las skyes //
T02TD1199E:57a-27: rje rigs dpag med rdo rje ste //
T02TD1199E:57a-28: dmangs las skyes pa las kyi rigs //
T02TD1199E:57a-29: gdol pa rnam snang rigs can no //
T02TD1199E:57a-30: zhes bya ba rim pas bsgom pa 'am /
T02TD1199E:57a-32: yang na gzhan gyi rigs kyang rung //
T02TD1199E:57a-34: tha mal pa'i rigs bud med ngan spyod ma yang gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-1: mi ngan dud 'gro mo yang bsten //
T02TD1199E:57b-2: zhes bya ba ni dud 'gro'i sgra ni ti rdza zhes bya ba 'gram la bya la /
T02TD1199E:57b-3: rdza ka zhes bya ba chu bo'i 'gram las rgal ba la bya'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-4: des na 'khor ba'i chu bo las sgrol ba'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:57b-5: ngan spyod ma la dud 'gro zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-7: 'khor ba'i chu bo las sgrol bas //
T02TD1199E:57b-8: dud 'gro zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1199E:57b-9: zhes gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba las gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:57b-10: byang chub sa bon bkod pas ni //
T02TD1199E:57b-11: legs par sbyangs te gzung bar bya //
T02TD1199E:57b-13: lus la lha bkod nas bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyangs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-14: rig bya ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa la yang bsgre ba bstan pa ni //
T02TD1199E:57b-15: gsang tshe glu ni len gyur pa //
T02TD1199E:57b-16: de tshe rdo rje ldan pa mchog / ces bya bas ni reg bya bzhin du bya bar bstan ro //
T02TD1199E:57b-17: thar pa'i rgyur ni gar byed na //
T02TD1199E:57b-18: de nas rdo rje rkang pa'i gar //
T02TD1199E:57b-19: zhes bya ba la bcangs la sogs pa lus kyi reg bya gzhan la yang zag med kyis rgyas btab na thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-20: mchog tu dga' ba bskyed 'gyur ba //
T02TD1199E:57b-21: rnal 'byor pa ni rtag tu bya //
T02TD1199E:57b-22: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan la bde ba rtog pa med pa bskyed la /
T02TD1199E:57b-23: stong pa nyid kyis rgyas gdab par rtag tu bya'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-24: de ltar dpa' po gcig pu'i spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:57b-25: rigs thun mong gi spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:57b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1199E:57b-28: phyag rgya rigs lnga'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:57b-29: shes rab stong pa nyid kha tv'am ga'i tshul gyis snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:57b-30: da ma ru thabs sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin yin pa dang /
T02TD1199E:57b-31: gzhi mnyam nyid kyi sman rtag tu bza' ba dang gla rtsi'i chu btung ba ni ro mnyam gyi spyod pas zag med kyi sngom par 'gyur la /
T02TD1199E:57b-32: rgyu rkyen tshogs pa rten 'brel gyi rgyu rga ba dang 'chi ba las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD1199E:57b-33: nang thams cad las bsrungs pas /
T02TD1199E:57b-34: kha sha tva t+hva zhes bya ba dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD1199E:57b-35: lus zungs 'phel bas ka ma tva t+hva zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-36: sa'i dbang phyug grub pas 'jigs pa brgyad dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:57b-37: rkun ma'i skra las cod pan bya //
T02TD1199E:57b-38: zhes bya ba ni ro'i skra las so //
T02TD1199E:58a-0: der ni h'um las byung ba @58a * //
T02TD1199E:58a-3: byang chub sems las byung ba'i dur khrod kyi rus pa la rigs lnga'i 'bur brkos pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58a-4: tshad ni ji rtsam zhe na /
T02TD1199E:58a-5: sor lnga pa yi dum bu las //
T02TD1199E:58a-6: byas pa'i cod pan gzung bya ste //
T02TD1199E:58a-8: h'um las byung ba gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:58a-9: sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa dag / rnal 'byor spyod pas bcang bar bya //
T02TD1199E:58a-11: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni //
T02TD1199E:58a-12: sker rags gnyis skor bcings nas ni //
T02TD1199E:58a-13: zhes bya ba mi'i skra dang rus pa'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58a-14: skar yi dag byed thal ba dag / ces bya ba ni lus thal bas byugs pa'i steng du dur khrod kyi skra las byas pa'i tshangs skud rnal 'byor pas bcangs bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:58a-15: rde chung sgra ni bzlas pa ste //
T02TD1199E:58a-16: zhes bya ba ni rang gi don gyi dbang du byas na srog aa lba dha ti'r 'jug pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:58a-17: de yang gzhan gyi don yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:58a-18: sems can thams cad mgron du bod //
T02TD1199E:58a-20: bde ba stong pa nyid sgoms shig / ces gtams pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58a-21: rgyan dang bcad pa'i lha'i sku 'ba' zhig la mos pa 'am zhe na /
T02TD1199E:58a-22: kha tam shes rab bsgoms pa ste //
T02TD1199E:58a-24: stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:58a-25: bsgom pas 'jig rten pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa'i rus pa'i rgyan can gyis spyod pa las /
T02TD1199E:58a-26: stong nyid kyis rgyas btab pa'i spyod pa khyad par du gyur pas na rdo rje theg pa chan du gyur zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:58a-27: chags dang rmongs dang 'jigs pa dang //
T02TD1199E:58a-28: khro dang ngo tsha la sogs spangs //
T02TD1199E:58a-29: zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtogs pas slang ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyang zhag bcas kyi sdom pa yin pas re bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:58a-30: he ru kar bsgoms rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1199E:58a-31: rigs lda kun la spyad par bya //
T02TD1199E:58a-32: zhes bya ba ni shin tu spros med bsgom pa rnal 'byor pas rgyal rigs dang /
T02TD1199E:58a-33: bram zhe dang rje'u dang dmangs dang /
T02TD1199E:58a-34: gdol pa la sogs pa'i rigs lnga la mnyam pa nyid du spyad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58a-35: rigs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1199E:58a-36: rigs gcig nyid du brtag par bya //
T02TD1199E:58a-37: zhes bya ba ni bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas /
T02TD1199E:58b-0: bde ba'i rang @58b bzhin du rigs gcig pa 'am chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas stong pa nyid du rigs gcig pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58b-1: rigs lnga tha dad par mthong ba ci'i phyir gcig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:58b-2: gang phyir bye brag mi dmigs pas //
T02TD1199E:58b-3: du ma nyid kyang gcig yin //
T02TD1199E:58b-5: so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad na kun rdzob kyi du ma nyid kyang don dam par rigs gcig yin no //
T02TD1199E:58b-6: gnyid ni kun du spangs nas su //
T02TD1199E:58b-7: zhes ba ni nyon mongs pa can ma rig pa'i gnyid dang /
T02TD1199E:58b-8: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i shes bya'i shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyid dbang bzhi pa'i gseng brtol ba'i stong nyid rtogs pas spangs te /
T02TD1199E:58b-9: spyod pa byas na ro mnyam par gyur pas the tsho ma med par 'grub par 'gyur ro//
T02TD1199E:58b-10: brtag pa lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:58b-12: // / de ltar spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:58b-13: da ni rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:58b-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi dor rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad pa ni gsang chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:58b-15: bdag byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pa ni dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i gang zhag 'jam dpal lta bus don dam pa'i bde ba rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam dbang bzhi pa thob nas shes bya thams cad ji ltar snang ba'i rim pa lha bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal lo //
T02TD1199E:58b-16: lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02TD1199E:58b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' brtse ba che //
T02TD1199E:58b-18: zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po la bod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58b-19: rje gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis //
T02TD1199E:58b-20: zhes pa ni bdag byin gyis rlob pa'i lam zab pas na rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i rtog pa med pa'i yid kyis shes par gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58b-21: rgyud rnams kun gyi nges pa gang //
T02TD1199E:58b-22: zhes pa ni gleng gzhi'i brjod bya'i don gsang chen kun du kha sbyor zhes bya ba de gtan la dbab par bzhed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:58b-23: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1199E:58b-24: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyud 'bum pa las /
T02TD1199E:58b-25: thabs dang shes rab kyi gleng gzhi bshad pa de 'dir gtan la dbab par bya'o zhes pa'i don yin no //
T02TD1199E:58b-26: de ltar mdor bsdus pa bshad nas rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:59a-3: yi ge aes brjod par bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pas bsgribs pas ni mi gsal bar gyur pa rtag tu sems can rnams kyi sems kyi khams ni dbugs 'byung 'jug la brten nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba dang 'od bar 'gyur ba yin na /
T02TD1199E:59a-4: zhag pa med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i khams zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ci la bgyi zhes zhus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:59a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1199E:59a-6: gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pas na //
T02TD1199E:59a-7: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1199E:59a-8: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i dbang du byas nas dkyil 'khor lus kyi dbus na bde ba'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:59a-9: spyan ras gzhigs dbang phyug gi dbang du byas nas /
T02TD1199E:59a-10: dkyil 'khor bha gzhes rlung dbus su chud pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa ni tshigs su bcad pa phyed dag gi dbang du byas nas bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:59a-11: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi dbang du byas na /
T02TD1199E:59a-12: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa'i don ston pa yin pas /
T02TD1199E:59a-13: yi ge re re'i rjod byed kyi sems 'od gsal ba'i snang ba khams bcu drug gi rang bzhin bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:59a-14: khams bcu drug ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:59a-15: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:59a-16: rnal 'byor pa'i lus la rnam par rtog pa'i yul du gyur pa kun du brtags pa'i sems can du snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:59a-17: ma rig pa 'khrul pa'i bag chags las byung ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi snang ba rtsa dang rlung gi 'khor lor snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:59a-18: gnyis su med pa'i sems 'od gsal gyi snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:59a-19: yongs su grub pa dang rnam pa gsum du gnas pa yin pas kun du brtags pa'i gnyen por bcos ma'i rnal 'byor lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:59a-20: gzhan gyi dbang rtsa dang rlung gi 'khor lo la mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i mi zab pa'i rdzogs rim bsgoms pa dang /
T02TD1199E:59a-21: sems 'od gsal ba chos kyi dbyings kyi snang ba zab pa'i rdzogs rim bsgom pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:59a-22: de yang rjod byed gsum gyis ston te /
T02TD1199E:59a-23: rnam par brtags pa'i gnyen por bskyed pa'i rim pa lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa /
T02TD1199E:59b-0: las dang po pa'i don du dag gis bstan @59b pa dang /
T02TD1199E:59b-1: rtsa dang rlung gi 'khor lo la mi zab pa rdzogs rim bsgom pa /
T02TD1199E:59b-2: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1199E:59b-3: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1199E:59b-4: zhes bya ba'i chogs su bcad pa bstan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:59b-5: zab pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi dor yi ge re re'i dbang du byas nas sems 'od gsal ba'i snang ba sten pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:59b-6: de yang ge re re'i brdas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brdar gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:59b-7: de bas na kyi lha mo zhes bos nas rgyud kyi nang nas yi ge bcu drug gi don bstan pa 'di dag gis /
T02TD1199E:59b-8: rtsa dang sgra yi rang bzhin las //
T02TD1199E:59b-9: cha yi bdag nyid 'byung ba ste //
T02TD1199E:59b-11: rtsa ni lha mo'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:59b-12: sgra ni rlung gi rang bzhin te dpa' bo //
T02TD1199E:59b-13: cha de gnyis 'dus pa las byung ba byang chub sems kyis rang bzhin te /
T02TD1199E:59b-15: de yang 'od gsal du snang ba'i rtsa dang /
T02TD1199E:59b-16: rlung gi rang bzhin ni khams bcu drug tu snang ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:59b-17: de ltar khams bcu drug bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:59b-18: srid pa 'byung ba'i rim pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:59b-19: ra ni me ru bstan pa ste //
T02TD1199E:59b-20: khra dang mkhris pa yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1199E:59b-21: zhes bya ba ni ma rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:59b-22: bad kan gyis ni khyab nas su //
T02TD1199E:59b-23: rdul dang rgyus pa 'byung ba yin //
T02TD1199E:59b-24: zhes bya bas ni pha'i bon gyi rang bzhin yi ge brgyad bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:59b-25: de'i dbus su h'um gnas pa ni don ci yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:59b-26: srid pa bar mdo'i dri zha nye bar 'khor ba zhugs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:59b-27: de dag gtso bo'i h'um yin te /
T02TD1199E:59b-28: ha ni kun du 'gro bar brjod //
T02TD1199E:59b-29: ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rten yin no //
T02TD1199E:59b-30: de la brten nas dri zha nye bar 'khor ba 'jug pa ni yi ge ha kun du 'gro bar brjod do //
T02TD1199E:59b-31: de'i phyir kun du 'gro bar brjod ce na /
T02TD1199E:59b-32: dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan //
T02TD1199E:59b-33: mi ldog de ni dri zha'o //
T02TD1199E:59b-34: zhes 'byung bas kun du 'gro bar brjod do //
T02TD1199E:59b-35: rnam par shes pa de ma'i mngal du brgyal nas gang du she na /
T02TD1199E:59b-36: rus pa yi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02TD1199E:59b-37: sa bon lnga yis khyab pa yin //
T02TD1199E:59b-39: pha dang ma'i lus zungs kyi mtshams su bdud rtsi mtshams su bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i sa bon khyab pa la brten nas gnas pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:60a-1: mar lus su gyur pa'i gnas skabs gad du gnas she na /
T02TD1199E:60a-2: rang gi rkan la gnas pa ste //
T02TD1199E:60a-3: sa bon bzhi ni bla nas med /
T02TD1199E:60a-5: rkan ni lkog ma longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i sa bon bzhi'i 'byung ba bzhi ni rlung go //
T02TD1199E:60a-6: re'u mig dang po'i gnas su ni //
T02TD1199E:60a-7: zhes bya ba ni snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-8: sa bon lnga pos brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1199E:60a-9: zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'i dangs ma la brten pa'i rlung dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-10: ha ni dbyangs yig drug pa dang //
T02TD1199E:60a-11: lta bar rnam par shes ba grags //
T02TD1199E:60a-12: zhes pa ni yi ge h'um ste /
T02TD1199E:60a-13: des brjod par bya ba'i don ni nam mkha'i rlung ste /
T02TD1199E:60a-14: de la brten pa'i rtog pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-15: des longs spyod kyi 'khor lo dang chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:60a-16: de'i dbus na gnas pa nam mkha'i rlung la brten pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa med pa yin pas de yang yi ge has bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:60a-17: ha zhes bya ba kun na gnas pa /
T02TD1199E:60a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ste //
T02TD1199E:60a-19: 'byung ba lda [*lnga?] ni sangs yin la /
T02TD1199E:60a-20: de'i rlung lnga ro gcig par gyur pa la brten pa ni shes pa rtog pa med pa sems 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-21: sems 'od gsal ba dngos po'i rang bzhin yang rnal 'byor pas ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na //
T02TD1199E:60a-23: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod tshul yin //
T02TD1199E:60a-25: 'byung gnas ni 'byung khung gi rgyu ste /
T02TD1199E:60a-26: nam mkha'i rlung la brten pa'i mi rtog pa'i shes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-27: rgyu tshul ni srog aa lba dh'um ta'i chud pa'o / des 'byung rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1199E:60a-28: dbang po drug gi shes pa bde ba rtog pa med pa skyes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-29: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod tshul yin //
T02TD1199E:60a-31: dam tshig ni dbang po drug shes par bde ba las mi 'da' na dam tshig go //
T02TD1199E:60a-32: spyod pa ni yul rnam pa drug go //
T02TD1199E:60a-33: spyod tshul ni bde bas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-34: de ltar pa med pa'i shes pa ni 'jig rten gsum du rnyeng par dka' ba yin la /
T02TD1199E:60a-35: sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba thog ma dang dbus dang tha mar yang dag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60a-37: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1199E:60a-38: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02TD1199E:60a-39: zhes dpal mchog dang po las gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:60a-40: bsrub bya srub pa'i sbyor bzhin du //
T02TD1199E:60b-0: zhes pa ni phyag rgya bzhi @60b dang /
T02TD1199E:60b-1: thabs bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa med par mnyam par mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-2: sngags bzlas zhes bya ba ni dbugs 'byung rdub [*rngub?] gsum mo //
T02TD1199E:60b-3: bsam gtam zhes bya ba ni shes dang ye shes so //
T02TD1199E:60b-4: sogs zhes bya ba ni rdzogs rim lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-5: sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1199E:60b-6: zhes pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i thabs la brten nas yul stong pa nyid la sbyor ba'i ye shes ni rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa dang bral bas na /
T02TD1199E:60b-7: sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes so //
T02TD1199E:60b-8: rgyud ni bshad kyis nyan par gyis //
T02TD1199E:60b-9: zhes pa ni skabs dbye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:60b-10: ci'i phyir de skad du gsungs shen /
T02TD1199E:60b-11: chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'od gsal ba yin yang /
T02TD1199E:60b-12: phyag rgya bzhi'i thabs kyis stong pa nyid mngon du sum du ma grub na /
T02TD1199E:60b-13: tshu rol mthong ba'i gang zhag gis mngon sum du rtogs par mi nus pas na thabs shes rab kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du mnyan par gyis shes ces pa'i don to //
T02TD1199E:60b-16: skye gnas dbus na rtsa gnyis te //
T02TD1199E:60b-17: g-yon dang de bzhin g-yas na'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-18: zhes bya ba la skyes gnas ni lte ba sprul pa'i ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus na la la n'a dang ras na'i rtsa gnyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-19: g-yon nas de bzhin khu zhes pa ni la la na'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-20: g-yas nas de bzhin khrag rgyu ba ni ras na'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-21: de 'dus pa'i dbus na nam mkha'i rlung chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnas pa ni aa lba dh'uam ri'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-22: rdul dang mun pa'i snying po stobs //
T02TD1199E:60b-23: zhes brdar btags pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-24: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1199E:60b-26: zhes pa ni dngos po byang chub kyi sems dang dngos med rang byung gnyis 'dres ba'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-27: de 'ba' zhig 'dres par gyur tam zhe na khams bcu drug ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1199E:60b-28: cir ro gcig par gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:60b-29: bde ba chen por snang ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:60b-30: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:60b-31: skyes bu'i lus tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi dus dang /
T02TD1199E:60b-32: tshor ba bde pa'i dus dang /
T02TD1199E:60b-33: tshor btang btang snyoms kyi dus dang /
T02TD1199E:60b-34: dus gsum du gnas pas na rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor bas rlung me'i drod can bskyed nas khams bcu drug gi rang bzhin bzhus te /
T02TD1199E:60b-35: de bde ba'i rang bzhin du ro gcig par gyur te /
T02TD1199E:60b-36: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du shes rab 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:60b-37: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:60b-38: sgyum [*sgyu ma] dag ni thams cad las //
T02TD1199E:60b-39: las kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1199E:60b-40: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni //
T02TD1199E:61a-3: de ltar na phang ma'i mnyam sbyor gyi dus kyi tshe bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i rnam par shes pa las rnal 'byor pa sgyu ma lta bu'i lus su 'byung bas na /
T02TD1199E:61a-4: bshang gci bad kan khrag dang ni //
T02TD1199E:61a-5: de bzhin lnga pa khu ba ste //
T02TD1199E:61a-6: bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin lus //
T02TD1199E:61a-7: zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa'i shes pa'i snang ba bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga 'dus pa'i lus so //
T02TD1199E:61a-8: de ni rdo rje can zhes brjod //
T02TD1199E:61a-9: ces bya ba ni sems 'od gsal ba'i snang ba rtog pa med pa'i shes pa'i nyams su myong ba'i dus su rdo rje can zhes bya ba yin te /
T02TD1199E:61a-10: mi 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:61a-11: gang zhig ma shes par gnyis su brtags pa de'i tshe kun du brtags pa'i lus su snang pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:61a-12: gnyis su snang bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe gzhan gyi dbang gi lus yin no //
T02TD1199E:61a-13: lus de nyid nub par gyur pas /
T02TD1199E:61a-14: lus gnas chen po lus skyes min //
T02TD1199E:61a-15: zhes bya ba ste 'od gsal ba'i snang ba la /
T02TD1199E:61a-16: rdo rje can zhes brjod do //
T02TD1199E:61a-18: rus pa rkang dang khu ba ni //
T02TD1199E:61a-19: pha las skyes par bsten pa ste //
T02TD1199E:61a-20: lus kyi bye brag gsum ni pha'i rgyud las skyes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:61a-21: sha dang khrag dang pags pa ni ma las skyes pa ste /
T02TD1199E:61a-22: khams bcu drug gis lus kyi gong bu /
T02TD1199E:61a-23: mdor bsdus pa ni rnal 'byor pa bzhi'i lus su bstan te /
T02TD1199E:61a-24: gnyis las 'byung bas na khams du ma yin la /
T02TD1199E:61a-25: bsdoms pas na gcig yin te des na gcig dang du ma 'dres pa'i lus la rdo rje can zhes brjed de //
T02TD1199E:61a-26: zla ba bcu yi rnam pa las //
T02TD1199E:61a-27: sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug yin //
T02TD1199E:61a-28: zhes gsungs pas na byang chub pa'i lus su bshad do //
T02TD1199E:61a-29: de ltar srid pa 'byung ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro mnyam par bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:61a-30: da ni shes pa rtog pa med pa skye ba'i gnas bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:61a-31: rtsa rnams thams cad yang dag 'jug / de yi sgo ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD1199E:61a-32: zhes bya ba ni lus kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo'i dbus na sgo rnam pa gnyis gnas te /
T02TD1199E:61a-33: gtum mo drod gyen du 'gro ba'i spyi gtsug gi sgo dang /
T02TD1199E:61a-34: byang chub kyi sems thur la 'bab pa aa lba dh'u ta'i'i sgo'o //
T02TD1199E:61a-35: de dag 'dus pa'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1199E:61a-36: lha yi lus su dmigs par 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:61b-0: @61b zhes bya ba ni sngar khams nyer bzhir tshor ba btang snyoms kyi dus las gtum mo drod kyi bde ba bskyed nas byang chub sems kyis khyab pa de'i tshe lha'i lus su 'gyur te bde bas khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:61b-1: steng gi sgo dang 'og sgo nyid //
T02TD1199E:61b-2: ces bya ba ni aa lba dh'u ta'i'i steng dang 'og go //
T02TD1199E:61b-3: 'og sgo rnam par shes pa ste //
T02TD1199E:61b-4: steng gi sgo ru khams rnams so //
T02TD1199E:61b-5: zhes pa ni gtum mo drod gyen du 'gro ba'i rim pas /
T02TD1199E:61b-10: spyi gtsug nas nam mkha'i rlung khams rnams su gtum mo drod bskyed pa dang byang chub kyi sems babs pas 'og sgo la brten nas rnams shes dang ye shes skye ba'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-11: rnal 'byor pas ni rtsa rnams kun //
T02TD1199E:61b-13: zhes bya ba ni dbugs 'byung 'jug byed pa'i tshe 'khor lo bzhir 'byung ba'i rlung rnams lhan cig tu 'dus nas 'byung 'jug byed pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:61b-14: lus la rtag tu steng sgor ni //
T02TD1199E:61b-15: rdo rje can ni rgyun du gnas //
T02TD1199E:61b-16: zhes bya ba spyi gtsug nas aa na ha'i byang chub sems kyi thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-18: sgo dgu yis ni yang dag bskor //
T02TD1199E:61b-20: gyen du rgyus pas mig dang /
T02TD1199E:61b-23: lce'i rlung bzhi bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:61b-24: thur du sel bas bshad gci gnyis bskyed pa dang me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i rlung gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-25: de ltar sgo dgu ni bu ga dgu'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khrul 'khor gsum zhus pa ni bka' stsal pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba ni sku ni bshang gci'i sgo'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-31: thugs ni aa lba dh'u t'ir nas byang chub sems 'bab pa'i sgo'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-32: mchog ni bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pas na aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-33: bar ma ni tshor ba btang snyoms bskyed pas na rlung gi sgo bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-34: tha ma ni tshor ba sdug bsngal dang ldan pa de sems gzung bar dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:61b-35: ka ba gcig ni aa wa dh'u ta'i'o //
T02TD1199E:61b-36: rigs pa lnga ni dbang po lnga'o //
T02TD1199E:62a-0: rtsom pa'i lha sprul zhes pa ni de bzhin @62a * //
T02TD1199E:62a-1: gshegs pa'i brdas rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod par grags pa'o //
T02TD1199E:62a-2: gang gis de shes sems ldan zhing //
T02TD1199E:62a-3: zhes pa ni bde ba skye ba'i lus kyi gnas shes pas skyes bu rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:62a-4: ma shes na ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:62a-5: dus rnams kun du rtag par ni //
T02TD1199E:62a-8: dus rtag tu dbugs 'byung rngub la brten nas srog chags rkang gnyis dang rkang mangs la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung la brten nas sems gnas pa'i cho ga gnyis su 'gyur te thim pa dang 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1199E:62a-9: thim pa ni nam mkha'i rlung ste /
T02TD1199E:62a-10: srog aa lba dh'u ta'ir gtan du gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:62a-11: 'jug pa ni phyir song ba las 'ongs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:62a-12: de gnyis la brten nas rtog pa med pa'i shes pa skye ba yin la //
T02TD1199E:62a-13: rtog pa med pa rgyun du gnas pa las bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:62a-14: de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis mi shes pa ni so so'i skye bo nyid yin no //
T02TD1199E:62a-15: de ltar sgo dgu'i bye brag mdor bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:62a-16: de'i don rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:62a-17: me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni //
T02TD1199E:62a-18: dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu //
T02TD1199E:62a-20: lte ba me'i rlung mig gi sgo nas steng du rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:62a-21: rkang pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas rna ba'i sgo nas logs su rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:62a-22: snying ga sa'i dkyil 'khor nas sna'i rlung thad kar rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1199E:62a-23: lte ba chu'i dkyil 'khor nas lte ba'i rlung thur du rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1199E:62a-24: de ltar 'khor lo bzhi las rnam par shes pa bzhi dang 'pho ba'i rlung rgyu ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:62a-25: gsum pa yid kyi sgo yin te //
T02TD1199E:62a-26: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyi rol gyi sgor gcig pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:62a-27: nang gi rtsa dbus mar zla ba byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba dang /
T02TD1199E:62a-28: nyi ma gtum mo drod 'jug pa'i sgo ni tshor ba bde ba skyes pa ni sgo rnams kyi mchog yin no //
T02TD1199E:62a-31: steng spyi gtsug dang 'og nor bu'i sna rtse ni rnal 'byor pa mngon sum gyi lam la gtso bo yin te /
T02TD1199E:62a-32: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis lus bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba bzhi bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:62a-33: ci'i phyir de gtso bor smos she na /
T02TD1199E:62b-0: rnal @62b 'byor pa la nye bar mkho ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:62b-1: tshad ma ni skyes bu blang dor gyi don bsgrub pa la nye bar mkho bas mkhas pa rnams kyis blang bar bya ba yin pa bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis skyes bu'i don grub pa dang /
T02TD1199E:62b-2: mngon sum gyi lam nye bar mkho ba yin pas /
T02TD1199E:62b-3: de'i phyir de yongs su btsal ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:62b-4: 'og sgo rnam par shes pa ste //
T02TD1199E:62b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pas go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:62b-6: de ltar lus kyi sgo dgu bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:62b-7: 'byung ba lnga'i rlung lus la rgyu ba bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:62b-8: rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1199E:62b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1199E:62b-10: 'byung ba lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga'o //
T02TD1199E:62b-11: steng gi sgo nas bskyed pa ni //
T02TD1199E:62b-12: nyin mtshan gcig la dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya phyir rgyu ba dang nang du 'jug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:62b-13: gnas pa gsum gyi dbye bas gnas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:62b-16: de dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02TD1199E:62b-17: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02TD1199E:62b-18: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1199E:62b-19: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni //
T02TD1199E:62b-22: mkha' 'gro ma dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1199E:62b-23: sbyor ba'i yum las kyi phyag rgya las rtog pa med pa'i rlung 'byung rngub kyi de nyid dang lus kyi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:62b-24: de yang rlung nang du 'jug pa na rtog pa med pa skye bas yon tan dang bde bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:62b-25: phyir rgyu bal ni rnam par rtog pa skye bas skyon dang sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba yin te de ltar rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1199E:62b-26: de ltar 'og rlung gi lam tshogs ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:62b-27: de ltar lus kyi gnas bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:62b-28: da ni lba santa ti la ka bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1199E:62b-29: bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par sbyor bas mnyes par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:62b-30: 'di skad ces zhus pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:62b-31: wa santa zhes gang la bgyi zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dbang po'i bye blag tshor ba bde ba skye ba'i rten snying ga'i byang chub sems kyi thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:62b-32: ti la ka ni ji lta bu zhes pa ni rlung me'i drod can bskyed pa'i rten lte ba'i khrag gi thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:62b-33: mi phyed la sogs gang du brten //
T02TD1199E:63a-0: zhes pa ni nam mkha'i rlung @63a * //
T02TD1199E:63a-2: aa na ha zhes bya ste phyir mi rgyu bas na srog ces bya'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-3: sogs pa ni gnas nyer bzhir rtsa'i gnas su rlung dang khams rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-4: de rnams gnas ni gang dag lags //
T02TD1199E:63a-5: zhes pa ni gnas nyer bzhi 'dri ba'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-6: pa'u li la sogs gang bstan pa //
T02TD1199E:63a-7: zhes ba ni bzhi gnas nyer bzhi'i ming bstan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-8: 'khor lo mchog ni ji ltar dgod //
T02TD1199E:63a-9: ces pa ni lus la sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ji ltar dgod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-10: rtsa rnams gang las ci 'byung ba //
T02TD1199E:63a-11: zhes bya ba ni rtsa rnams spyi gtsug nas skyes nas ji ltar 'byung ba zhus pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-12: bye brag de dag bshad du gsol //
T02TD1199E:63a-13: zhes zhus pas gnas sha'i gor gling dang /
T02TD1199E:63a-14: dpa' bo khams su gnas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:63a-15: dpa' mo rtsar gnas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:63a-16: 'khor lo gsum gyi bye brag zhus pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-18: gsang la shin tu gsang gyur pa //
T02TD1199E:63a-19: zhes pa ni gsal ba'i sems 'od gsal ba'i snang ba ltar bstan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-20: shin tu gsang ba ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas bde ba rtog pa med pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-21: pha rol phyin pas bcu ni //
T02TD1199E:63a-22: gnas la sogs pa rtsa yi gzugs //
T02TD1199E:63a-23: zhes pa ni rtog pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde ba'i gnas skabs kyis bcu'i snang ba ni rtsa'i gzugs su gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:63a-24: de yang sku khams shas che ba dang /
T02TD1199E:63a-25: gsung drod shas che ba dang /
T02TD1199E:63a-26: thugs rlung shas che ba'i bye brag gis gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:63a-27: mgo ni ma l'a ya yul te //
T02TD1199E:63a-28: zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-29: mkha' spyod thugs kyi 'khor lor gnas //
T02TD1199E:63a-31: mkha' spyod ni gtso bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:63a-32: thugs kyi 'khor lo ni rlung rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-33: gnas zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bde pas khyab pa'i dus de'i tshe thugs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-34: sa spyod gsung gyi [*gi] 'khor lor gnas //
T02TD1199E:63a-35: zhes pa la sa spyod ni snying gas dang /
T02TD1199E:63a-37: lte ba me la brten pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-38: gsung gi 'khor lo ni drod shas che ba'o //
T02TD1199E:63a-39: de yang zhing dang rol par gyur pa ni gang gi tshe lus la bde ba gnas pa dus de'i tshe 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:63a-41: sku yi 'khor lor yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:63a-43: sa 'og ni gsang ba'i rdo rje nas pus mo'i bar du'o //
T02TD1199E:63b-0: sku'i @63b 'khor lo ni khams rgyu ba shas che ba'o //
T02TD1199E:63b-1: 'dus dang dur khrod du rgyu ba ni gang gi che bde bas khyab pa'i dus kyi tshe yin gyi khams nyer bzhi tshor ba btang snyoms kyi dus sam rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan shas che bar 'gyur ba tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi dus ni ma yin no //
T02TD1199E:63b-2: de dag mkha' 'gro ma rnams yul //
T02TD1199E:63b-3: zhes bya ba ni sha'i 'khor lo de dag ste sngar gnas gang lags zhes zhus pa'i lan yin no //
T02TD1199E:63b-4: rang gi lus las byung ba ste //
T02TD1199E:63b-6: rtsa rnams gang las ji ltar byung //
T02TD1199E:63b-7: zhes bya ba'i lan yin te //
T02TD1199E:63b-8: de yang thog mar spyi gtsug nas 'byung ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ni zhes pa /
T02TD1199E:63b-9: bye brag de dag bshad du gsol //
T02TD1199E:63b-11: bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar lha'i skus mi gnas na mkha' 'gro ma gzugs ji ltar gnas she na /
T02TD1199E:63b-12: gnas kun du ni mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1199E:63b-13: rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:63b-15: de yi shugs kyis rgyud kyi rim pa'i tshe na /
T02TD1199E:63b-16: gnas de rnams su dpa' bo ni /
T02TD1199E:63b-17: khams kyi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:63b-19: sngags kyi rim pa'i tshe na /
T02TD1199E:63b-20: gnas de rnams su dang 'a bo ni //
T02TD1199E:63b-21: rlung gi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:63b-23: ye shes kyi rim pa'i dus kyi tshe na /
T02TD1199E:63b-24: gnas de rnams su dpa' bo ni //
T02TD1199E:63b-25: bde ba'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:63b-27: brtag pa drug pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:63b-29: // / de ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:63b-30: da ni thig le'i 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:63b-31: de nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus so //
T02TD1199E:63b-32: ji lta ba bzhin du gnas zhes pa ni don rang gi mtshan nyid kyi gnas lugs so //
T02TD1199E:63b-33: rtsa yi 'khor lo bshad par bya //
T02TD1199E:63b-34: zhes pa ni tshor ba bde ba skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa la nye bar mkho ba'i 'khor lo bshad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:63b-35: gnas de gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:63b-37: 'dab ma brgyad dang ge sar bcas //
T02TD1199E:63b-39: de yi dbus su 'gyur pa'i rtsa //
T02TD1199E:63b-40: mar me lta bu'i gzugs su gnas //
T02TD1199E:63b-41: zhes pa ni chu shing gi snying po ltar drang ba /
T02TD1199E:63b-42: padma'i skud pa ltar phra ba //
T02TD1199E:63b-43: til gyi mar me ltar gsal ba //
T02TD1199E:64a-1: kyi lo ma ltar dmar ba'o //
T02TD1199E:64a-2: de gang gi dbus su gnas she na /
T02TD1199E:64a-3: snying chu shing gi me tog lta bu'i dbyi bas can kha thur du bltas shing 'phyang ba'i dbus ni rtsa de gnas pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:64a-4: rtsa de'i tshigs kyi dbus na dpa' bo yungs kar gyi tshad tsam ste /
T02TD1199E:64a-5: spyi gtsug nas babs pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le lus bde ba'i dang po'i gnas so //
T02TD1199E:64a-6: h'um sa bon mi shigs pa //
T02TD1199E:64a-7: zhes pa ni nam mkha'i rlung spyi gtsug mig btsums gnyis kyi tshad du sdod pa mi shigs pa'i rlung la h'um gi ming gis btags pa'o //
T02TD1199E:64a-9: zhes pa ni gal te rlung me'i drod can gyis bzhus pa de'i tshe kha ba 'am ba mo lta bu'i mdog can 'dzag pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:64a-10: wa santa zhes bshad pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:64a-11: lus can kun gyi snying dga' byed //
T02TD1199E:64a-12: ces pa ni lus bde la dga' ba dang mchog dga' bskyed pa'i rgyu dpyid ces bya ba lus bde ba'i dbang po'i sa bon yin no //
T02TD1199E:64a-13: de ltar thabs kyi wa santa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:64a-14: shes rab ye shes kyi ti la ka bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:64a-15: rgod ma'i kha ni me yi gzugs //
T02TD1199E:64a-17: byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho ni rgod ma'i kha zhes bya la /
T02TD1199E:64a-18: de dang 'dra ba'i rlung nang du 'jug pa'i gnas lte ba ni rgod ma'i kha zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:64a-19: de'i gzugs ni rlung me'i drod can la bya ste /
T02TD1199E:64a-20: de nyid byang chub kyi sems 'bebs shing 'dzin pas na bdag med ma ti la ka zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:64a-21: bdag med ma ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i btsun mo'i brdas btags pa'o //
T02TD1199E:64a-22: ti la ka ni drod gtsub stan khrag gi thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:64a-23: las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su //
T02TD1199E:64a-24: zhes pa ni g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi rtsa ni srub thag yin la dbus ma aa lba dh'u ta'i ni srub shing yin no //
T02TD1199E:64a-25: gtsub stan ni me'i khams kyi lhag ma khrag gi thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:64a-26: de la g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi rlung gis bskyod nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'bar ba dang du ba dang gsal bar gyur nas snying ga'i wa santa dad phrad pas na lus dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang yid bde ba dang lhan cig skyes dga' 'byung ba'i rgyu ni 'ga' zhig snyoms par zhugs te gnas zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:64a-27: 'di nyid bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin rtog pa med pa'i bde ba yin pas na zhi gnas kyi bde ba rgyu'i he ru ka yin no //
T02TD1199E:64b-0: de bas na 'di ni @64b dpal ldan he ru ka /
T02TD1199E:64b-1: wa san ti la ka ru bzhed //
T02TD1199E:64b-3: bzhed ces bya ba ni lhag mthong stong pa nyid kyi ti la ka la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi wa santa dang ro gcig pa'i 'bras bu'i he ru ka ma yin yang zhig gnas rgyu'i he ru ka la dgongs nas bzhed ces gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:64b-4: rnal 'byor ma la sogs kyis ne //
T02TD1199E:64b-5: rgyu dang mi rgyu yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:64b-6: zhes bya ba ni rlung me'i drod can bems po yin yang rnam par shes pa'i snang ba yin bas rgyu bzhis bya'o //
T02TD1199E:64b-7: sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD1199E:64b-8: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i sgo dgu las rlung me'i drod can 'gro pa dang /
T02TD1199E:64b-10: de ltar wa san ti la ka bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:64b-11: de nas de'i bye brag gi gnas bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:64b-12: lte bar aa yi gzugs kyis te //
T02TD1199E:64b-13: thung du zhes pa ni bya bar grags //
T02TD1199E:64b-15: h'um mig btsums gcig gi tshad du sdod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:64b-16: snying gar yang ni h'um yig ste //
T02TD1199E:64b-17: cha gnyis tshad ni ri bo yin //
T02TD1199E:64b-19: mig btsums gnyis kyi tshad du sdod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:64b-20: mgrin par aam gi gzugs kyis te //
T02TD1199E:64b-21: 'dren pa cha gsum tshad yin te //
T02TD1199E:64b-22: zhes pa ni mig btsums gsum gyi tshad du sdod pa'i rlung ngo //
T02TD1199E:64b-23: dpral bar yang ni ham yin te //
T02TD1199E:64b-24: zhes pa ni dus thams cad du nam mkha'i rlung de gnas nas 'chi ka'i bar du lus la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:64b-25: rlung de rnams ji srid gtum mo'i drod ma skyes pa de srid du nam mkha'i rlung yin no //
T02TD1199E:64b-26: drod skyes pa'i dus su me'i rlung yin no //
T02TD1199E:64b-27: 'khor lo de rnams gang na gnas she na /
T02TD1199E:64b-28: sa sogs 'byung ba chen po ni //
T02TD1199E:64b-30: lteb ba med dang lte ba chu'i bar na lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1199E:64b-31: lte ba chu dang snying ga sa'i bar na snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1199E:64b-32: snying gas dang mgo bo nam mkha'i bar na longs spyod kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1199E:64b-34: phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i mtshams na bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1199E:64b-35: de rnams su byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i bde ba skyes pa rnal 'byor bzhi dad dga' ba bzhi dang dus bzhi zhes brjod do //
T02TD1199E:64b-36: des na sbyor ba bzhis 'gro ba ste /
T02TD1199E:64b-37: dga' ba bzhi yi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1199E:64b-38: mtshams bzhi ru ni lhag par gnas //
T02TD1199E:65a-0: @65a * // mchog tu dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1199E:65a-1: bya ba dang ni byed pa'i dngos //
T02TD1199E:65a-3: dga' ba bzhi bskyed pa'i bya ba khrag gis thig le dang /
T02TD1199E:65a-4: byed pa byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-5: dpal ldan rdo rje sems tshul gyis //
T02TD1199E:65a-7: rtog pa med pa'i bde ba'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-8: 'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol //
T02TD1199E:65a-10: lte ba'i dbus na bde bas khyab par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-11: phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la gnas pa //
T02TD1199E:65a-12: zhes pa ni 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rtsa'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-13: mtshams rtsar bdud rtsi lnga 'bab gnas //
T02TD1199E:65a-15: bdud rtsi bzhi mtshams bzhi'i rtsa dang /
T02TD1199E:65a-16: dbus ma byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa dang lda'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-17: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:65a-18: 'khor lo gsum gyi bye brag bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:65a-19: sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD1199E:65a-21: gnas nyer bzhi'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-22: gnas rnams su ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:65a-24: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-25: rtsa de rnams gang nas byung zhe na /
T02TD1199E:65a-26: mgo bo las ni byung ba'i rtsa //
T02TD1199E:65a-27: mgo las skyes zhes brjod pa ste /
T02TD1199E:65a-28: mngal du zhugs nas zhag bdun gyi tshe yi ge h'um gi gzugs can gyi rtsa grub pa'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-29: snying stobs rdul dang mun stobs kyis //
T02TD1199E:65a-31: la la n'a dad ra sa n'a dang /
T02TD1199E:65a-32: aa wa dh'u ta'i dang gsum mo //
T02TD1199E:65a-33: 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas rtsa brgya nyi shu'i yi ge la gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbye bas rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis yin no //
T02TD1199E:65a-34: de la gtso bo gsum yin la snying ga'i bdud rtsi lnga'i rtsa bzhi ma gtogs pa lhag ma nyer bzhi ni gnas nyer bzhi gnas pa'i rtsa yin te /
T02TD1199E:65a-36: mi phyed ma mgo bor ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-37: phra mo ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-38: gsal ba ni rna ba g-yas par ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-39: g-yon ma ni lhag par ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-40: 'dul byed ma ni rna ba g-yon par ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-41: rus sbal ma ni smin ma'i dbus su'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-42: srid pa ni mig gnyis na'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-43: dbang bskur ma ni phrad pa gnyis su ste thugs ka'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-44: bzang ldan ma ni mchan khung du'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-45: bshang ba ma ni nu mar ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-46: ma mo ni lte bar ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-47: mtshan mo ni sna rtser ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-48: bsil ster ma ni kha la'o //
T02TD1199E:65a-49: drod ma ni mgrin par ro //
T02TD1199E:65a-50: nags tshal ma ni snying gar ro //
T02TD1199E:65b-0: mgu ma ni chu sor te gsung gi @65b 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-1: mdog mdzes ma ni mtshan mar ro //
T02TD1199E:65b-2: thun mongs ma ni bshang ba'i lam la'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-3: rgyu ster ma ni brla la'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-4: bral ba ma ni rje dar la'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-5: mdza' mo ni rkang pa'i sor mor ro //
T02TD1199E:65b-6: grub ma ni rkang pa'i bol du'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-7: me ma ni mthe bo la'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-8: yid 'ong ma ni pus mo la ste sku'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-9: khams dang gnas nyer bzhi'i ming ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-10: snying ga'i dbus nas lte bar byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i rtsa ni sum rim zhes bya ste /
T02TD1199E:65b-11: dga' ba dang mchog dga' lhan cig skyes dga'i gnas yin no //
T02TD1199E:65b-12: snying ga'i shar lho mtshams na 'dod ma bshang ba'i dangs ma 'bab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:65b-13: lho nub mtshams na khyim ma gci ba'i dangs sa ma 'bab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:65b-14: nub byang gi mtshams na gtum mo khrag gi dangs ma 'bab pa dang /
T02TD1199E:65b-15: byang shar mtshams ni bdud 'dul ma sha'i dangs ma 'bab pa ste /
T02TD1199E:65b-16: de ltar na rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis yin no //
T02TD1199E:65b-17: brtag pa drug pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:65b-19: // / de ltar thig le'i 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:65b-20: da ni lus kyi 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:65b-21: rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1199E:65b-27: gnas la sogs pa ji lta bu yin zhes zhus pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:65b-28: lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02TD1199E:65b-29: rtsa yi gzugs las yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1199E:65b-31: bskyed pa'i rim pa brtags pa ma yin pa gzhan gyi dbang gi 'khor lo rtsa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:65b-32: des ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:65b-33: rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma bde pa'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i rten tsa yin pas lus kyi dkyil 'khor de btsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-34: he ru ka sogs lha yi ni //
T02TD1199E:65b-36: bde ba rtog med kyi lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-37: ji skad gsungs pa'i sgo bzhir ldan //
T02TD1199E:65b-40: rna ba dang kha chu'i sgo bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:65b-41: ka ba brgyad kyis bstan pa yin //
T02TD1199E:65b-43: dpung pa gnyis dang lag ngar gnyis dang rje ngar gnyis dang brla gnyis so //
T02TD1199E:65b-44: dngos po kun du mnyam pas na //
T02TD1199E:66a-0: rkang pa'i bar du mnyam bas na gru bzhi par @66a * //
T02TD1199E:66a-2: sku gsung thugs kyi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1199E:66a-3: zhes pa ni spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo'i g-yon pa la la n'a dang 'brel pa brgyad byang chub kyi sems rgyu ba sku dang /
T02TD1199E:66a-4: g-yas par sa n'a dang 'brel pa brgyad khrag rgyu ba gsung dang /
T02TD1199E:66a-5: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i dang 'brel pa brgyad rlung rgyu ba thugs dang 'brel pa brgyad dam tshig gi 'khor lo ste sum cu rtsa gnyis yin no //
T02TD1199E:66a-6: de ltar spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo gcig pu nyid la rtsa'i dbye bas 'khor lo gsum du brjod do //
T02TD1199E:66a-8: der ni mgo bo'i char gnas pa //
T02TD1199E:66a-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab skyes las //
T02TD1199E:66a-10: dbyangs dang gsal byed yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1199E:66a-11: byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis //
T02TD1199E:66a-13: gzhan dag ni sku'i gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yin zer te /
T02TD1199E:66a-14: theg pa'i 'khor lo'i skabs su bshad du zin kyang 'dir yang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:66a-15: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim gyis ni //
T02TD1199E:66a-16: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal //
T02TD1199E:66a-18: sum cu rtsa gnyis byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i dus de'i tshe rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:66a-19: bems ro la sogs rim bzhin gnas //
T02TD1199E:66a-21: rkang pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang lte ba me dang lto ba chu dang snying ga sa dang mgo bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni ri rab kyi dbyibs yin no //
T02TD1199E:66a-22: de ltar lus kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:66a-23: rgyas par bshad pa ni rkang mthil ni gzhu mchog gi dbyibs yin la /
T02TD1199E:66a-24: rkang pa gnyis ni gzhu'i yin pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:66a-25: sum mdo gru gsum ni me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:66a-26: lte ba zlum po ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:66a-27: snying ga gru bzhi ni sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:66a-28: sgal tshigs ni ri rab kyi dbyibs so //
T02TD1199E:66a-29: de'i dbus na rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1199E:66a-30: g-yon pa la la n'a dbyangs yig dang //
T02TD1199E:66a-31: g-yas pa ra sa n'a gsal byed dang /
T02TD1199E:66a-32: aa wa dh'u t'e mning [*ma ning?] dang dbus ma dang g-yas g-yon gnyis su 'dres pa'i sgo ma bzhi dang /
T02TD1199E:66a-33: g-yas g-yon gnyis 'dres pa'i mtshams ma bzhi ste /
T02TD1199E:66a-34: rtsa sum rtsu rta gnyis gnas pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:66a-35: mgo bo'i dbus na glad pa zhes bya bar grags pa ni /
T02TD1199E:66b-0: @66b de yid dbus su yi ge ham //
T02TD1199E:66b-2: rtsa'i dbus na srog ces bya ba'i rlung 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lus la 'byung zhing sngar mi 'byung bas mi shigs thig le'i gzugs can zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:66b-3: mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1199E:66b-5: byang chub kyi sems gsal ba la khrag gi dangs ma mi gsal ba'am /
T02TD1199E:66b-6: yang na byang chub kyi sems bems po'i gzugs kyis gnas kyang rnams par shes pa'i snang ba yin pas gsal ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02TD1199E:66b-7: de nyid brtan dang g-yor bcas pa //
T02TD1199E:66b-8: zhes pa ni brtan pa lus dang g-yo ba sems kyi rgyu sa bon gyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:66b-9: 'gro ba kun gyi rtsa ba ste //
T02TD1199E:66b-11: lus gnas pa'i rtsa ba ste /
T02TD1199E:66b-13: dngos po de las skyes pa yin //
T02TD1199E:66b-15: pha ma gnyis kyi sa bon zhag bdun gyi tshe na dang por spyi gtsug gi h'am grub pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:66b-16: 'o na de ltar gnas pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD1199E:66b-17: tshor ba btang snyoms kyi rten yin na bde ba skyes pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor du dus nam gyi tshe 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1199E:66b-18: me ni mnyes par byed pa ste //
T02TD1199E:66b-19: de nyid kyis ni sgo yang phye //
T02TD1199E:66b-21: gtum mo drod kyi nam mkha'i rlung mdzod spru'i sgo phyes nas des spyi gtsug gi byang chub kyi sems bzhu ba las nyin dang mtshan mo dbugs 'byung rngub kyi dus su bdud rtsi zla ba 'dzag pa des dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:66b-22: ci'i phyir dkyil 'khor zhes bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:66b-23: rtsa sum cu gnyis kyi dbus na gnas pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le gtum mo drod kyis len pas na /
T02TD1199E:66b-24: snying po len pas dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:66b-26: da ni mchod sbyin bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:66b-27: de ni phyi nang sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1199E:66b-28: khyab bya'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1199E:66b-30: phyi 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams pa lnga'o //
T02TD1199E:66b-31: nang gi bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa rang gi lus la grub pa'i rdza sa gnas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:66b-32: phyi gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa la dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin skye ba na mchod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:66b-33: nang bdud rtsi lnga'i zungs kyi dangs mas lus bde ba skyes pas phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid byang chub sems kyi rdo rje can zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:66b-34: sbom po dang ni phra gzugs kyi //
T02TD1199E:66b-35: zhes bya ba'i sbom po ni /
T02TD1199E:67a-2: phra gzugs ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas lus bde ba dang yid bde ba skyed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:67a-3: su lam chod par bya zhe na /
T02TD1199E:67a-4: 'gro ba sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1199E:67a-7: rang bzhin yin pas dga' ba bzhi //
T02TD1199E:67a-8: skye ba'i sgo nas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:67a-9: de ci'i phyir gsungs she na /
T02TD1199E:67a-10: de ni sangs rgyas byang sems kyi //
T02TD1199E:67a-11: dam tshig don du gsungs pa ste //
T02TD1199E:67a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bde ba rtog pa med pa las zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:67a-14: yul lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga las bde ba rtog pa med pa skyes pas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD1199E:67a-15: tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1199E:67a-16: thob pa'ang dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
T02TD1199E:67a-18: bde ba rtog pa med pa ni bsam gtan dang po yin te /
T02TD1199E:67a-19: bsam gtan gyi bde ba la brten nas /
T02TD1199E:67a-20: lhags mthong stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pas tshe 'di la yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:67a-21: sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang /
T02TD1199E:67a-23: brgya byin la sogs pa yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba rtog pa med pa la brten nas rang rang gi rnams par thang pa skyes ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:67a-24: de ltar mchod sbyin bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:67a-25: nang gi sbyin sreg bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:67a-26: nang gi khu ba la sogs dang //
T02TD1199E:67a-28: nang gi bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02TD1199E:67a-29: phung po lnga dang khams dang skye mched rnams so //
T02TD1199E:67a-30: phyi'i yul rnam pa drug dang bcas pa shes rab stong pa nyid mdo na sum du rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:67a-31: ye shes kyi me 'bar ba la bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg byas pas 'od gsal ba'i mer bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:67a-32: bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg bshad nas //
T02TD1199E:67a-33: nang dang gsang ba bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:67a-34: phung po khams dang skye mched sogs //
T02TD1199E:67a-35: lhag pa yi ni lha nyid de //
T02TD1199E:67a-36: zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02TD1199E:67a-37: lte ba dang lkog ma dang /
T02TD1199E:67a-38: spyi gtsug tu 'khor lo bzhi bzhag nas lag pa g-yas g-yon dgang gzar blugs gzar du bya ste /
T02TD1199E:67a-39: kha zas rnams bdud rtsir bskyed nas mchod pa de dag gis mchod na mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:67b-0: da ni chags pa'i lam pa'i gsang ba'i sbyin sreg bshad @67b pa ni /
T02TD1199E:67b-1: de rnams de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1199E:67b-2: sbyor ba'i mchod pa bshad pa ni //
