T02TD1199E:101a-23: snying ga'i phyi rol du yam las rlung /
T02TD1199E:101a-24: de'i dbus su ram las me /
T02TD1199E:101a-25: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du a'a li k'a li las nyi zla kha sbyor de'i dbus su yab yum dgu'i sa bon kha dog dmar por bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:101a-26: bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar yang dkyil 'khor de rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:101a-27: de nas rnal 'byor pas dbugs 'byung rngub kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD1199E:101a-28: phyir 'byung ba'i tshe ye shes kyi sa bon h'um gi tshul gyis byung nas /
T02TD1199E:101a-29: bsgrub bya'i snying ga'i dbus su bsnun par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:101a-30: phyi nas nang du 'jug pa'i tshe snying ga'i sa bon gyi yi ge la me tog lta bur bsnun par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:101a-31: de ltar dbugs 'byung rngub bzlas pas gzhan gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang mnyam par bsgom pa las mnyam par gzhag pa'i goms pa dang /
T02TD1199E:101a-32: gzhan gyi sems shes pas 'grub par 'gyur pa la the tshom med do //
T02TD1199E:101a-33: thabs gang gis de ltar 'gyur snyam na /
T02TD1199E:101a-34: sgrub pa po yi rnam 'phrul ba //
T02TD1199E:101a-36: phyi rol gzhan dag gi lus po la dbugs 'byung rngub kyi 'khor bsgoms na /
T02TD1199E:101b-0: gzhan gyi @101b rnam par shes pa dang bsres la til la sna ma'i me tog gis bsgos pa bzhin du gzhan gyi sems shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:101b-1: de ltar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa nang gi sbyor bas srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug la phyi'i sbyor bas mngon shes skyes pa de /
T02TD1199E:101b-2: gal te 'pho bar 'dod na spyi gtsug gi lam nas rdo rje 'pho ba bsgoms na bzang po'i lam 'di rnam par bsams na 'grub par the tshom med do //
T02TD1199E:101b-3: sems gzugs can ma yin na de'i ji ltar 'pho ba dang mi 'pho bar 'gyur snyam na /
T02TD1199E:101b-4: de nas ye shes gzugs gyur pa //
T02TD1199E:101b-5: mar me lta bu bsams nas su //
T02TD1199E:101b-7: nam mkha'i rlung la brten pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mar me lta bu bsams nas mkhas pas 'pho ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
T02TD1199E:101b-8: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang nyan thos la sogs pa'i sems la khyad par ci yod snyam na /
T02TD1199E:101b-9: nyan thos la sogs de nyid ni //
T02TD1199E:101b-10: 'dir ni legs par bshad pa yin //
T02TD1199E:101b-12: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i sems ni gang zag gi bdag med par rtogs nas rang gi don du rtog med bsgoms pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:101b-13: sems ni shel dang 'dra bar gnas //
T02TD1199E:101b-14: mar me lta bur bsam par bya //
T02TD1199E:101b-15: spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1199E:101b-16: spros pa spros pa med par bya //
T02TD1199E:101b-18: dang po nyan thos kyi sems ni rang rig pa mar me lta bu yin la /
T02TD1199E:101b-19: phyis ni spros pa rgyun bcad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:101b-20: rnal 'byor ba'i ji ltar yin snyam na /
T02TD1199E:101b-21: rnal 'byor rang bzhin med pa yis //
T02TD1199E:101b-22: 'di dag thams cad yongs su btang //
T02TD1199E:101b-24: zung du 'jug pa'i rgyas btab pas /
T02TD1199E:101b-25: yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:101b-26: de skad du yang kun spyod las //
T02TD1199E:101b-27: gong bu'i gzugs ni 'das gyur nas //
T02TD1199E:101b-28: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab bsam //
T02TD1199E:101b-29: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na //
T02TD1199E:101b-30: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02TD1199E:101b-33: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD1199E:101b-34: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te /
T02TD1199E:101b-35: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya /
T02TD1199E:101b-36: 'di ni gnyis med theg chen yin //
T02TD1199E:101b-38: de ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes bstan nas //
T02TD1199E:102a-1: khyad par gang lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102a-3: lha rnams kyi ye shes ni gsal bar goms pa las byung ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:102a-4: lha ma yin gyi ye shes ni 'khor ba goms pa las byung bas so //
T02TD1199E:102a-5: yi dags kyi ye shes ni 'jungs pa goms pa las so //
T02TD1199E:102a-6: dmyal ba'i ye shes ni 'jigs pa goms pa las so //
T02TD1199E:102a-7: byol song gi ye shes ni blun pa goms pa las so //
T02TD1199E:102a-8: bems po rnams ni sems dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:102a-9: de su la mi bstan snyam na /
T02TD1199E:102a-10: dgug cing gleng ba zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:102a-12: rnal 'byor gsang sngags khyad par gyi //
T02TD1199E:102a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te //
T02TD1199E:102a-14: de bas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la //
T02TD1199E:102a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:102a-16: rnal 'byor gyis bstan bcos 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings mngon sum mkhyen pa'i lam gzhan la bstan pa yin pas 'bad de dad pa bskyed nas sgyu ma mkhan gyi rnam par thar pa bzhin du ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam par thar pa 'di bsgoms na 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi spyod pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102a-17: mchog gi dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:102a-18: sngags kyi kun du spyod brgyad pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:102a-20: // / de ltar rdo rje dang dril bu dang phreng ba dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:102a-21: sngags kyi kun du spyod pa gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1199E:102a-22: sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid dag / nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyal po che //
T02TD1199E:102a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:102a-24: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:102a-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sngags rdo rje dril bu la thug gi bar du gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102a-26: spyan la sogs pa nas dri ma la thug gi bar du thabs dang shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i sngags gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:102a-27: aom h'um zhes pa nas he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i bar du he tu ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102a-28: aom aam sv'a h'a zhes bya ba nas bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gi sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102a-29: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-0: 'khor lo bde mchog gi @102b sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-1: phag mo can dang 'od zer can dang ri khrod ma gsum gyi sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-2: sgrol ma'i sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-3: sa byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags gnyis dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-5: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro'i sngags dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-6: mchod pa'i yan lag gi sngags dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-7: dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-9: bsrung ba'i sngags gsungs pa yin no brtag pa brgyad pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so sngags kyi spyod pa kun du bstan nas khams gsum lhar shes pa'i spyod pa ni de nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ phyag 'tshal nas zhes pa'i bar ni sdud pa po'i tshig go //
T02TD1199E:102b-10: gang zhig tu ni gnas nas su //
T02TD1199E:102b-11: zhes pa 'od gsal 'khor ba'i gnas gang du gnas nas rgyu ba bcud dang mi rgyu ba snod kyi 'jig rten du rnam par rol cing phyis 'od gsal ba dri ma dag nas zhi ba'i go 'phang rab tu rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das lha yis bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:102b-12: skabs dbye ba gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1199E:102b-13: sems 'od gsal pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs pa de /
T02TD1199E:102b-14: gang zhig dag pa'i gnas skabs ni //
T02TD1199E:102b-15: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1199E:102b-16: thams cad bdag nyid rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD1199E:102b-18: de ltar ngas bshad pa'i skabs ni sems kyi rtog pa gzung ba'i dri ma dang bcas pa yin no zhes 'od gsal ba'i gnas lugs ji lta ba bzhin bshad kyi nyon zhes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:102b-19: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:102b-20: dkyil 'khor lus zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:102b-22: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1199E:102b-23: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1199E:102b-25: dkyil 'khor lus kyi dbus na rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i ni gnas yin la /
T02TD1199E:102b-26: de ni mig me'i sgo dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-27: rna ba rlung gi sgo dang /
T02TD1199E:102b-29: lce chu'i sgo dang ldan pa'i lto ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas der bzhugs pa'i dpal bo ni dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin shes pa rtogs pa med pa dang /
T02TD1199E:103a-0: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal mun mkhyen ye shes zhes bya bar grags pa der bzhugs pa zhes pa rnal 'byor pas rtogs @103a * //
T02TD1199E:103a-1: shing khong du chud pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:103a-2: de ltar songs sku bstan nas chos sku bstan pa ni //
T02TD1199E:103a-3: rdul dang bral zhing rtog pa spangs //
T02TD1199E:103a-5: rdul dang bral ba ni kun du brtags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103a-6: rtog pa spangs pa ni gzhan dbang dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103a-7: lus las 'das pa ni yongs su grub pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103a-8: dri ma med pa ni 'od gsal bde chen po ni 'od gsal bde chen po //
T02TD1199E:103a-9: lus can kun las rnam par rol //
T02TD1199E:103a-11: sems 'od gsal bas sems can thams cad la khyab pa'o //
T02TD1199E:103a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che //
T02TD1199E:103a-13: zhes pa ni sbrul ba'i sku ston pa yin te /
T02TD1199E:103a-14: sems 'od gsal ba snang ba'i dbang du byas nas /
T02TD1199E:103a-15: zla ba bcu sa bcu dang /
T02TD1199E:103a-18: thal mo sbyor ba lha phyag gi tshul gyis rol pas thams cad rab tu 'jug pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:103a-19: 'od gsal gyi snang ba yin na ji ltar tha dad pa yin zhe na /
T02TD1199E:103a-20: glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis la lar byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1199E:103a-22: la lar skal ba thams cad kyi //
T02TD1199E:103a-23: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sprul pa'i sku thams cad du khyab par bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:103a-24: dngos grub grub pa'i dbang phyug gtso //
T02TD1199E:103a-25: zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba ni dngos grub yin la /
T02TD1199E:103a-26: de'i dbang phyug gtso bo ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02TD1199E:103a-27: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa ni nges brjod nas 'byung ba bzhin du 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' yas par snang ngo //
T02TD1199E:103a-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdag ces pa ni sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:103a-30: dngos med ni dga' bral lo //
T02TD1199E:103a-31: de gnyis ka yang glo bur gyi dri ma yin pa de bas ni rmongs pa de dor bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:103a-32: de ltar khams gsum pa'i 'od gsal ba'i lta'i rang bzhin yin par shes par byas nas //
T02TD1199E:103a-33: de ni las dang po pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i thabs gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1199E:103a-34: a'a li bum pa zhes bshad de //
T02TD1199E:103a-36: bha ga'i padma'i rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ni padma'i rtsa ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103a-37: aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sprad nas gsang ba'i rdo rje reg pa ni bud ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-0: dga' ba gsum nyams su myong ba ni bung bas sbrang @103b rtsi myangs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-1: bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin //
T02TD1199E:103b-2: zhes pa ni bde ba stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-3: a'a li nam mkha'i mthas kla sa pa //
T02TD1199E:103b-4: zhes pa ni bde ba stong pa nyid thams cad khyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rnag bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:103b-5: rgyu ba bcud dang mi rgyu ba snod kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid 'dzin pa'i lus ni bde ba stong pa nyid rtogs pa las 'gro ba ma lus pa de las 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:103b-7: lus gnas chen po lus skyes yin //
T02TD1199E:103b-9: phung po skye mched khams rnams dang //
T02TD1199E:103b-10: zhes pa ni pud [*phung?] po dang khams dang skye mched dang dbang po rnams su 'dzin ba'i rnam par shes pa bdud rtsi lta bu rnam par shes pa yul de dag kun las drangs nas /
T02TD1199E:103b-11: rtsa ba'i dbus su srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug pa ston pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:103b-12: bde bde gang gis bskyed snyam na //
T02TD1199E:103b-13: 'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis ni //
T02TD1199E:103b-16: sbyor ba'i rdzas ni dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1199E:103b-18: 'khor lo bzhi la byang chub sems 'bebs pa'i me dang rlung gi bdun don la //
T02TD1199E:103b-20: rdo rje ma yis bon sbyar ni a'u ring po dang sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-21: thig le sgra yis yang dag man na ni steng du zla tshes dang thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-22: char gyi rgyun zhes brjod pa yin //
T02TD1199E:103b-23: zhes pa ni spyi gtsug nas lte ba'i bar du byang chub kyi sems 'bab ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-24: dbyang yig dang po'i sa bon ni //
T02TD1199E:103b-25: de'i dbus su gzung bar bya ni sgo dgu bkag la srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug nas byang chub sems lte ba'i gnas su gzung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-26: k'a li me tog tshul du ni //
T02TD1199E:103b-28: lte ba'i khrag gi thig le'o //
T02TD1199E:103b-29: rdo rje can gyi lus me tog ni //
T02TD1199E:103b-30: byung chub sems 'dres pa las rdul gyi brnyan la zangs kyi zo la song ba bzhin no //
T02TD1199E:103b-31: 'khor ba bskyed pa ma zhing ni bde ba stong par bsgoms pas so //
T02TD1199E:103b-32: thams cad kyi ni sa gzhi yin no dngos grub gsum gyi rgyu yin no //
T02TD1199E:103b-33: rtog pa'i rgya mtsho las rtog pa med pa ji ltar yin snyam na /
T02TD1199E:103b-34: ye shes chu ba'i rgyu mtsho 'dir //
T02TD1199E:103b-36: 'od gsal ba'i rgya mtsho las stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab ni 'khor ba'i chu srin dang nyal sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i 'dam gyi dbus nas gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin //
T02TD1199E:104a-0: dga' ba bzhin thabs kyi sa bon las bde ba @104a * //
T02TD1199E:104a-1: stong pa nyid kyi myu gu skye ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:104a-2: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i man ngag bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:104a-3: bung bas sbrang rtsi len pa'i man ngag bstan pa ni //
T02TD1199E:104a-4: ban nga ka'i me tog rgyas pa lta bu ni phyag rgya bzhi yin la /
T02TD1199E:104a-5: sbrang rtsi ni bde ba rtog pa med pa yin la /
T02TD1199E:104a-6: bdung rtsi ni bde ba stong pa nyid de /
T02TD1199E:104a-7: dug gi phyag rgya bzhi yin no //
T02TD1199E:104a-8: k'a li nyid kyad [*kyang?] bdud rtsi ste khrag ni thig le las kyang stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab na ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'gyur la /
T02TD1199E:104a-9: bde ba rtog pa med pa med tog dang bde ba stong ba nyid kyi tshul 'dzin pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:104a-10: gnyis las skyes pa'i lus yin te //
T02TD1199E:104a-11: zhes pa ni khrag dang gu ba las skyes pa'i lus so //
T02TD1199E:104a-12: bdud rtsi chu bo go cha mchog ni chags lam gyi dbang du byas nas 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa'i dbus na aa wa dh'u t'i nam mkha'i rtsa la reg ba ni chu las skyes pas ni chu yin la /
T02TD1199E:104a-13: de yang mi zad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni bdud rtsi yin no //
T02TD1199E:104a-14: de yang dang por lus kyi mngon sum gyi reg bya lnga nyams su myong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1199E:104a-15: du ba lta bur snang ba g-yon no //
T02TD1199E:104a-16: sher ba chu ni chu yin la /
T02TD1199E:104a-17: reg bya mkhrang ba ni sa yin no //
T02TD1199E:104a-18: ye shes rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sprad pas rtog med kyi ye shes stong pa nyid kyi rtsa byin gyis brlabs pa ni gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1199E:104a-19: des na rnam pa lngar ni skyes zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:104a-20: ma lus chu yi dbus gnas shing //
T02TD1199E:104a-21: zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sprad de //
T02TD1199E:104a-22: byang chub sems kyi de ba la brten te 'byung ba lnga'i reg bya dang /
T02TD1199E:104a-23: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i dang reg pas bde ba rtog pa med lus kyi mngon sum gyis shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:104a-24: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:104a-25: sgyur ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02TD1199E:104a-26: bud med sgyur ma khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1199E:104a-27: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni gsal bar 'di las rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:104a-29: yul dmigs pa'i rkyen aa wa dh'u t'i'i reg bya dang /
T02TD1199E:104a-30: dbang po bdag po'i rkyen khu bag kar po dang /
T02TD1199E:104a-31: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen slob dpon gyi man ngag dang rtog ba med pa'i bag chags kyis bon las bde ba stong pa nyid du 'dren nus pa'i mtshan ma skye ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:104a-32: de yang mkhas pa chen bo'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD1199E:104a-33: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T02TD1199E:104a-34: nang gi bdag nyid g-ye med las //
T02TD1199E:104a-35: gnas pas lus kyi reg bya ni //
T02TD1199E:104b-0: myong @104b ba'i blo de tshad skyes yin //
T02TD1199E:104b-2: de yang ji ltar thams cad las sems bsdus nas bde ba rtog pa med pa skye ba'i don ni //
T02TD1199E:104b-3: h'um gi rdo rje'i glu'i tshul gyis gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:104b-4: rdo rje'i yan lag dgyes pa'i thugs //
T02TD1199E:104b-6: spyan gyi gzugs ma zhes pa ni //
T02TD1199E:104b-7: bltas pa dang dgod ba dang thos pa dang ga pu ra dang /
T02TD1199E:104b-8: tsandan gyi dri bsnams pa dang /
T02TD1199E:104b-9: lce dang chu gzhib pa dang lag pa bcangs pa la sogs pa lus kyi reg pa'o //
T02TD1199E:104b-10: yi ge dngos po'i rang bzhin ni dga' bral du ma spong ba'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD1199E:104b-11: stong par rol pa nyid kyis ni stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pas so //
T02TD1199E:104b-12: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs ni //
T02TD1199E:104b-13: bde ba stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1199E:104b-14: snying po yang ni btsal ba nyid //
T02TD1199E:104b-15: ces pa ni sems 'od gsal stong par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1199E:104b-16: ma lus pa yi bsam pa dang //
T02TD1199E:104b-17: yi ge thams cad gzhom par bya //
T02TD1199E:104b-18: zhes pa ni shes bya dang brjod bya spangs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:104b-20: chu rnams kyis ni dgyes pa can //
T02TD1199E:104b-22: byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa las byung ba'o //
T02TD1199E:104b-23: gnyis med chos ni thob pa na //
T02TD1199E:104b-24: de ni thar pa thob pa nyid //
T02TD1199E:104b-26: 'khor ba bde ba rmongs pa ni //
T02TD1199E:104b-27: rnam par grol ba gsal ma yin //
T02TD1199E:104b-28: zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa'i gang zag la'o //
T02TD1199E:104b-29: thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD1199E:104b-30: rnal 'byor pa yi sngags kyis rol //
T02TD1199E:104b-31: zhes pa mkhas pas shes na rnam par grol ba'o //
T02TD1199E:104b-33: rnal 'byor pas ni lnga bo rnams //
T02TD1199E:104b-34: sangs rgyas de nyid mtshon par bya //
T02TD1199E:104b-36: bde ba stong pa nyid rtogs pas sangs rgyas mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02TD1199E:104b-37: sgyu ma'i gnas pa du ma kun //
T02TD1199E:104b-38: sna tshogs pa gzugs kyis sems can smin //
T02TD1199E:104b-40: dge slong rgyas mtsho'i sprin bzhin du gzugs la dga' ba bzhi skye ba dang /
T02TD1199E:104b-41: dri za'i rgyal po rab bzangs bzhin sgra la dga' ba bzhi skye ba dang /
T02TD1199E:104b-42: khyim bdag spos 'tshong bzhin dril dga' ba bzhi skye ba dang dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba bzhin dril dga' ba bzhi skye ba dang /
T02TD1199E:104b-43: bcom ba mo lha'o bshes gnyen bzhin du reg bya ba dga' ba bzhin du reg bya la dga' ba bzhi skye ba des na /
T02TD1199E:104b-44: rdo rje brkyang ba'i dgos ba ni //
T02TD1199E:105a-4: rnal 'byor pa yi thar pa can //
T02TD1199E:105a-5: chos kyi snying por phyag 'tshol cig / ces pa ni //
T02TD1199E:105a-6: reg bya rdo rje ma la stong pa nyid gsang brtol nas /
T02TD1199E:105a-7: bde ba rtog pa med pa'i shes pa rnal 'byor ma'i thar pa'i lam yin no //
T02TD1199E:105a-8: rigs kyi bu gang zhig bya ba la sogs pa ni phan yon te go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:105a-9: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:105a-11: // / khams gsum pa ltar ngo shes pa'i kun du spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:105a-12: gtor ma'i kun du spyod pa bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:105a-13: gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga ni //
T02TD1199E:105a-14: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'od //
T02TD1199E:105a-16: rgyas par bshad pa la tshig rkang gsum gyis bstan //
T02TD1199E:105a-17: gnyis pa nya sha zhes pa la sogs pa gtor ma'i rdzas bstan gsum pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang zhes pa la sogs pas ni bdag nyid ltar bskyed pa bstan to //
T02TD1199E:105a-19: rdzas kun bdud rtsi lngar sbyangs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02TD1199E:105a-20: lnga pa snod ni padma zhes pa ste thod pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:105a-22: aom gyis 'bar bar bya ba ste //
T02TD1199E:105a-23: h'um gi lce de nyid kyis //
T02TD1199E:105a-25: aom gyis 'bar bar byed pa dang /
T02TD1199E:105a-28: h'um gi 'od zer gyi sbu gus ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs nas spel bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:105a-30: ha zhes bya bas kha dog 'phrog / ho: zhes bya bas dri 'joms te /
T02TD1199E:105a-31: h'i: zhes bya bas nus pa 'joms //
T02TD1199E:105a-32: go rims de ltar mngon par brjod //
T02TD1199E:105a-34: bdun pa mgron spyan drang ba ni /
T02TD1199E:105a-35: ye shes 'od zer lcags kyu yi //
T02TD1199E:105a-36: yid kyis thams cad 'gugs par byed //
T02TD1199E:105a-38: lcags kyu de'i bye brag du zhig mchis snyam nas zhus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:105a-39: lan du skye dgu bdag po ste //
T02TD1199E:105a-41: mi skyod pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02TD1199E:105a-42: gnyis pa de bzhin sgrol ma yin //
T02TD1199E:105a-45: gsum pa rab tu mang po ste //
T02TD1199E:105a-46: zhes pa ni don yod grub pa'i lcags kyu'o //
T02TD1199E:105a-47: bzhi pa mang po las skyes zhes pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i padma'i lcags kyu'o //
T02TD1199E:105a-48: lnga pa byis pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi lcags kyu'o //
T02TD1199E:105a-49: de skad du yang gdan bzhi las /
T02TD1199E:105b-0: @105b rdo rje lcags kyu mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1199E:105b-1: gnyis pa lcags kyu rin chen dbang //
T02TD1199E:105b-2: rgyal po'i lcags kyu don yod grub //
T02TD1199E:105b-3: g-yo ba'i lcags kyu 'od dpag med //
T02TD1199E:105b-4: lcags kyu stobs ldan rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1199E:105b-6: ye shes lnga yi bye brag gis //
T02TD1199E:105b-7: de dag ye shes lnga yi sngags //
T02TD1199E:105b-8: zhes pa ni rigs snga'i sngags dang sbyar nas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:105b-9: kha cig ni sha lnga yin no zhes zer ro //
T02TD1199E:105b-11: lcags kyu lnga yi bye brag gis //
T02TD1199E:105b-12: las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1199E:105b-13: zhes pa ni zhib dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las la sbyar par byo //
T02TD1199E:105b-14: gal te rtag tu las 'dod na //
T02TD1199E:105b-16: dus thams cad du phrin las bzhi bsgrub par 'dod na /
T02TD1199E:105b-17: rnal 'byor pa kun gtor mas tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:105b-18: brgyad par rnam par dbye ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:105b-19: 'dod la dga' bar mi bya zhing //
T02TD1199E:105b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:105b-21: dgu pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig bcu drug dang k'a le sum cu rtsa bzhi 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rab tu sbyor bas lha rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:105b-22: yi ge aom gyi 'od zer 'bar ba dang a'a: sa 'phro ba dang /
T02TD1199E:105b-23: h'um gis spel nas khyad par rtogs pas shel sgong dang mtshungs par gyur pa aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis kha zas thams cad brtags nas /
T02TD1199E:105b-24: lce'i dbus su 'od zer gyi sbu gu bsams nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:105b-25: lhag ma dang bcas pa'i gtor ma ni phyi rol dur khrod brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:105b-26: bcu pa phyag rgya ni g-yon pa thod pa 'dzin pa lta bu dang /
T02TD1199E:105b-27: g-yas pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub dang /
T02TD1199E:105b-28: rkang dang mig dang lag gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1199E:105b-29: bcu gcig pa dus ni mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi la zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:105b-30: bcu gnyis pa gnas bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:105b-31: shing gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:105b-32: gnas kyi thog mar yi ge aom smos pa ni dril bu dgrol nas bsngo ba'i tshigs su bcas par gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:105b-34: kun du bzang mo dang spyan dang /
T02TD1199E:105b-37: sgrol ma la sogs pa'i 'khor nag mo la sogs pa'i gtso mo re re la /
T02TD1199E:106a-0: brgyad brgyad kyis bskor bas lha mo bzhi bcu @106a * //
T02TD1199E:106a-2: gtso mo lnga gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106a-3: bdag nyid chen mo mkha' 'gro lda //
T02TD1199E:106a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal mo lnga po de dag gang yin snyam na /
T02TD1199E:106a-6: rdo rje dang phyug gtso mo ni kun du bzang mo'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni spyan no //
T02TD1199E:106a-8: rngul med ni m'a na k'i'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-9: 'byin pa mo ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-10: rdo rje dbang mo ni sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-11: 'dir spyon cig ces pa dang sngags kyis dgug par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-12: bcu gsum pa bsngo ba ni //
T02TD1199E:106a-13: bdud rtsi bsam gtan dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1199E:106a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-15: lha gsum gyi rang bzhin du bya //
T02TD1199E:106a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ha las padma'i dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1199E:106a-17: ho: las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1199E:106a-18: hri'a: las phyag na rdo rje yin no //
T02TD1199E:106a-19: so sor bza' bas lhan cig tu bza' snyam na /
T02TD1199E:106a-20: ltos shig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:106a-21: bram ze dang khyi la sogs pa'i dpes lhan cig tu bza' bar bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:106a-22: 'di'i sa zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung bas so //
T02TD1199E:106a-23: phyag rgya ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i lag pa gnyis padma'i gar bskor ba'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-24: ting nge 'dzin ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02TD1199E:106a-25: dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje gsor nas //
T02TD1199E:106a-26: aom bde gshegs chos ni sdig med cing //
T02TD1199E:106a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsngos la /
T02TD1199E:106a-28: h'um gsum dang dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra bcas pas /
T02TD1199E:106a-29: de lta nyid du gnas par shog / ces pa'i smon lam yang gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-30: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snyid gar bzhag la g-yas pas la brkyang ste /
T02TD1199E:106a-31: sngags dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1199E:106a-32: de nas rang gi dbugs kyis ni //
T02TD1199E:106a-33: rang gi lus la thib par bya //
T02TD1199E:106a-34: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig sems dpa' lus la bsdu ba bstan to //
T02TD1199E:106a-35: skad cig tsam gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1199E:106a-36: bdag nyid bsgoms te mchod par bya //
T02TD1199E:106a-37: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsgoms nas 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:106a-38: gter ma phul nas 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02TD1199E:106a-39: se gol gsum brda ba par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:106a-40: phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1199E:106b-0: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis @106b pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:106b-2: // / gtor ma'i kun du spyod pa bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:106b-3: bris sku dang glegs bam bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-4: gsang ba'i padma bde ba can //
T02TD1199E:106b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:106b-6: de ni lha mo gsol ba btab //
T02TD1199E:106b-7: ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad gcig ni btsun mo yum gyi bha ga la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes bya ba sdud pa po'i tshig yin no //
T02TD1199E:106b-8: lha mos zhus pa dngos ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa nas bshad du gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1199E:106b-9: lan du bka' stsal pa thog mar ri mo mkhan gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-10: gzhon zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-11: bris sku'i gzhi bshad pa ni sgrub pa po dam pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-12: bri ba'i thabs bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-13: shin tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-14: tshon gyi rdzas bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-15: ji ltar gsungs sa pa'i chon lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-16: pir bshad pa ni mi rus ro'i skra 'am /
T02TD1199E:106b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:106b-18: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-19: dang por slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-20: slob dpon gyi sbyor ba bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-21: pho nya'i gtsang sbra dang po yin //
T02TD1199E:106b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-23: slob dpon byis gtsang sbra de la mi smad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-24: rang sems dri ma dag 'gyur na //
T02TD1199E:106b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:106b-26: tshon rtsi'i snod dang tshon rtsi'i 'khor lo bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-27: dung dang nya phyis mu tig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-28: shes rab kyi yan lag bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-29: dag byed skud pa bde ba'i mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
T02TD1199E:106b-30: bri mkhan yang shes rab yan lag ldan pas bya 'am zhe na /
T02TD1199E:106b-31: gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-32: gzhan la mi bstan pa'i dam tshig bshad pa ni //
T02TD1199E:106b-33: sgrub pa ri mo tsam byas pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-34: bris sku'i mtshan nyid bshad pa dang /
T02TD1199E:106b-35: glegs bam gyi mtshan nyid bshad ni //
T02TD1199E:106b-36: nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo //
T02TD1199E:106b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs te go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:106b-38: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:106b-40: // / bris sku dang glegs bam gyi kun du spyod pa bshad nas ni /
T02TD1199E:106b-41: kun sbyor rol pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1199E:107a-0: nyon cig lha mo bshad par @107a * //
T02TD1199E:107a-2: / zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-4: dngos grub len pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mthu ni gnas gtsang ma'i skad du gling bu 'bung pa ni /
T02TD1199E:107a-5: h'um dza h'um gi bar gyis so //
T02TD1199E:107a-6: pi wang brdung ba ni h'um hrm h'um gsum gyi bar du'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-8: pham nam ga bar gyis so //
T02TD1199E:107a-9: rdza rda brdud pa ni h'um bhyo'i bar gyis so //
T02TD1199E:107a-10: rta mgrin gyi cang te'u brdung pa ni ta kki h'um dza: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-11: gshin rje gshed kyi cad te'u brdud [*brdung?] ba ni hri'a: shitra: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-12: sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi cang te'u brngud [*brdung?] pa ni hi'a hri'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-13: de nas rnge'u chung gi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1199E:107a-14: rgyu ni ma la yar skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-15: tshad ni sor bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-16: dngos po ni thod pa'i rus pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-17: bags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni /
T02TD1199E:107a-18: de nas rkang pa'i lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1199E:107a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-21: bdag dang skal ldan 'khor ba las //
T02TD1199E:107a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-23: brdung ba'i gnas ni tshogs kyi mchod pa mdzes pa ste zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:107a-24: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i spyod la ma thams cad la zag pa med pa'i brdar bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:107a-25: chang ni sge mo yin par bshad //
T02TD1199E:107a-26: ces bya ba la sogs pa tha mal ba'i ngag dang brda spangs nas /
T02TD1199E:107a-27: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda bya'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-28: gar rnams kyi ni khyad par dang //
T02TD1199E:107a-30: zag pa med pa'i lha'i gar bya'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-31: glu yi phyag rgya 'di dag dbul //
T02TD1199E:107a-33: ka ka la sogs pa zag pa med pa'i glu'o //
T02TD1199E:107a-34: gang du lag pa chang bar gtad //
T02TD1199E:107a-36: mda' la sogs pa'i chog bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:107a-38: dbyi bas dang bde blag sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1199E:107a-39: kun du sbyor dang 'dren dang myur //
T02TD1199E:107a-41: rkang pa gzhibs bas sa gnon cing //
T02TD1199E:107a-42: rkang pa 'gyed pas sa gnon no //
T02TD1199E:107a-43: dkyil 'khor dag kyang gnas par bya //
T02TD1199E:107a-44: brkyang bskum gyis kyang sa gsum mnan //
T02TD1199E:107a-45: zhes dbyibs kyi khyad par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:107a-46: tshogs 'khor gyi yan lag dpa' bo'i srid mo bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:107a-47: ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang //
T02TD1199E:107b-0: @107b zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:107b-5: khro gnyer ma dang padmar gnas //
T02TD1199E:107b-7: sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad //
T02TD1199E:107b-9: tshogs 'khor gyi mchod pa'i rim pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:107b-10: mi chen thod pa du ma gcig pa //
T02TD1199E:107b-11: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:107b-12: thog mar padma'i gar bskor nas //
T02TD1199E:107b-13: bla ma yang dbul bar bya //
T02TD1199E:107b-14: de nas rang gis myong ba dang /
T02TD1199E:107b-15: rdo rje spun rnams sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:107b-16: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02TD1199E:107b-17: ae ma bde ba rmongs byed pa //
T02TD1199E:107b-18: snang ba zhes bya bza' ba'i rgya //
T02TD1199E:107b-19: shi shi h'um ni tshe 'phel zhing //
T02TD1199E:107b-20: kha kha kh'a hi zo shig ces gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:107b-21: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1199E:107b-23: // / dngos grub gsum gyi yan lag tu kun du spyod pa'i rtog pa brgyad bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:107b-24: rten gyi gang zag rgyu'i rgyud bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:107b-25: rdo rje slob dpon grub pa yi //
T02TD1199E:107b-26: dam tshig phyag na rdo rje nyon //
T02TD1199E:107b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:107b-28: dang por slob dpon gyis rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /
T02TD1199E:107b-29: dbang bskur ba thob par byas nas rdo rje slob dpon dam tshig mnyams pa dang /
T02TD1199E:107b-30: mnyam por dam tshig dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:107b-31: mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:107b-32: 'bad pas thos bsam mthar phyin pa //
T02TD1199E:107b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:107b-34: dang por rnal 'byor pa thos pa dang ldan pa dang bzlas pa 'bum byas pa dang bsnyen pa'i tsho lha la gnang ba thob pa dang /
T02TD1199E:107b-35: phrin las nus pas sems can rnams las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:107b-36: de nyid gnas shing go cha bgos //
T02TD1199E:107b-37: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02TD1199E:107b-38: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas pa dang /
T02TD1199E:107b-39: bsnyen bsgrub kyi rnam par sbyangs nas go cha bgos pa dang /
T02TD1199E:107b-40: thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa la spro ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs lnga dang rjes su mthun pa de dang de bzung nas dga' ba bzhi bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:107b-41: de la dang po sangs rgyas spyan gyi rigs gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1199E:107b-42: gti mug bdag nyid ma dang ni //
T02TD1199E:107b-44: gnyis pa kun du bzang mo ni //
T02TD1199E:107b-45: zhe sdang bdag nyid bu mo dang //
T02TD1199E:108a-2: chags pa'i bdag nyid sring mo dang //
T02TD1199E:108a-4: bzhi pa sgrol ma'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD1199E:108a-5: phrag dog bdag nyid tsha mo dang //
T02TD1199E:108a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:108a-7: lnga pa rin po che'i m'a ma k'i'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:108a-8: nga rgyal bdag nyid mna' ma dang //
T02TD1199E:108a-10: thabs gang gis phyag rgya gang dang lhan cig bsgrub ce na /
T02TD1199E:108a-11: spyan dang lhan cig ces pa la sogs gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:108a-12: khro bo brgyad dang sems dpa' bcu drug la sogs pa yang phyag rgya de nyid dang snyoms par 'jug gam snyam na /
T02TD1199E:108a-14: khro bo lha dang rgyal sras sogs //
T02TD1199E:108a-17: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02TD1199E:108a-18: sangs rgyas lnga dang sbyor bab yis //
T02TD1199E:108a-19: lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis //
T02TD1199E:108a-20: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang mo //
T02TD1199E:108a-21: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi thams cad bsgrub //
T02TD1199E:108a-23: da ni phrin las bzhi la spyod lam ji lta bu bya snyam na /
T02TD1199E:108a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:108a-26: rjes la ro snyoms spyod pa bya //
T02TD1199E:108a-27: dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni //
T02TD1199E:108a-29: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyas btab pas so //
T02TD1199E:108a-30: brtser ldan rdo rje can gyis bsngags ni mngon sum gyi lam 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing bstod pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:108a-31: bde ba'i lam gyi man ngag gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1199E:108a-32: dka' spyod brtul zhugs spangs pa yis //
T02TD1199E:108a-33: shin tu bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1199E:108a-34: sdug bsngal 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro //
T02TD1199E:108a-35: rnyed kyang gang zhig mi brtson pa //
T02TD1199E:108a-37: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i dka' thub spangs nas dga' ba bzhi'i de nyid rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD1199E:108a-38: shin tu bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rang bzhin brgyad cu spangs pas na /
T02TD1199E:108a-39: ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa med la zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i ro rnyed nas /
T02TD1199E:108a-40: gang zhig pho nya'i lam de la mi btsun na de dag gi dka' thub spyod pa rmongs pas bdag gi don yang mi nus na /
T02TD1199E:108a-41: gzhan don sangs rgyas rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya'o //
T02TD1199E:108a-42: de ni slar yang gar 'gro ba //
T02TD1199E:108a-43: de yis shes par ma 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:108b-0: mkha' @108b 'gro ma rnams kyis dus ma yin par bsad nas ngan sor du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:108b-1: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02TD1199E:108b-2: bdag kyang ngo bo bde spangs te //
T02TD1199E:108b-3: dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya //
T02TD1199E:108b-4: ci bde bar ni bde bar spyod //
T02TD1199E:108b-7: rdo rje theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1199E:108b-8: de dag gis ni snying rings na //
T02TD1199E:108b-9: snying la khrag chen 'thungs ba zhig / ma 'ongs par ni sdug bsngal 'gyur //
T02TD1199E:108b-11: des na bde bas dngos grub thob //
T02TD1199E:108b-12: ces pa ni mjug bsdu ba yin te /
T02TD1199E:108b-13: tshogs med pas rnyed pa mngon sum gyi lam dang thams cad rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur bdag byin gyis rlob pa'i lam gyis rnal 'byor pa thams cad sangs rgyas lta bur bltas nas ji srid 'khor ba lta bu'i 'jigs pa las ma rgal gyi bar du bstan pa'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi bka' zag pa med pa'i chos mngon sum gyis spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:108b-14: brtag pa bcu pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:108b-16: // / de ltar gyu'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:108b-17: 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:108b-18: de nas gang gi rig pa yi //
T02TD1199E:108b-19: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:108b-20: mtshan lam thob pa'i rjes thogs nyid la mi g-yo ba'i lam bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang ldan pa'i rig pa'i skyes bur gyur pa de'i che 'og nas 'byung ba'i phan yon 'di dag dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:108b-22: brtag pa bcu pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:108b-24: // / de ltar 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bstan nas /
T02TD1199E:108b-25: mchog gi dngos grub bstan pa ni /
T02TD1199E:108b-26: rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa ste //
T02TD1199E:108b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:108b-28: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin mthar thug pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu grub nas phyis gang du 'gro zhing gang du gnas zhes bcom ldan 'das la zhus yin no //
T02TD1199E:108b-29: lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02TD1199E:108b-30: rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa ste phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa las 'gro ba drug gang du yang mi 'gro zhing khams gsum du yang mi gnas la /
T02TD1199E:108b-31: dus gsum rnam par spangs nas sgyu ma lta bu dang stong pa gnyis su med pa 'od gsal ba'i srid pa gsum du snang ba dang /
T02TD1199E:109a-2: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin no //
T02TD1199E:109a-3: grub pa'i mtha' la gnas pa thams cad kyis don du gnyer bar bya ba yin zhing sems can kun gyi sems la 'od gsal ba gnas pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:109a-4: 'od gsal de nyid ni sdigs pa kun las grol zhing rjes kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa kun gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:109a-5: kun la phan zhing bde ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa mnga'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-6: rtag 'char mgon skyob rnam rtog spangs //
T02TD1199E:109a-7: zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-8: dbyibs dang kha dog las 'das pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-9: rgyal po rgyal ba'i spyod yul yin ni longs sku'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-10: gzhig par dka' bas rdo rje ste zhes pa ni sprul sku'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-11: nyon mongs gdungs sel zla ba ni phrin las so //
T02TD1199E:109a-12: 'jigs pa med pas seng ge ste //
T02TD1199E:109a-14: 'jug par dka' bas rgya mtsho yin //
T02TD1199E:109a-15: zhes pa ni mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-16: de la sogs par sna tshogs //
T02TD1199E:109a-18: zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum du bskor ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-19: rtog pa kun las grol nas kyang //
T02TD1199E:109a-20: de nyid gcig pu 'gro don mdzad ni snyigs ma lnga'i dus su yang sku ldas byon nas 'gro ba'i don phrin las mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-21: nyams dga' lha las babs pa dang //
T02TD1199E:109a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ni mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i sgo nas mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:109a-23: brtag pa bcu pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1199E:109a-25: // / de ltar 'jig rten dang mchog gi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu bshad nas /
T02TD1199E:109a-26: gsang sngags thun mong ma yin pa'i lam gyi rnam dag thabs kyi 'bras bu bshad pa ni /
T02TD1199E:109a-27: bshad gcig sha sogs sbyin sreg ni //
T02TD1199E:109a-28: zhes pa la sogs pa smos pa ste /
T02TD1199E:109a-29: bshang gci la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyin sreg gi ye shes sems dpa'i zhes mi gtsang bas bkang bar gyur na ji ltar sdig par mi 'gyur /
T02TD1199E:109a-31: ji ltar sngos grub kyi 'bras bur 'gyur zhes pa dang /
T02TD1199E:109a-32: lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02TD1199E:109a-33: mi shes rmongs pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1199E:109a-34: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:109b-0: bdag gis 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i sems can gyi ngor @109b bsod nams kyi las dge ba dang /
T02TD1199E:109b-1: bsod nams ma yin pa'i las sdig pa dang bcas pa yin gyi /
T02TD1199E:109b-2: shes pa rtog pa med pas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa de'i cho /
T02TD1199E:109b-3: dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa nus pa dang /
T02TD1199E:109b-4: dbang shes rab ye shes dang /
T02TD1199E:109b-5: bzhi pa stong pa nyid kyi gseng brtol nas /
T02TD1199E:109b-6: bde ba chen pos rgyas btab pas /
T02TD1199E:109b-7: zag pa med pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i cho /
T02TD1199E:109b-8: dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa med la /
T02TD1199E:109b-9: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba yang med pas /
T02TD1199E:109b-10: sems can gyi don gyi gdul bya'i phyir zhi ba dang /
T02TD1199E:109b-13: mngon spyod bshad pa yin no /
T02TD1199E:109b-14: ji srid ye shes rnam spangs te ni /
T02TD1199E:109b-15: rnam shes dang ye shes ma skyes pa'o //
T02TD1199E:109b-16: phyi rol gyi dngos po la gnas shing rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa'i cho /
T02TD1199E:109b-17: bsod nams dang sdig pa'i phung po la sogs pa gnyis su brtags pa yin gyi /
T02TD1199E:109b-18: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yin yang /
T02TD1199E:109b-19: mi shes pas bsgribs pa'i skye bo'i dor sdig pa dang bsod nams rgyal bas gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:109b-20: dngos po la med na ci'i phyir gsungs she na /
T02TD1199E:109b-21: drang ba'i thabs su mdzad pas na //
T02TD1199E:109b-23: sdig pa dang bsod nams gnyis ka yang /
T02TD1199E:109b-24: tshu rgal bar 'dod skye bo'i gzings dang 'dra ba yin pas //
T02TD1199E:109b-25: shes bya'i gnas lugs stong pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin nas rab tu spong ba yin no //
T02TD1199E:109b-27: de bas rtog pa'i tshogs btang ste //
T02TD1199E:109b-28: zab mo'i chos la brtan par bya //
T02TD1199E:109b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1199E:109b-30: rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste //
T02TD1199E:109b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02TD1199E:109b-32: shes bya'i gnas lugs stong pa yin yang thabs gang gis rtogs par bya zhen /
T02TD1199E:109b-33: dbang po gnyis ni snyoms zhugs las //
T02TD1199E:109b-34: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:109b-35: phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam par sbyar bas //
T02TD1199E:109b-38: thugs lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes skyes nas rang bzhin brgyad cu spangs te /
T02TD1199E:109b-39: bde ba chen po 'od gsal bas rgyas btab pas /
T02TD1199E:109b-40: cho 'di la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal rnam par rtog pa spongs te /
T02TD1199E:109b-41: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rgyal ba'i skur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:110a-2: bskal pa bye bgrangs med par //
T02TD1199E:110a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa //
T02TD1199E:110a-4: phyag rgya'i chog gang dag gis //
T02TD1199E:110a-8: shes rab ye shes kyi dang ma thob cing ma rig pas 'khrul pa'i bag chags kyi sprul pa'i 'gro ba rigs drug sna tshogs las skyes pa yin yang //
T02TD1199E:110a-9: gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes thob nas /
T02TD1199E:110a-10: stong pa nyid kyi gseng brtol ba'i rnal 'byor pa skyes pa dang bud med thams cad 'od gsal bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:110a-11: de bzhin du dbang bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnam par rtog pa'i dra bas bcings pa yin yang 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:110a-12: 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi sems snyan pa dang /
T02TD1199E:110a-13: mi snyan pa'i sgra yang 'od gsal ba'i dang du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1199E:110a-14: de yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02TD1199E:110a-15: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02TD1199E:110a-16: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1199E:110a-18: dbang bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sha ni rnam snang dang /
T02TD1199E:110a-21: mkhris pa snang ba mtha' yas //
T02TD1199E:110a-22: gsang ba'i rdo rje'i sgo don yod grug pa yin no zhes dbang bzhi pa'i dam tshig shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba 'di ngas bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:110a-23: blo dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i de kho na nyid shes nas /
T02TD1199E:110a-24: bde ba chen pos rgyas btab cing mngon sum gyis lam bsgoms na /
T02TD1199E:110a-25: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang bde ba chen po ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1199E:110a-26: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa dang ma dang sring mo la sogs pa bsten pa yin yang rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i 'od gsal bsgom pa yin pas /
T02TD1199E:110a-27: thams cad las bde ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD1199E:110a-28: / byin rlabs dang mngon dum gyi lam dang bral ba rjes dpag goms pa'i lam du zhugs pa rnams ni /
T02TD1199E:110a-29: sog po par ci ma bag ma len len zin du dgos pa dman pa yin pas /
T02TD1199E:110a-30: ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang /
T02TD1199E:110b-0: lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur @110b ba yin //
T02TD1199E:110b-2: de ltar thabs kyi rgyud lnga dang shes rab kyi rgyud bzhi'i don ston pa'i kha sbyor las byung ba'i rtog pa bcu /
T02TD1199E:110b-3: rab tu byed pa bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid gsungs nas /
T02TD1199E:110b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo thams cad 'bras bu he ru ka la rjes su yi rang zhing bstod pa ni /
T02TD1199E:110b-5: de nas rnal 'byor zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1199E:110b-6: rnal 'byor ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu'o //
T02TD1199E:110b-7: rnal 'byor ma ni khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02TD1199E:110b-8: mkha' 'gro ni thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo'o //
T02TD1199E:110b-9: mkha' 'gro ma ni rab gtum mo la sogs pa nyer bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:110b-10: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni phyag na rdo rje dang byams pa la sogs pa'i tshogs du ma ni /
T02TD1199E:110b-11: rnam par gzigs dang rnam snang la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1199E:110b-12: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ni drag po dang 'jigs byed nyi shu bzhi'o //
T02TD1199E:110b-13: de dag thams cad rab mgu ste //
T02TD1199E:110b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD1199E:110b-17: thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes thob nas ni /
T02TD1199E:110b-18: dbang byas pa dang longs spyod pa dang thim par mdzad pas /
T02TD1199E:110b-19: bsam gtan dang ye shes zag pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'o //
T02TD1199E:110b-20: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni /
T02TD1199E:110b-21: yi ge'i don nyan pa theg pa thun mong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1199E:110b-24: gnod sbyin dang dri za la sogs pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sku bsgom pa'i khro bo thams cad kyis /
T02TD1199E:110b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes pa ni lus kyi sgo nas bskor ba dang /
T02TD1199E:110b-26: phyag 'tshal ba dang yid kyis bdud rtsi lnga thogs pa'i lha mo sprul pa dang /
T02TD1199E:110b-27: ngag gis mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po nas 'byung ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa yin no //
T02TD1199E:110b-28: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun du kha sbyor las byung ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po bcu pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1199E:110b-30: // / bla ma ye shes dpal gyi zhabs btud nas //
T02TD1199E:110b-31: rje btsun bde mchog sku la dad pa yis //
T02TD1199E:111a-0: byin rlabs mngon sum lam rnams gang @111a * //
T02TD1199E:111a-2: rgyud rgyal don rnams phyin ci ma log rtogs //
T02TD1199E:111a-3: gzhan gyis bskul phyir rang gis rtogs bkod pa //
T02TD1199E:111a-4: 'gro ba 'di kun mngon sum lam zhugs nas //
T02TD1199E:111a-5: rnam shes ye shes go 'phang thob nas kyang //
T02TD1199E:111a-6: gnyis med bde mchog ngang du 'gro bar shog / rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun du kha sbyor las byung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1199E:111a-7: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpa' bo rdo rje'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sto //
